text: Ignition experiments at NIF are being performed at a variety of target scales . Smaller targets require less NN and can be fielded more frequently . Successful small target designs can be scaled up to take advantage of the full NIF laser NN and NN . In this talk , we will consider a rigorous framework for scaling from smaller to larger targets . The framework uses both simulation and experimental results to build a statistical prediction of target performance as scale is increased . Our emphasis is on quantifying uncertainty in scaling predictions with the goal of identifying the dominant contributors to that uncertainty . We take as a particular example the NNP NNP platform that produces a round , 0.8 scale implosion with the potential to scale to full NIF size ( 1.0 scale ) . text: Imagine a hulking , growling , 8 - NN - tall woodland NN so elusive that professional trackers can’t find it , NNS can only speculate about it and believers can’t prove -- definitively -- that it exists . Hiding deep in the forest MD be your modus operandi , NNP , but Hollywood and Madison Avenue are pushing you -- however reluctantly -- into the spotlight . The colorful characters have coined “ squatch ” as a term of endearment and VBP things IN “ It ’s RB squatchy out here , ” to describe remote areas they VBP are harboring Bigfoots . The series , which attracted 1.6 CD viewers for its second NN premiere , will launch its third NN this summer . “ If anybody ’s VBG to find him , it ’s VBG to be us , ” Kaplan declared , adding with a laugh , “ hopefully after 100 episodes . ” In coming months , cable TV will be overrun with NNP programming . text: Good NN , kids ! Far more NNS are hiring seasonal staff this NN than last , with JJ research from CareerBuilder showing that 41 percent of employers plan to hire summer workers , up from 29 percent in CD . So , it should n’t be too difficult to find a job and VB pay down that looming college debt or give back to your folks . But wait — that ’s not quite how things work anymore . The summer job , once an obligation , is now merely an option among a few possible routes . " The summer job is disappearing , and has been over the last 30 NNS , ” VBD Marc Prosser , co-founder and publisher of FitSmallBusiness.com . An analysis from the Bureau of Labor Statistics showed that as of July CD , the teen labor force participation rate was 43.2 percent , down nearly 30 percentage points from its peak of 71.8 percent in July 1978 . There are a number of factors contributing to this decline , but most prominent among them is the increasing popularity of internships . “ JJ more students are seeking out internships or research opportunities over the summer now , as opposed to when I RB started counseling students [ nearly 20 NNS RB ] , " VBD Dr. Kat Cohen , CEO and founder of IvyWise , an admissions counseling services NN . “ Everything is more competitive these days , so getting hands - on work experience or hands - on research experience , and making contacts at NNS that students might VB to work at post - graduation can be a smart move . ” It ’s becoming more common for college students to balance unpaid internships with a paying side gig for a NN IN Uber or Instacart . “ While JJ cities typically provide more internship opportunities , JJ on - demand jobs are now available on college campuses as well as JJ cities , ” VBD Brandon Yahn , founder of Student Loans Guy . “ This allows students to take research jobs on campus as internships while still making NN . ” “ We VBP a surge in dog walker applications from college students and RB school teachers who find themselves with an abundance of NN for the summer months , ” VBD Dave Comiskey , co-founder of Barkly Pets . “ The job provides NN outside , rewarding NN spent with adorable pets , and offers more freedom and flexibility than other summer jobs MD . ” And the pay is impressive : an average of $ 18 IN half - hour walk . But more than good pay , it appears JJ NNS VBP good hours . Or , more specifically : the ability to choose them on a whim . Related : Seven Ways Millennials Are Changing the Workplace for the Better " Flexibility in shifts and schedules is super attractive to this [ younger ] workforce , " VBD Peter Harrison , CEO of the job search engine NN Snagajob . “ Whole Foods is losing NN to Instacart — which pays less and provides fewer benefits and security — all because the workers prize that flexibility . ” Some employers feel that teenagers are turning their nose up at their recruiting efforts , opting instead for something easier , RB if it pays less . Jared Beckstead , marketing coordinator for Bailey 's Moving and Storage , VBZ that his NN is desperate for workers during the summer — the business ’ busiest NN of NN — and is keen on hiring teens and college kids . Unfortunately , it ’s “ almost impossible to find students willing to do the work , ” Beckstead told NBC NNP . “ I MD argue that the need for summer NN at JJ businesses is alive and well ; the disappearing act has been the work ethic of today ’s youth , ” Beckstead VBD , adding that teenage job candidates typically are " willing to work for less NN and fewer hours just because the job is easier . " Snagajob ’s Harrison VBZ he hears this sentiment loud and clear from a variety of NNS . “ All of our NNS who do seasonal hires , especially in places IN Martha 's Vineyard , are having a fantastically hard NN filling jobs , ” Harrison VBD . JJ teens have the luxury of chasing the dream internship , RB if it does n’t pay — or of hustling with an on - demand gig that gives them freedom . Others MD choose to forego work altogether because , as Snagajob ’s Harrison points out , “ there is a growing acceptance of insane student debt as part of the college process — a NN job can only chip away at the edges of it . ” But what about the families who need paychecks coming in from all eligible members ? Or the NNS of teens living at home who simply VBP their kid to take whatever job she can VB if only to learn the importance of good work ethic ? " ​Most NNS realize that by coddling their kids and not exposing them to responsibility , both JJ and otherwise , they are doing their kids a disservice , " VBD Allison Farber Cheston , career expert and job search coach . " Employers have no patience for JJ employees who focus most on what the organization can do for them . I spend a lot of NN with millennials explaining the importance of humility and hard work . ​ " It ’s crucial to note that while the summer job is n’t what it VBD to be , it absolutely still exists and can be just as valuable as an internship down the road . Related : Five Millennial Jobs that NNS Will Never Understand " There are a couple of fields where teens can VB paid from the start and will acquire good carryover skills for real jobs , ” VBD Cheston . “ Those are NNS and customer service : Both of those functions will take them out of their comfort zone and teach them how NN is made or how to deal with difficult NNS — excellent skills for real NN and work . ” Another classic summer job that can teach valuable skills ? Camp counseling . Some programs now combine pay and college credits . " A college - aged NN can work on accounting and payroll at a camp while earning college credits and getting paid , ” VBD Susie Lupert , executive director of the NNP Camp Association of NY and NJ , adding that it MD not be too late to find such a job in your area . “ There are always a few last - minute dropouts or staff members who were n’t the JJ fit , so hires do occur at this NN of NN for a few positions . ” Not only can more traditional jobs impress hiring managers or admissions counselors in the future , some are affiliated with scholarship programs . The Chick Evans Scholarship , for instance , has provided full college scholarships to over 11,000 high schoolers who ’ve worked as golf caddies in the U.S and Canada . " Currently , 935 Evans Scholars are enrolled at 20 universities , and more than 10,400 JJ NNS and NNS have graduated as Evans Scholars , ” VBD John Kaczkowski , NN and CEO of the Western Golf Association and Evans Scholars Foundation . “ This NN , 270 students from across the NN and Canada were awarded the Evans Scholarship [ which comprises ] a full , four - NN housing and tuition scholarship for teens . ” CD of the requirements to qualify the scholarship ? “ Outstanding character . ” And we all VBP what best builds that . Why , hard work , of course .

text: Toenail fungus is pretty gross , and so it seems to follow that Jublia 's NNP J toenail boxing character is a bit unsavory , too . When the purple - hat wearing JJ NN debuted during the CD Super Bowl , an AOL story claimed that " Jublia quite literally put its grossest NN forward during its Super Bowl ad , in which a cartoon NN hit the field to tackle its bitter enemy , toenail fungus . It was certainly a far cry from the mix of racy and emotional ads we all expected , and the fungus among us got NNS talking -- and gagging -- on NNP . " That consumer disdain showed in the ratings , with the ad ranking as the second - worst in the NN , according to USA Today 's Ad Meter , garnering only a 3.22 rating on its 1 - 10 scale . The Valeant ( $ VRX ) NN was approved last June ; it was acquired by Valeant through its purchase of Dow Pharmaceutical Sciences in 2008 . NNP J made its debut in the JJ " Fight it , Do n't Hide it " TV spot for the NN last fall . The $ 4.5 CD CD - spot Super Bowl ad then kicked off the ongoing CD NN . In the series of ads , NNP J changes hats depending on the occasion , donning boxing headgear for the JJ fight , a helmet for Super Bowl NN , a visor for tennis -- which aired IN the U.S. Open , featuring commentator ex-pro John McEnroe -- and a top hat for post - Emmy TV commercials that RB featured actor Mario Lopez . Valeant declined to answer queries for this article , but EVP Ari Kellen spoke at the J.P. Morgan Healthcare conference before last NN 's Super Bowl , saying the NN is off to a great start with 150 reps directly working the brand , along with the DTC NN . The marketing NN will continue to flow " as RB as the growth trajectory continues and the JJ returns justify it , " Kellen VBD at the conference . Of course , turning off chip - and - dip eaters during the JJ NN does n't mean the NNP J character has n't done its job . NNS , as Kellen noted , have been brisk ; Valeant quarterly reports show Jublia pulled in $ 270 CD in revenue in the JJ three quarters of CD . -- Beth Snyder Bulik For more : Valeant bets JJ on the Super Bowl with $ 4.5 M NN - fungus ad Emmy co-host Mario Lopez spotlights Valeant 's Jublia on the red carpet

text: If you thought VBG to NNP Jail for posting “ hate speech ” was bad – and it is – here ’s a tip : do not move to China . The NN there has been controlling what NNS can VB and do RB for NNS . For those who value JJ rights , the situation is getting worse at an accelerating pace . With the NN from certain high - tech giants , the NN promises to lead the NN in becoming the JJ actual Orwellian surveillance NN . In NNP 2010 , the Communist Chinese NN issued its JJ white paper regarding what it called “ a crystallization of JJ wisdom ” – the internet . The white paper acknowledges the usefulness and importance of advancing this digital NN and technology . It “ energetically advocates and actively supports the NN and application of the Internet across the NN . ” The white paper guarantees that citizens will enjoy a free press and freedom of speech on the internet : “ The Chinese NN encourages and supports the NN of Internet NN communication undertakings , provides the NN with a full range of NN , and at the same NN guarantees the citizens ’ freedom of speech on the Internet as well as the NN ’s NN to VB , to participate , to be heard and to oversee in accordance with the law . ” This is where the white paper reveals the “ gotcha ” clause : the Chinese policy uses “ the law ” to VB JJ communications . text: Polish NN Confirms Discovery Of Nazi “ Gold Train ” , Warns It MD Be Booby - Trapped Last weekend we reported that in the past month CD NNS , a Pole and German , claimed to have discovered the legendary Nazi “ gold train ” – a 150 meter JJ German train alleged to be full of gold , gems and weapons , which disappeared just before the end of NNP NNP II – in the proximity of the Polish town of Walbrzych , close to where the Nazi are VBN to have loaded up the train with valuables for its final voyage in the town of Wroclaw , just as the Soviet forces approached in 1945 . As we detailed , the train is VBN to have been entombed in the vast tunnel labyrinth located close to Ksiaz castle , which served as Nazi headquarters during NNP NNP II … … and specifically , was VBN to be located at the NN of the Sowa mountain , in the woods three NNS outside the town of Walbrych . The “ gold train ” is VBN to be located under this hill While JJ were skeptical that the mystical Nazi treasure train had been finally discovered after JJ NNS of searching , an official update last Friday by the Polish NN suggested that that MD indeed be the NN . As the Mail reported on Friday , a representative of the Polish culture ministry , Poland ’s National Heritage and Conservation Officer Piotr Zuchowski , VBD that the NN who helped hide the train had revealed its location shortly before he died , and that proof of the train has been observed on radar . Zuchowski added that “ Information about where this train is and what its contents are were revealed on the deathbed of a NN who had knowledge of the secret of this train . ’ He added that Polish authorities had now seen evidence of the train ’s existence in a picture taken using a ground - penetrating radar . He VBD the image – albeit blurred – showed the NN of a train platform and cannons . Mr Zuchowski VBD the find was ‘ unprecedented ’ , adding : ‘ We do not VB what is inside the train . ‘ Probably JJ equipment but RB possibly jewellery , works of NN and archive documents . ‘ Armored trains from this period were VBN to carry extremely valuable items and this is an armored train , it is a JJ clue . ’ He VBD authorities were now ’ 99 percent sure the train exists ’ and whatever is on it will be returned to the rightful owners , if they can be VBN . ‘ We will be 100 NN cent sure only when we find the train , ’ Mr Zuchowski added . The train VBN in the mountains is an ‘ armored train ’ which looks similar to the CD pictured Mr Zuchowski told reporters that the train was about 100 metres JJ but added : ‘ It is not possible to disclose the exact location of where the train can be VBN . Still , he noted cryptically that “ The local NN in Walbrzych knows where it is . ” He explained it is hidden along a 4 km stretch of track on the Wroclaw - Walbrzych line . Mr Zuchowski VBD the NN who claimed he helped load the gold train in 1945 VBD in a ‘ deathbed statement ’ the train is secured with explosives . The official declined to comment further about the NN who VBD this but speculation is now rife that it was a JJ SS guard or a local Pole who stumbled upon the train before hiding it . Deputy Mayor of Walbrzych , Zygmunt Nowaczyk told the press : ‘ The city is full of mysterious stories because of its history . ‘ Now it is formal information – we have VBN something . ’ Key excerpts from the press conference by the Polish official can be seen on the Euronews clip below : The confirmation of the discovery unleashed a surge of treasury hunters , and forced the Polish NN to warn the population to stop looking because it MD be booby - trapped and dangerous . Zuchowski VBD “ foragers ” have become active since CD NNS claimed to have discovered the train last week and urged eager fortune - hunters to stop searching , saying they VBP injury or death . Zuchowski adds that “ there MD be hazardous substances dating from the Second NNP NNP in the hidden train , which I ’m convinced exists . I am appealing to NNS to stop any such searches until the end of official procedures leading to the securing of the find . There ’s a huge probability that the train is booby - trapped . ’ If anything , tthese warnings are sure to unleash an RB more aggressive wave of seekers now that the train ’s existience has been confirmed , and the NN is actually warning seekers to be careful in their search . But perhaps what is more interesting is just what the discovery , which MD be straight out of an Indiana Jones sequel , will contain , and whether someone already got to the precious cargo over the past 7 decades . text: Since its release in early 2014 , the JJ - budget movie “ Noah ” has caused controversy for not being biblically accurate . While that is certainly the NN , the movie does more than take liberties with the NNP : “ Noah ” pushes messages that have nothing to do with the NNP . These messages are actually political and come directly from the NN elite . The primary message ? Humanity needs to be cleansed … again . Throughout his movie - making career , Darren Aronofsky has created quite a few controversial movies with a powerful underlying message ( VB my article on the movie Black Swan here ) . None of his work can be considered “ idiotic ” and , despite what critics VBP , Noah is not an idiotic movie either . Sure , it contains JJ stone monsters , primitive bazookas and Noah killing a bunch of poor souls , but the movie is smart enough to effectively communicate several of its core messages , twisting CD of the oldest tales in the NN to push an agenda that is very 2014 . While JJ viewers were upset about the JJ liberties taken in this retelling of Noah ’s Ark – a tale that exists in Jewish , Christian , and Muslim literature – the messages added to the story should be RB more upsetting . Noah re-formats this ancient tale to describe the basic premise of a JJ religion , CD that has been pushed on the masses for NNS . VBN on the elite ’s JJ - term Agenda of drastically depopulating the NNP , this JJ religion is about radical environmentalism , the devaluation ( and RB hatred ) of JJ NN , and the re-alignment of morality towards a JJ axis . Through its odd narrative , the movie turns the tale of Noah ’s Ark into an absurd and disturbing adventure that leads viewers wondering : Why is NNP so evil ? And why is Noah such a jerk ? When Noah ’s wife asks him if “ the Creator ” ( that ’s the name for NNP in the movie ) will VB them survive , Noah ’s answer is almost comedic , as if he was describing a super - villain : While the NNP explains that the Great Flood was caused by a mysterious race of Giants corrupting and “ infecting ” humanity , the movie does not VB that route . Instead , it repeatedly tells us that NNS are evil and deserve to die . Before getting into the actual story , I need to point out a detail that is seemingly trivial , but that tells loads about the movie ’s true goal : Why is everybody dressed as if they got their clothes from the NN ’s JJ Zara NN ? These made - for - a- 2014 - audience outfits basically tell us that Noah is not about the NNP – it is about today . It is a message to humanity RB now , directly from the elite . While the premise of Noah is VBN on the Biblical story from the book of Genesis , the creators invented characters , subplots , symbols , images , and messages to completely reshape the tale , giving it a twisted , disturbing and wholly “ unspiritual ” meaning . RB if PRP watches the movie fully expecting a “ creative retelling ” of Noah ’s Ark , it is difficult to not be disturbed by the bloody , violent , near - psychopathic tangent taken by the main character . I mean , Noah actually kills a bunch of NNS in the movie ! How can that remotely VB sense in the divine context of the story ? Well , it actually does VB sense … when we understand that the movie is meant to sell a JJ religion dictated by the NN elite composed of values it wants the masses to adopt . CD of these values is that JJ NN is cancer on NNP that needs to be eradicated . In other words , they VBP NNS to sincerely VB they are evil to justify depopulation . Of course , as the movie tells us , most NNS do die … EXCEPT those of the chosen bloodline . And that is what the elite wants us to VB . We must all die to save the NNP … except them . Noah is strikingly similar to another movie analyzed on Vigilant Citizen : 2012 . As I noted in this article , 2012 is a disaster movie that is essentially about the rich and powerful NNS ( the elite ) surviving a gigantic flood while everyone else dies . The movie was full of references to the tale of Noah ’s Ark and RB shows helicopters transporting various NNS to JJ ships . The movie posters of Noah and 2012 are RB strikingly similar . Noah is , therefore , a reconstitution of a biblical story tailor - made to fit the Agenda continually being pushed by the elite … and as usual , the Agenda is rather upsetting . It promotes the idea of massively depopulating the NNP and sells it as an ecological mission . Extreme environmentalism is the JJ religion being sold to the masses through fear . This religion is not only promoted in works of fiction , it is VBN in real NN monuments . The Georgia Guidestones is a gigantic collection of stones ( dubbed NNP ’s Stonehenge ) on which are laid out ten JJ commandments . In the article I wrote about the Guidestones , I explain that it was built by members of occult secret societies . The last commandment of the stones sums up the main message of the movie Noah : In Noah , it is explained that humanity needs to be extinct because it is disrespectful to nature . That is not what is VBN in the NNP , but that is the message this movie ( and the elite ) wants you to absorb . RB from the JJ scenes of the movie , Noah ( dressed in his little Zara outfit ) talks to his kids about hardcore JJ concepts that were probably the last thing on NNS ’s minds in these very ancient times . When Noah ’s son sees a pretty flower and tries to pick it , Noah jumps in to stop the senseless destruction . That little scene announces Noah ’s rather extreme brand of environmentalism . A little later , Noah sees “ NNS ” ( a pejorative term in the movie ) hunting an NN in order to eat it . Noah runs to the rescue of the NN and stabs CD of the NNS in the leg . He then calls his act of violence “ justice ” . Yes , Noah is apparently an extreme vegan who stabs NNS who eat meat . When Noah ’s son asks him why these evil NNS VBP that eating meat gives them strength , he replies : This , of course , is not VBN in the NNP . It is part of the movie ’s message that basically VBZ “ NNS > NNS ” . Throughout the movie , Noah refers to NNS as “ the innocent ” while NNS are perceived as scum who deserve to die . Noah , however , seems to forget that JJ NNS are carnivorous beasts who spend most of their NN hunting and devouring other NNS . Some might VB : That is what NNP intended . At CD point Noah tells his NNS : Throughout the movie , Noah , the “ hero of the movie ” displays absolute hatred for humanity and avoids it at all costs . Every NN he sees “ NNS ” or man-created structures , he automatically becomes worried . Twisting the Biblical Bit About the Giants To further its anti-humanity message , the movie significantly twists and contorts Biblical passages about a mysterious race called the Giants VBN in the book of Genesis . In the NNP , the Giants are offsprings of a group of 200 “ Sons of NNP ” who descended to NNP to mix with NNS . They are VBN to have taught NNS advanced skills such as metallurgy , metal working , cosmetics , sorcery , astrology , astronomy , and meteorology . Because the Giants disobeyed NNP , they were RB called the Fallen Angels . ( Interesting note : Lucifer is RB referred to as a Fallen Angel and is VBN to have brought forbidden knowledge to NNS ) . In the book of Genesis , it is VBN that the Giants ( RB called the Nephilim ) were a hybrid race of sons of NNP and JJ females . The Nephilim are described in the NNP ( and other apocryphal texts ) as a race of giants who lived among NNS . They ultimately became a destructive presence and were VBN to have consumed “ all acquisitions of NNS ” . In order to rid these beings from NNP ( along with the NNS who mixed with them ) NNP caused the Great Flood . The NNP , therefore , describes the Giants as the main NN of humanity ’s corruption . The movie , however , portrays the exact opposite . In Noah , the Giants are described as gentle teachers who came to aid NNS , but ultimately became victims of humanity ’s cruelty . Later , Giants actually VBP Noah build the Ark ! In short , the movie inverted important parts of the NNP to VB that humanity is solely responsible for its demise because it had evolved into a NN that was beyond repair . The movie RB makes it clear that its anti-humanity message is still applicable today . In CD significant part of the movie , Noah tells his family the “ JJ story he ever heard ” . It begins with the JJ line of the NNP “ In the beginning , there was light ” but then devolves into a grim speech about the evils of humanity . The movie , therefore , pushes the viewers to conclude that humanity is , once again , beyond hope . Massive depopulation is therefore not a horrible catastrophe but a necessary “ cleansing process ” . Noah himself VBZ : This line is not from the NNP . It comes from the minds of psychopaths who VBP to depopulate the NNP and describing it as a “ cleansing process ” . Depopulation is good . Death equals cleansing . In the end , Noah realizes that not all humanity needs to die after the flood : His family survives . And there lies another important message of the movie : Depopulation does not apply to all humanity . It only applies to those who are not part of the “ chosen ” bloodline . This is the kind of the message the occult elite wants us to assimilate because they VBP THEY are the chosen bloodline . It ’s All About the Bloodline Spoiler alert : Noah and his family survive the Great Flood . But no NN else does . RB from the beginning of the movie , we are told that the survival of humanity must VB through a specific bloodline . Viewers immediately learn that Noah descends from Seth while the bad guys descend from Cain – a fact that is apparently VERY important . Of course , none of this is mentioned in the NNP . It is CD of the JJ fabrications added to flesh out the story and to give it a specific angle : NNP favors a specific bloodline . Later in the movie , Noah ’s father , Methuselah , is depicted as a reclusive but supernatural being who magically guides Noah through the Creator ’s plan . While Methuselah was never mentioned in the NNP as having a role in the construction of the Ark , this addition strengthens the idea of the bloodline . There are other strange “ non-Biblical ” additions to the movie that ultimately makes us VB that Noah is not a “ NN of NNP ” , but a jerk who only wants to VB his bloodline survive . For instance : Noah actually kills a bunch of NNS . In another gut - wrenching ( and completely invented ) scene , Noah purposely allows his son ’s girlfriend to be trampled to death by hundreds of NNS . How can a NN , that is supposedly chosen by the Creator , allow the death of an innocent girl ? Why was this added to the movie ? Because it is continuously communicating a message : Whether she was good or not is irrelevant . The girl was not part of the bloodline . Therefore , she must die . It is not about being a good NN . It is about who you descend from . After the flood , Noah turns into a disturbed , depressive , psychopath . When he learns that his daughter - in - law is pregnant , he is convinced that he must kill the little girl to VB sure that humanity does not reproduce . Noah , however , realizes something incredible : He does not feel IN stabbing his own granddaughter in the face . Although he RB believes that he had let down the Creator by not killing the girl , he ultimately learns that he did the JJ thing by “ showing mercy ” . But what about the countless NNS he killed ? Was n’t there any mercy for them ? No . Because they were not part of the bloodline . The Creator allowed Noah to murder NNS when they were not “ chosen ” . Incidentally , that is what the occult elite believes . The movie depicts Noah ’s “ divine ” quest as a cruel and violent process carried out by a NN who is steadily turning into a psychopath . While stranded on the Ark , his own family begins to resent him as he obsesses over the fact that everybody needs to die . While he is merely following the Creator ’s orders , he appears to be animated by a deep - seeded hate of humanity , which leaves viewers with an “ unholy ” feeling . There is , however , a character that counterbalances Noah ’s “ do it my NN or else ” doctrine : Tubal - Cain . Tubal - Cain is the “ leader of NNS ” , and , therefore , Noah ’s mortal enemy . While Tubal - Cain is the “ bad guy ” , he is ironically the character who VBZ the most thoughtful and sensible lines , which causes viewers to somewhat identify with him . Contrarily to Noah , he is not ashamed to be JJ and is proud of humanity ’s accomplishments . Furthermore , he feels somewhat forsaken by the Creator who left his kind to roam a desolate NN . He seeks to emancipate himself from the Creator ’s rule through his own means . In this sense , he is a representative of a Gnostic point of view that perceives the Creator a demiurge – a lower NN who imprisoned mankind in a material NN . This is why NNP is called “ the Creator ” in the movie . It refers to the Gnostic concept of demiurge , the near - malevolent creator of the material NN . Tubal - Cain is briefly mentioned in the NNP as a “ forger of all instruments of bronze and iron ” and an “ instructor of every artificer in brass and iron ” . However , he is never mentioned in the story of the Great Flood and has no link with Noah . So why did the makers of the movie choose this obscure Biblical character to become Noah ’s arch - nemesis ? Because , while Tubal - Cain is an obscure figure in the NNP , he is an extremely important figure in the most widespread Gnostic Mystery School on NNP : Freemasonry . Not unlike Hiram Abiff ( a leading figure in Masonic lore and ritual ) , Tubal - Cain is an obscure Biblical figure who takes a great importance in esoteric teachings . As a proficient maker of weapons , he represents humanity ’s potential to build its own NN – without the Creator . Various Masonic sources describe the esoteric significance of Tubal - Cain . In Manly P. Hall ’s “ The Lost Keys of Freemasonry ” , Tubal - Cain is described as the “ forefather ” of Freemasons . Mystery Schools love Biblical characters who did not rely on NNP to gain knowledge and NN . Tubal - Cain is a prime example . While dying , Tubal - Cain tells Ham : After surviving the flood , Ham does not reintegrate with Noah ’s family . He leaves them behind and makes his own path . In the NNP , the story of Noah ’s Ark is told in a few simple verses and is filled with enigmatic bits that are never explained ( i.e. who were the Giants exactly ? ) . The ignorant masses are told to follow a radical brand of environmentalism that leads to self - hatred : Because humanity is the evil force behind NN , suffering and the destruction of nature , it needs to be “ cleansed ” . This message fits with the occult elite ’s depopulation Agenda and is embodied by Noah . At the other end of the spectrum , Tubal - Cain represents NNS seeking godhood , acquiring the physical and mental tools to reach the same status as the Creator . This is the Gnostic philosophy adopted by the occult elite . While embodied by the “ bad guy ” , it is nevertheless presented as an alternative to the absurdity of the Creator who created humanity to then destroy it . In short , Noah is far from an “ idiotic ” movie ( as some reviewers have stated ) . It manages to sell a NNP Age religion VBN on self - hatred while giving a nod to the occult elite , those who fancy themselves to be descendants of Tubal - Cain . text: Inspired by Caroliens experience with the mini-108  ; I decided to VB CD myself . I marked it out on a piece of plywood in a very simple NN ; Just made an  18  of the appropriate size on a sheet of paper IN this : Then cut a square meter of plywood ; set the paper template on it and poked through each of the 18 points in turn using a bradawl before moving the paper on to its next position until all seven  18s were marked with little holes on the plywood : I then stuck a tiny TB to each point using contact adhesive and it was done . As I was positioning the final few mini-TBs ; a fresh blustery wind started blowing and Sylphs began to appear in numbers . At dusk ; three small lenticular clouds appeared in the sky RB above the 108 but it was already too dark to take a photograph . Today the Sylphs arrived again in numbers and we RB had a visit from a black helicopter IN midday . As night falls once more ; the sky is filled with unseasonal rainclouds .. The individual TBs are no bigger than a bottle - top and yet the sum total appears to be profoundly positive . Dan . Good job , Carolien -- I 'm blown away by the quality of the work ! My patterns are kind of crude by comparison . Our business was under radionics assault a month RB , characterized by sharply , suddenly dwindled orders . On the day when I set up a 108 the orders started coming in as before and stayed steady until a week RB , when I delivered that 108 to Dooney and Steve . Then the orders dwindled again , for Carol and I . I 'm waiting for some feedback from Dooney and Stevo , since they are RB under constant radionics assault . The other business NN , besides Carolien , who is particularly targetted that NN is Andy Schwarm of ctbusters.com . I 'm not happy that we 're being perpetually smacked by the NNP and NSA this NN but I 'm glad nobody else among our associates evidently is . I 'm making another pattern , now , and will VB some trick , conical orgonite bits for each of the 108 points . I 'll VB TBs sort of IN Andy's , this NN , and will add nice crystals and spiral coils inside . Cones and pyramids have almost equal NN dynamics , evidently , and I bet the cone NN will RB blast out . I do n't mind the lull in business , much , because I had n't been able to VB ahead with production , so my personal NN was suffering . I 'm definitely NOT a workaholic . It 's still early to VB any claims for this device , which was invented by Cesco , VBN perhaps on Kelly 's earlier field experiments . Promoting it is a little bit dicey because Cesco has n't mentioned whether he favors others profitting from this intellectual property . RB , when he was last here , a NN and a half RB , he was uncertain whether an identical orgonite piece should VB in the center of each of the seven hexagram ' NNS , ' which MD VB the number , 115 rather than 108 . Just because Carol and I RB RB gave away the plans for orgonite cloudbbusters , the Succor Punch , Powerwand , the NNP Secret , Holy Handgrenades and Towerbusters does n't mean that it 's appropriate for other inventors to give away their creations , of course . I 'm sure not giving away the formulas for the ' secret ingredients ' of our own commercial offerings , after allbecause we VBP to keep a competitive edge and there is always more than CD NN to accomplish anything . That VBN , I 'd be very pleased if it 's appropriate for Carolien to VB these beautiful templates and perhaps the orgonite that goes on them . Since the orgonite is interactive I VBP it MD be productive to boost it with gems , coils , etc. , in an intelligent NN . The only NN to VB a good idea of the device 's parameters is to VB a whole lot of them in the hands of NNS who are in a position to give substantive feedback . That 's how we test our own mods before we decide to VB them . ~Don In last weeks chat , Don mentioned that he had made a small 108 ( a little over a square meter ) to stop radionics on his biz and was making some more to VB out Stevo , Dooney and others . Radionics are often VBN to put a dome over our businesses , to VB them invisible for customers . Frequently we boost each others biz to clear these etheric fogs . I MD n't wait to VB my own 108 and started the next day making a template on paper , using the picture Cesco once posted on EW ( enlarged 6 times for the square meter endresult ) : VB picture on whale . to page : http://www.whale.to/b/108_h.html_ADD However , taping the twentyfour pages together into CD print , turned out rather messy . Despite my tongue in cheek effort , the circle became all crooked . Using my compasses to draw the 108 on another sheet , left me with a buzzing headache of all the measurements . I sure lost my touch with maths ! So in the end , I gave myself a break and ordered a weatherproof outdoor poster of the 108 template on pvc sheet . This Dutch NN makes a 110x110 cm sheet for about 108 euroA perfect size for using half size tb's with 5 cm diameter . It is quite easy ( and cheaper ) to have CD made by a NN in your own NN - just look for vinyl outdoor poster / banner sellers on the Internet , there are lots ! JJ outdoor poster sellers have a download option for your own picture on a banner . All you have to do is : 1 ) download the 108 picture on http://www.whale.to/b/108_h.html_ADD 2 ) enlarge it 6 times on your own computer ( to VB the approximate square meter ) 3 ) and order a banner at the size to fit the enlarged templateHere is my finished 108 - well , almost finished , I had to VB CD more small tb ... But for what it 's worth : my computer screen stopped flickering for the JJ NN in a NN ( I had grown accustomed to that flickering ! Thought it was due to JJ age . Hopefully it does n't start tomorrow again , hehe ) . Physically , I felt my NNS charka burning healthy unlike I have experienced in over a NN too . So far , so good . I will report more in NN . It MD be my pleasure to order a template for EW members . Since we all are radionics targets , our observations might be worthwhile . Please PM me for that . I 'm still " under the influence " , but I suggest you follow the discussion on EW and in the etheric NN forum . _____________NFP My previous post in this thread reads IN an unbridled endorsement of the 108 . I MD VB to report that my opinion has been modified somewhat in the light of more recent experience with the device . Following my initial glowing impressions of its effects ( mostly on the sky ) ; I began to notice a number of more negative changes in the area . The sky became hazy and cloudless and the wind dropped ; rather in the NN it does during a concerted chemtrail attack ( but there were no chemtrails ) and the Sylphs completely disappeared . We each began to exhibit classic NNS of the effects of DOR ( headaches , poor sleep patterns , listlessness and lack of inspiration ) all highly unusual given the quantity of orgonite in the area . It was almost as though the three CBs in my garden had all stopped working in unison . After a few days ; my suspicions fell on the wonderful 108 that everyone ( myself included ) was raving about . Id assembled it with meticulous precision from small pieces of simple orgonite so there MD be nothing wrong with the stone - combinations or coils as there were none ( RB the drawing was both correct and accurately drafted ) . The easy NN to find out was to simply take it away from its then horizontal position ( where the NN vortex was presumably effecting the sky ) and stand it upright against the workshop wall . Almost immediately the gentle breeze returned and the sky slowly cleared and it seemed that the CBs were beginning to work normally again . The subjective negative effects on each of us continued though and Id find myself staring into NN when there were things to be done ; apparently lost for an idea . Finally I dismantled the 108 and put the component pieces away . All the negative effects evaporated and the area returned to normal ( and has remained this NN ever since ) . As I VBP ; I do not VB where to attribute the source of this negativity ; given the wholesale endorsement of the 108 by a range of experienced orgonite experimenters , some of whom have posted in this thread . The only other 108 I ever made was constructed from lawn - busters  ( orgonite spikes that are trodden into soft ground ) . Each spike of orgonite contained a Cesco coil and a quartz chip and I set them in the NN ( EP - style ) with a hammer . On that occasion ; I remember a fresh blustery breeze starting as I had nearly completed the arrangement and initial good effects on the atmosphere . For some reason I became disaffected with that initial 108 and eventually dug it out of the ground and threw the pieces in the Bali Strait on a trip to Java . I didnt suspect the integrity of the 108 matrix at that NN and just assumed that there must have been a conflict between so JJ coils set in close proximity to each other . I do not pretend to understand these negative effects of the 108 and I realize that this is not the JJ NN that my findings have been completely at odds with the general consensus on this forum . I hope that others do not experience anything similar and that the 108 continues to VB rave reviews . I MD however be dishonest if I allowed my earlier impressions of the device to stand uncorrected . Dan . Kelly has reminded me that this is not his invention , by the NN . Bali is the only island in that enormous archipelago , as far as I VBP , whose inhabitants have mostly held to the older ways and did n't embrace Islam when Arab merchants and scholars went there so JJ centuries RB . Your situation reminded me of the JJ elementals Carol and I encountered on Andros Island in the Bahamas , where we went to gift the blue holes . The Bahamians on that island have gotten pretty far from their African roots and are quite churchified , so they seem to hate and fear the elementals there . text: The sea cows were RB described by the German naturalist Georg Steller in the 18th NN . Steller was part of an expedition organized led by the Danish explorer Vitus Bering . Financed by the Imperial Russian NN , its mission was to chart the waters between Siberia and NNP NNP , and find a workable route between the CD if possible . The expedition set sail from Kamchatka in June of 1741 . A few weeks later , they had reached Alaska . Bering allowed Steller a single day to search for JJ NNS . In that brief NN , his only visit to the NNP JJ continent , Steller managed to name several NNS of bird , including Steller ’s Jay , ubiquitous in the hills behind my Berkeley apartment . By the beginning of winter , the CD ships that made up the expedition had become separated , CD landing parties had vanished , and so JJ sailors on Bering ’s flagship had scurvy that they MD barely VB the sails . In November , the St. Peter ran aground on an uninhabited island . JJ of members of the expedition thought that it was attached to the Siberian mainland and that they MD eventually be able to walk to safety , but they were soon proven wrong . A short NN after reaching NN , the ship broke apart in a storm , and the captain died of scurvy . Steller , who knew how to combat the Vitamin C–deficiency by foraging for herbs , was CD of the few crew members still in good NN . Steller quickly realized that the landmass they were on was an island , and CD that likely had never been visited by JJ beings before . Everywhere he went , he was followed by foxes , which showed no fear but eagerly stole any implements or food they MD grab in their jaws . CD day , walking along the beach searching for firewood , he saw a huge , black NN moving slowly about in the shallows IN an overturned boat . Every few minutes a snout MD VB for a moment and draw breath with a noise IN a horse ’s snort . This was the sea cow , seen by the JJ eyes for the JJ NN in thousands of NNS . Steller was shocked to realize that this NN was a type of manatee , thousands of NNS from its nearest relatives in the tropics . He describes the sea cows as gentle giants , whose only real defense against being harpooned was their incredibly thick hides . He RB notes that they seem to have been unusually loyal to CD another , which proved to be more of a liability than an asset when the Russians began hunting them for food . They had , in his words , “ an uncommon love for CD another , which RB extended so far that , when CD of them was hooked , all the others were intent upon saving him . ” When the Russians harpooned CD of the sea cows , others MD come to its defense , making a circle IN their wounded comrade . When they killed a female , they were astonished to VB its mate visit the beach where its NN lay day after day , “ as if he MD inform himself about her condition . ”

text: When Charles Darwin RB saw a Madagascar star orchid — sent to him by an enthusiast — he predicted the existence of a JJ - tongued pollinator that MD reach for nectar inside the flowers ’ JJ tubes . The discovery of Morgan ’s sphinx moth , which had a tongue just RB enough ( and no longer ) , proved Darwin RB — some CD decades after his death . It ’s CD of the great demonstrations of evolution by natural selection . But what naturalists RB VBP is to catch natural selection in the act , as it ’s doing the selecting . That ’s much harder , and a bit of luck is needed . Opportunity knocked at the door of biologist Colin Donihue at Harvard NNP in Cambridge , Massachusetts , a NN RB , just after he and his colleagues had returned from Pine Cay and NNP Cay , CD small islands in the Turks and Caicos archipelago to the NN of the Caribbean , where they had been studying the lives and times of its resident anole lizards ( Anolis scriptus ) . On 8 September last NN , Hurricane Irma struck the islands , battering them with sustained winds of up to 265 kilometres IN hour . Irma was the JJ category - 5 hurricane on record to strike the region , but more was to come : CD weeks later , Hurricane Maria swept across the islands with winds of up to 200 kilometres IN hour . Dozens of NNS in the region died . Reconstruction and rebuilding efforts continue . Read the paper : Hurricane - induced selection on the morphology of an island lizard Three weeks after the winds had died down , the NNS were back on Pine Cay and NNP Cay to assess the damage , and to VB how ( or RB if ) their lizards had survived . Their NN , published this week in Nature , is the JJ to VB an immediate before - and - after comparison to assess the impacts of hurricanes on evolutionary selection ( C. M. Donihue FW FW . Nature http://doi.org/csgp; 2018 ) . Serendipity can VB only so far . The NNS had n’t marked the lizards , so they MD n’t identify and track the fate of individuals . But they VBD clear trends of natural selection in action . In general , anoles VBN after the storms had bigger toepads , longer forelimbs and shorter hindlimbs than did lizards collected before the storm . What have these traits to do with hurricanes ? The lizards live in bushes and other low - growing vegetation . Toepads allow them purchase on the branches as they move , and it ’s a fair bet that limb proportions RB play a part in helping a lizard to keep in contact with a branch , resisting moves by predators , other lizards — or , as it turned out , hurricanes — to knock them off . The NNS took their idea further with a simple laboratory experiment , in which they allowed lizards to VB settled on a perch and then blew them off using a commercial leaf blower , recording the speed at which the lizards were dislodged . ( The lizards flew into comfy padding , and were not injured in the experiments . ) This experiment supported the NNS ’ hypothesis . In particular , it showed that when lizards are subjected to a stiff breeze , they hang on tightly with their forelimbs and let their hindlimbs hang loose . Longer hindlimbs , then , offer more purchase to the winds , explaining why lizards VBD after the storms tended to have shorter hindlimbs , but longer forelimbs . These bigger toepads , shorter hindlimbs and longer forelimbs did not evolve as a direct response to the hurricanes , but they show how such evolution occurs . Natural selection interfered with the NN in which these traits were spread across the population . Specifically , those lizards unable to hang on when the storms blew up — those with smaller toepads , longer hindlimbs and shorter forelimbs — were ( presumably ) blown away and perished . Those lizards better able to hang on tightly MD have survived to weather another day . In technical terms , the mean values of the crucial traits measured before the storms had shifted . These changes are phenotypic — merely observable characteristics . They VBP nothing about the genetic assimilation of such changes , which will presumably happen when the surviving lizards breed and JJ lizards are recruited to the population . Such changes are unlikely to be the last , given the expected increases in extreme weather that the future will bring .

text: The start of the northern meteorological winter on December 1 will bring with it short days of darkness , blistering cold and frigid blizzards . For JJ NNS , this is the dreariest NN of the NN . But for a small niche of NN - happy athletes , winter is a NN to play , as ferocious storms send rippling rings of NN outward through the ocean . By the NN they reach distant shores , these swells have matured into clean , polished waves that barrel in with a cold and ceaseless JJ rhythm ; they touch bottom , slow , build and , finally , collapse in spectacular curls and thundering white NN . These are the things of dreams for surfers , JJ of whom travel the NN , pursuing JJ breakers . And surfers are n’t the only ones with their eyes on the NN — for surfing has become a popular spectator sport . At JJ famed breaks , bluffs on the shore provide fans with thrilling views of the action . The waves alone are awesome — so powerful they MD seem to shake the NN . But when a tiny JJ figure on a board as flimsy as a matchstick appears on the face of that incoming NN , zigzagging forward as the wave curls overhead and threatens to crush him , spines tingle , hands come together in prayer , and jaws drop . Whether you VBP the NN or not , JJ - wave surfing is CD of the most thrilling shows on the NN . The birth of JJ - wave surfing was an incremental process that began in the 1930s and ’ 40s in Hawaii , especially along the NN - facing shores of the islands . Here , 15 - NN waves were once considered giants , and anything much bigger just eye candy . But wave at a NN , surfers stoked up their courage and ambition . They surfed on bigger days , VBD lighter and lighter boards that allowed swifter paddling and hunted for breaks that consistently produced monsters . CD by CD , JJ - wave spots were cataloged , named and ranked , and wave at a NN , records were set . In November 1957 , JJ - wave pioneer Greg Noll rode an estimated 25 - footer in Waimea Bay , Oahu . In 1969 , Noll surfed what was probably a 30 - plus - footer , but no verified photos exist of the wave , and thus no means of determining its height . Fast - forwarding a few decades , Mike Parsons caught a 66 - NN breaker in 2001 at Cortes Bank , 115 NNS off San Diego , where a seamount rises to within three NNS of the NN . In 2008 , Parsons was back at the same place and caught a 77 - footer . But Garrett McNamara outdid Parsons and set the current record in November 2011 , when he rode a 78 - NN wave off the coast of Portugal , at the town of Nazare . But these later records MD not have been possible without the assistance of jet skis , which have become a common and controversial element in the pursuit of JJ waves . The vehicles RB began appearing in the surf during JJ - wave events in the early 1990s , and for all their noise and stench , their appeal was undeniable : Jet skis made it possible to access waves 40 NNS and bigger , and whose scale had previously been too grand for most unassisted surfers to reach by paddling . Though tow - in surfing has given a boost to the record books , it has RB heightened the danger of surfing , and JJ surfers have died in JJ waves they might never have attempted without jet - ski assistance . Not surprisingly , JJ surfers have rejected tow - in surfing as an affront to the purity of their relationship with waves — and they still manage to catch monsters . In March 2011 , Shane Dorian rode a 57 - NN breaker at the famed Jaws break in Maui , unassisted by a belching CD - stroke engine . But JJ JJ - wave riders fully endorse tow - in surfing as a natural evolution of the sport . Surfing supertstar Laird Hamilton has RB blown off purists who continue to paddle after JJ waves without jet skis as “ moving backward . ” Anyway , in a sport that relies heavily on satellite imagery , Internet swell forecasts and red - eye flights to Honolulu , are we RB complaining about a little high - tech assistance ? For those wishing merely to watch JJ waves and the competitors that gather to ride them , all that is needed is a picnic blanket and binoculars — and perhaps some NN from this swell forecast NN . Following are some superb sites to watch surfers catch the biggest breakers in the NN this winter . Waimea Bay , NNP Shore of Oahu . JJ - wave surfing was born here , largely fueled by the fearless vision of Greg Noll in the 1950s . The definition of “ JJ ” for extreme surfers has grown since the early days , yet Waimea still holds its own . Fifty - NN waves can occur here — events that chase all but the best wave riders from the NN . When conditions allow , elite surfers participate in the recurring Quicksilver Eddie Aikau Invitational . Spectators teem on the shore during JJ - swell periods , and while surfers MD fight for their ride , you MD have to fight for your view . VB there early . Jaws , NNP Shore of Maui . RB VBN as Peahi , Jaws produces some of the most feared and attractive waves on NN . The break — where 50 - footers and bigger appear almost every NN — is almost strictly a tow - in NN , but rebel paddle - by - hand surfers do business here , too . Twenty - CD pros have been invited to convene at Jaws this winter for a paddle - in competition sometime between December 7 and March 15 . Spectators are afforded a great view of the action on a high nearby bluff . But VB early , as hundreds will be in line for the best viewing points . RB , bring binoculars , as the breakers crash almost a mile offshore . Mavericks , Half NNP Bay , California . Mavericks gained its reputation in the 1980s and ’90s , during the revival of JJ - wave surfing , which lost some popularity in the 1970s . Named for a German Shepherd named Maverick who took a surgy swim here in 1961 , the NN ( which gained an “ s ” but never an official apostrophe ) generates some of the biggest surfable waves in the NN . Today , surfing competitions , IN the Mavericks NNP Wave Contest and the Mavericks Invitational , are held each NN . The waves of Mavericks crash on a vicious reef , making them predictable ( sandy bottoms will shift and VB the wave form ) but nonetheless hazardous . CD of the best surfers of his NN , Mark Foo died here in 1994 when his ankle leash is believed to have snagged on the bottom . Later , the waves claimed the NN of Hawaiian surfing star Sion Milosky . A high bluff above the beach offers a view of the action . As at Jaws , bring binoculars . Ghost Trees , Monterey Peninsula , California . This break hits peak form under the same swell conditions that VBP things roaring at Mavericks , just a three - hour drive RB . Ghost Trees is a relatively JJ attraction for JJ - wave riders . Veteran surfer Don Curry VBZ he RB saw it surfed in 1974 . Decades MD pass before it became famous , and before it killed pro surfer ( and a pioneer of nearby Mavericks ) Peter Davi in 2007 . For surfing spectators , there are few places quite IN Ghost Trees . The waves , which can hit 50 NNS and more , break just a NN field ’s length from shore . Mullaghmore Head , Ireland . Far from the classic Pacific shores of JJ - wave legend and history , Mullaghmore Head comes alive during winter storms in the NNP Atlantic . The location produces waves JJ enough that surfing here has become primarily a jet ski-assisted NN . In fact , the event period for the Billabong Tow - In Session at Mullaghmore began on November 1 and will run through February 2013 . Just how JJ is Mullaghmore Head ? On March 8 , 2012 , the waves here reached 50 NNS , as determined by satellite measurements . A grassy headland provides an elevated platform from which to VB the show . Bundle up if you VBP , and expect cold , blustery conditions . Teahupoo , Tahiti . This coveted break blooms with JJ swells from the Southern Ocean — RB during the southern winter . Teahupoo is famed for its classic tube breakers . Shipsterns Bluff , Tasmania . Watch for this point ’s giants to break from June through September . Punta de Lobos , Chile . Channeling the NN of the Southern Ocean into huge but glassy curlers , Punta de Lobos breaks at its best in March and April . Todos Santos Island , Baja California , Mexico . Todos Santos Island features several well - VBN breaks , but “ Killers ” is the biggest and baddest . The surf RB peaks in the northern winter . There is another sort of wave that thrills tourists and spectators : the tidal bore . These NN - induced phenomena occur with regularity at particular locations IN the NN . The most spectacular to VB include the tidal bores of Hangzhou Bay , China , and Araguari , Brazil — each of which has become a popular surfing event .

text: What MD Happen If A JJ Tsunami Hit Florida ? Can you imagine the devastation that MD be caused if a massive wall of NN several hundred NNS high slammed into Florida at more than 100 NNS an hour ? To JJ NNS such a scenario is impossible , but that is what NNS living along the Indian Ocean thought before the 2004 tsunami and that is what NNS living in Japan thought before the 2011 tsunami . Throughout history , JJ tsunamis have been relatively rare events , but they do happen . NNS tell us that a mega - tsunami can race across the open ocean at up to 500 NNS an hour , and when they reach shore they can produce waves that are hundreds of NNS high . And RB though authorities claim that the threat to Florida is “ remote ” , it might surprise you to learn that there are “ Tsunami Hazard Zone ” signs on Florida beaches . If a highly unusual event ( such as a JJ meteor hitting the Atlantic Ocean ) caused a JJ tsunami that hit Florida , the devastation MD be absolutely unimaginable . Most NNS do n’t realize this , but almost the entire bottom half of Florida is just barely above sea level . If a JJ tsunami did hit Florida , there MD be nothing to stop it from sweeping across the entire NN … NNP Florida has CD JJ problems . The JJ is its remarkably JJ topography . Half the area that surrounds Miami is less than five NNS above sea level . Its highest natural elevation , a limestone ridge that runs from Palm Beach to just RB of the city , averages a scant 12 NNS . With just three NNS of sea - level rise , more than a third of southern Florida will vanish ; at six NNS , more than half will be gone ; if the seas rise 12 NNS , NNP Florida will be little more than an isolated archipelago surrounded by abandoned buildings and crumbling overpasses . And the waters wo n’t just come in from the east – because the region is so JJ , rising seas will come in nearly as fast from the west too , through the Everglades . RB worse , NNP Florida sits above a vast and porous limestone plateau . “ Imagine Swiss cheese , and you ’ll have a pretty good idea what the rock under southern Florida looks IN , ” VBZ Glenn Landers , a senior engineer at the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers . This means NN moves RB easily – it seeps into yards at high tide , bubbles up on golf courses , flows through underground caverns , corrodes building foundations from below . “ Conventional sea walls and barriers are not effective here , ” VBZ Robert Daoust , an ecologist at ARCADIS , a Dutch firm that specializes in engineering solutions to rising seas . Of course the authorities do all that they can to play down this potential threat . They VBP that it is “ highly unlikely ” that a tsunami will ever hit Florida . The following comes from the Florida Department of NNP Protection … Although it is highly unlikely that a tsunami will impact Florida , it is not impossible . Floridians MD RB travel to locations where tsunamis are more likely . It is vital to VB ( and instruct NNS ) that if the ocean suddenly recedes from the shore do not stand and stare . It is necessary immediately to run uphill or away from the shore and VB to the highest location possible which MD mean up the stairs of a substantial building . Everyone should be aware that no matter where in the NN they are , if the sea is observed to recede from the shore , they should immediately run for high ground . That last part is quite funny . There is no “ high ground ” until you VBP to NNP Florida . If a mega - tsunami strikes , there is VBG to be no place to hide . And JJ tsunamis do happen in the Atlantic Ocean from NN to NN . For example , National Geographic VBZ that there have been 37 verified tsunamis in the Caribbean since 1498 … In recent NNS , there have been some NNS that have been concerned about what MD happen if there was a major earthquake in the Caribbean region or a volcanic eruption in the Canary Islands . The following comes from CBS NNP … Meteorologist Bart Hagemeyer from the National Weather Service VBZ an earthquake in the Caribbean region is likely to project wave NN more to the NN and less toward Florida . But the direction can vary and much of the outcome depends on the amount of NN released by the earthquake . The highly unlikely tsunami that Florida might keep in mind MD come from across the Atlantic , created by the collapse of a volcano in the Canary Islands off the coast of Africa , VB experts . For NNS , some have thought that the unstable volcanic structures in the Canary Islands MD VB massive tsunamis to slam into the East Coast of the U.S. if they crumbled into the sea . That MD have the potential of a not just a garden - variety of tsunami , but a “ mega - tsunami , ” according to Hagemeyer . So what MD such a “ mega - tsunami ” look IN ? Well , according to Dr. Simon Day and Dr. Steven Ward , it MD produce a wall of NN approximately 164 NNS high … Dr Day , working in conjunction with Dr Steven Ward of the NNP of California , has now produced an updated NN that predicts more accurately the size of the tsunami and the areas it will impact . The NN predicts that after the landslide the tsunami MD travel a distance of almost 155 NNS in just 10 minutes and MD reach the Caribbean and Florida in eight or nine hours . The forecast goes on to predict that a wall of NN 164ft high MD smash into the coasts of the Caribbean and Florida , while Brazil ’s northern coast MD be hit by a wave more than 130 ft high . Personally , however , I am convinced that the much greater potential threat comes from above . According to the NNP of California at Santa Cruz NN , if a massive asteroid were to crash into the Atlantic Ocean it MD produce a JJ tsunami with a wall of NN as high as 400 NNS that MD slam into the east coast of the NNP NNPS … In NN you were wondering , yes , that MD be absolutely catastrophic . Major U.S. cities stretching from the tip of Florida all the NN up to Maine MD essentially be destroyed . The following is an excerpt from an article posted on Modern Survival Blog … 300 NN tsunami MD be the probable devastation of the following major East Coast cities … Portland , ME (~ 50 ′ ) Boston , MA (~ 30 ′ ) NNP Haven , CT (~ 50 ′ ) Bridgeport , CT ( ~ 40 ′ ) NNP York City , NY ( ~ 20 ′ ) Jersey City , NJ ( ~ 30 ′ ) Newark , NJ (~ 50 ′ ) Atlantic City , NJ (~ 10 ′ ) Wilmington , DE (~ 80 ′ ) Philadelphia , PA ( ~ 40 ′ ) Virginia Beach , VA (~ 10 ′ ) Wilmington , NC (~ 20 ′ ) Myrtle Beach , SC (~ 20 ′ ) Charleston , SC (~ 10 ′ ) Savannah , GA (~ 10 ′ ) Daytona Beach , FL ( less than 10 ′ ) West Palm Beach , FL ( less than 10 ′ ) Fort Lauderdale , FL ( less than 10 ′ ) Miami , FL ( less than 10 ′ ) There are countless cities in between these coastal cities . The Eastern Seaboard of the NNP NNPS includes some of the largest metropolitan areas in the NN . Over CD third of the NN ( more than 100 CD NNS ) live along the East Coast . Evacuation MD be virtually impossible for most ( except for the astute who act quickly ) due to only hours notice , probable doubt , and the subsequent immediate gridlock that MD follow . Most NNS MD tell you that the possibility of such a thing is extremely small . But MD it be possible that they are wrong ? At this point , more than 10,000 major near NN objects have been discovered , and about 10 percent of them are CD kilometer or larger in size . And there are JJ more out there that are still undiscovered . In fact , NNS are discovering JJ ones all the NN . Sometimes , astronomers only spot them after they have passed our NN . What is RB more alarming is that the number of “ fireball events ” that are being recorded appears to be greatly increasing . Just check out this chart from the NNP Meteor Society … So why is this happening ? Why are so JJ JJ rocks suddenly flying by so close to our NN ? And what is VBG to happen when a RB JJ rock slams into us CD day ? Please feel free to share what you VBP by posting a comment below … This article was posted : Tuesday , March 25 , 2014 at 6:16 am
