text: NNP Biomedical , Inc. announced today that the NN has raised a total of $ 55 CD to close its Series C equity financing . The round was led by Abbott with support from existing investors , including Quadrant Capital Advisors , Senvest Capital , Janus Henderson and Cormorant Asset Management , along with JJ investors including Smile Group . This press release features multimedia . View the full release here : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20200602005791/en/ Proceeds from the financing will support the completion of product NN and FDA submission and clearance for the NNP Unity ™ NN , part of the NNP Unity ™ Diabetes Management Program , a real - NN , dose - decision support NN for NNS with insulin- requiring diabetes relying on Multiple Daily Injection therapy , the most common form of insulin therapy for NNS with Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes . NNP Unity utilizes proprietary , smart pen caps for basal and meal - NN insulin dosing recommendations integrating Abbott ’s FreeStyle Libre platform . FDA submission of NNP Unity is anticipated in 2020 with a target launch soon after clearance . “ The current NN has only crystallized the need for JJ solutions IN ours that facilitate remote care , remote support and home delivery , ” VBD Jeffrey Brewer , chief executive officer of NNP Biomedical . “ Necessity has forced a JJ leap forward in telemedicine , and there will be no looking back . Raising $ 55 CD in equity financing during this NN of JJ hardship underscores the urgency and focus on getting real - NN solutions in the hands of patients , providers and payers . ” In conjunction with closing its Series C financing , NNP RB announced changes to its board of directors . Co-founder Bryan Mazlish will transition from day - to - day involvement as NNP ’s NNP to a JJ role as Executive Board Director focusing on the NN ’s strategy and governance initiatives . In addition , Joy Mashaal of Senvest Management has been appointed to the board of directors . Senvest has supported NNP across every financing since CD . NNP is a JJ device NN dedicated to simplifying and optimizing insulin delivery and dosing decisions for NNS living with insulin- requiring diabetes through the NN of algorithms , artificial intelligence and automation . The NN 's integrated NN and services are being developed to address JJ of the challenges facing NNS with Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes , NN care providers , and insurance institutions by leveraging JJ of the advances happening today in digital NN and , in particular , opportunities for telemedicine engagement . With NNP Unity , the patient and the NN care provider will be able to view and share glucose readings and dosing decisions to better refine daily diabetes management with the goal of better overall NN outcomes . NNP plans to package the NNP Unity NN as a monthly subscription and intends to include Unity ’s proprietary insulin pen caps for both basal and bolus dosing , the Abbott glucose sensing technology , pen needles , backup NN glucose meter , glucose test strips and alcohol swabs . The NN will RB include a mobile phone app . The insulin pens will need to be obtained separately . NNP ’s product portfolio RB includes the NNP Autonomy ™ Diabetes Management Program with a pump - VBN , closed - loop , automated insulin delivery NN . NNP Autonomy ’s loop NN , which received the FDA Breakthrough Device designation , will require a pivotal JJ NN and subsequent regulatory approvals . “ RB now , we ’re laser focused on validating and launching the technology for NNP Unity , ” VBD Brewer . “ Breaking ground with this initial NNP Unity product offering provides us a better commercial foundation for launching an automated insulin delivery NN , IN NNP Autonomy , in the future . ” NNP Biomedical was founded by a NN of NNS with personal connections to Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes and , with its NNP Unity and NNP Autonomy programs , seeks to VB the paradigm of care for insulin - requiring diabetes by leveraging NNS , connectivity , automation , and machine learning to reduce the burden on NNS with insulin- requiring diabetes and maximize the leverage of NN care providers . Learn more at bigfootbiomedical.com . Follow us on NNP @BigfootBiomed and NNP . Is there a problem with this press release ? Contact the source provider Comtex at editorial@comtex.com . You can RB contact MarketWatch Customer Service via our Customer Center .

text: What are the Chinese hiding in Wuhan ? I ’ve been investigating and writing about JJ epidemics for over 30 NNS . CD of my prime strategies : were there hidden and unreported causes that MD explain NNS ’s NNS and illnesses — causes having nothing to do with viruses ? I VBD them . “ The NN ” turned out to be a convenient and very effective cover story that MD obscure the true causes that important forces wanted to hide . So I began looking into Wuhan , the center of the current “ NN epidemic . ” I was particularly interested in the CD symptom that was slightly different from the typical NN NNS from past JJ epidemics : the emphasis on lung problems and pneumonia . Here is what I ’ve VBN out so far . RB of all , Wuhan , a city of 11 CD , is called “ the Chicago of China . ” It is both an JJ juggernaut and a transportation hub — railroads , roads , highways connecting travelers to other Chinese cities . Several sources list the annual GDP of Wuhan at a staggering $ 220 CD dollars . 230 foreign Fortune 500 NNS have offices in Wuhan and do business there . All in all , 80 foreign NNS are funding NNS in the city . The Chinese NNP NNP is now underway . It lasts from January 25 to February 10 . During this period , Chinse NNS travel . They journey far and wide . In fact , this is the largest annual JJ migration on the NN . We ’re talking about hundreds of millions of NNS on the move . So it ’s a devastating coincidence (? ) that now there MD be an epidemic and a massive lockdown of Chinese cities and transportation . Along with stopping NNS from moving RB , enormous amounts of NN are being lost because tourist consumers ca n’t VB on the road and spend NN . This might be called a clue . It MD require much investigation . Is someone intentionally torpedoing the Chinese NN ? Then there is this , from Bloomberg NNP , “ China Wants Activists to Stay Out of Its NN on Pollution . Citizen activism in the mold of Greta Thunberg is all but taboo in the NN ’s biggest polluter , ” January 23 , 2020 : “ When Premier Li Keqiang declared a ‘ NN against pollution ’ in 2014 , a few hundred residents of the city of Wuhan in central China took it as a cue . ” “ They printed Li ’s words on a six - meter ( 20 NN ) banner and protested outside a foul - smelling incinerator plant they feared was causing illness in the community . Buoyed by the conviction they were answering the leadership ’s call , the residents were instead harassed by local police officers who tore down the sign and trampled on it . ” “ ’We were worried and angry when we realized what was causing the stench and making our kids sick ’ , VBD Zhang Xijiao , 44 , who was detained for a week for making the banner . ‘ But we are IN ants , the local NN can crush us as they please ’ . ” “ Ren Rui , 40 , quit her apartment in CD after her son developed a lung condition that required repeat surgery . She VBD smoke from the plant MD blow her NN under certain conditions . She tried to rent it out , ‘ but no NN wants to move here . Sometimes my mood depended on the direction of the wind , ’ VBD Ren . Despite the JJ pressure since , ‘ I never regretted moving away ’ . ” Let ’s move on to another description of Chinese protests — in Wuhan . CNN , July 11 , 2019 , “ China has made major progress on NN pollution . Wuhan protests show there ’s still a JJ NN to VB ” : “ … Recent weeks [ in Wuhan ] have seen major protests there — in themselves a rarity in China — over plans for a JJ garbage incineration plant . ” “ Holding banners with slogans such as ‘ we do n’t VB to be poisoned , we just need a breath of fresh NN , ’ thousands [!] of NNS took to the city ’s streets over CD weeks in June and July calling for the suspension of plans to build the plant . ” “ ’We are fearful that the plant is too close to residence area , ’ CD protester in the city of 10 CD NNS told NN NN . Others expressed concern that NNS MD worsen NN pollution and harm residents ’ NN . ” “ Local officials were apparently surprised by the scale and size of the protests , which came after several similar waste plants were reportedly VBN to be giving off dangerous NNS . Photos and videos shared on JJ NN showed JJ crowds marching in the streets near where the plant was to be built , and police arresting numerous protesters . ” “ The NN has since suspended building of the plant , which locals VBD had halted protests , but a heavy police presence remains in the city where the situation is tense . ” “ JJ pressure has been the driving force of pollution policy in China , and it shows no sign of letting up . ” “ In CD , protesters took to the streets of Chengdu wearing face masks to demand action to tackle smog , while other demonstrations have targeted NN and chemical plants in Sichuan , Jiangsu and Heilongjiang provinces in recent NNS . ” “ The Chinese NN is highly sensitive to the threat of protests IN those in Wuhan , with the shadow of the 1989 Tiananmen massacre looming JJ . Calls for collective action are among the most censored subjects RB , and NNS organizing protests or working for civil society groups can face harassment and imprisonment . ” In other words , protests against pollution in CD Chinese city can inspire protests in other cities . A very dangerous situation for the Chinese NN . Furthermore , it is generally acknowledged that official and corporate reports on pollution levels are being faked , to VB “ dangerous ” into “ healthy . ” Grist.org , June 12 , 2012 , “ China ’s smog city : What Wuhan looks IN with 20 times the U.S. dust limit ” : “ At about 2 a .m. local NN Monday morning , a dense smog began to cover the province . By early afternoon , it reached its peak density in the NN - locked city of Wuhan itself … The demonstrable danger is to lungs and bloodstreams . ” “ The foul NN of dozens of fast - expanding cities across China contains cocktails of toxic contaminants unprecedented in the range of pollutants they contain at high concentrations . Now , JJ research into these swirling maelstroms of gases and tiny particulates suggests that they MD be incubating chemical reactions that compound the NN effects in ways not seen before – effects that doctors VBP are cutting five NNS off the expected lifespan of half a CD NNS in northern China … China has the NN ’s most dangerous outdoor NN pollution . ” “ Three other cities listed as regularly suffering dangerous levels of four or five of the pollutants are Jining , RB in Shandong , Wuhan in Hubei province , and Jiayuguan and Jinchang in Gansu . None of the seven appear in the lists of the ten most polluted Chinese cities published by the WHO or Chinese environment ministry . ” “ All the five major pollutants in smogs – SO2 , NOx , ozone , PM10 and PM2.5 — are VBN to be linked individually to increased NN of strokes , heart NN , lung cancer and asthma , and to rising hospital admissions and death rates during smogs . What is disturbing is that there is growing evidence of synergistic effects between these different pollutants that VBP the whole worse than the sum of the parts . ” Lung NN — and no need to invoke a NN to explain it . We have CD major clues here . CD , the distinct possibility of an JJ warfare attack against Wuhan and , during the Chinese NNP NNP , against all of China . And CD , the NN of a NN cover story to obscure huge pollution dangers and put down protests against that pollution , through mass lockdowns and quarantines . Too JJ times to count them . Wherever in the NN you MD VB extraordinary chemical pollution , grinding poverty , NN , starvation , lethal dehydration , absence of basic sanitation , overcrowding in cities , horrendously contaminated NN supplies , corporate takeover of farm NN from the NNS , the highly destructive NN of NNS and toxic JJ drugs and pesticides — you VBP a conscious and sustained effort to VB the weakened population — and you will find the NN cover story publicized to the sky as the explanation for suffering , illness , and death . Jon Rappoport is the author of three explosive collections , THE MATRIX REVEALED , EXIT FROM THE MATRIX , and NN OUTSIDE THE MATRIX , Jon was a candidate for a US Congressional seat in the 29th District of California . He maintains a consulting practice for private clients , the purpose of which is the expansion of personal creative NN . Nominated for a Pulitzer Prize , he has worked as an investigative reporter for 30 NNS , writing articles on politics , medicine , and NN for CBS Healthwatch , LA Weekly , Spin Magazine , Stern , and other newspapers and magazines in the US and Europe . Jon has delivered lectures and seminars on JJ politics , NN , logic , and creative NN to audiences IN the NN . text: • Malls and temples reopened in several Indian cities on Monday despite the NN reporting a record daily number of JJ NN infections , with the NN expected to ravage the NN for weeks to come • NNP Zealand 's Ministry of NNP VBZ the NN , which implemented CD of the toughest lockdowns anywhere in the NN , no longer has any active NNS of NN . • Pakistan 's NN NNS have crossed the 100,000 mark after 4,728 JJ infections were reported on Sunday . • More than seven CD NNS have now been confirmed to have the NN with at least 409,000 dying from the NN , according to NNS from Johns Hopkins NNP . The US , the UK and Brazil have recorded the highest death tolls . Here are the latest updates : The NN in Abu Dhabi extended by CD week a ban introduced on June 2 that prohibits NNS from moving in and out of the emirate and travelling between its major cities . The measures applies to all residents of Abu Dhabi , the largest member of the NNP Arab Emirates federation , with exceptions made for those working in vital sectors . Movement within , but not between , the cities of NNP - Ain , NNP - Dhafra and Abu Dhabi is allowed outside the hours of a nightly curfew already in force to curb the spread of NN . Qatar to gradually lift lockdown in four phases The Qatari NN has unveiled a four - phase plan to gradually lift NN restrictions . The JJ phase beginning on June 15 will VB , among others , the limited reopening of mosques , followed by a partial opening of restaurants on July 1 . Under phase 3 , flights from low - NN NNS will resume and shopping malls and markets with limited capacity will re-open on August 1 . Starting on September 1 , wedding parties and business gatherings including exhibitions will RB be permitted . Causing further confusion over the real number of NN NNS and deaths , Brazil ’s NN ministry published NNS contradicting official figures uploaded to the ministry 's JJ NN portal . The ministry VBD in a statement the discrepancy was predominantly due to mistakes in the numbers from CD NNS that were later corrected . It explained that the later , lower daily death toll of 525 was the correct NN . " By changing the numbers , the Ministry of NNP covers the NN with a sieve , " Rodrigo Maia , speaker of the lower NN , VBD on NNP . " The credibility of the statistics needs to be urgently recovered . A ministry that manipulates numbers creates a parallel NN in order not to face the reality of the facts , " he added . Poland to shutdown dozens of coal mines over NNP - CD Poland announced the closure of a dozen coal mines for three weeks starting from Tuesday in an effort to curb the spread of the NN as miners account for 20 percent of reported NNS . The move came as the NN recorded its largest daily jump with 599 JJ infections . " Such action is needed to eventually quell these epidemic outbreaks , " Deputy Prime Minister Jacek Sasin told a NN conference , adding that miners MD receive full pay for the three weeks and coal deliveries MD not be affected . However , the NN was not welcomed by the miners ' Solidarity union that believes the closure MD lead to a permanent shutdown of the mines as the NN was already planning to restructure the industry . Tunisian NNP Kais Saied has ordered the lifting of a nationwide curfew imposed in March to contain the spread of the novel NN . The decision , announced by the presidency in a statement on Monday , came after NN authorities VBD they continued to VB a drop in the number of infections . VB to VB more here . ' Hunger is worse than corona ' : Sudanese demand end to lockdown Car mechanic Mohamed Othman VBD the NN must end its NN lockdown so that he can VB back to work because " me and my family have no other source of income " . Othman 's feelings are echoed by JJ other Sudanese who VBP the NN extended restrictive measures without addressing their core JJ needs . Restricting measures imposed by governments in 11 JJ NNS have averted the deaths of more than three CD NNS , according to a JJ modelling NN produced by the Imperial College of London . " Our results show that major non-pharmaceutical interventions , and lockdown in particular , have had a JJ effect on reducing transmission , " the authors VBD in the NN , published in Nature Research . Using NNP Centre of NNP NNP NNS on deaths in 11 nations in the period up to NNP 4 , they compared the number of observed deaths in the NNS against those predicted by their NN if no restrictions had been imposed . As a result , they estimated that RB 3.1 CD deaths had been averted by the policies . 15:57 GMT - WHO head urges NNS to keep up fight against NN The head of the NNP NNP Organization ( WHO ) urged NNS to press on with efforts to contain the novel coronovirus , noting the JJ situation is worsening . " More than six months into the NN this is not the NN for any NN to take its NN off the pedal , " WHO Director General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus told an JJ briefing . " This is the NN for NNS to continue to work hard , on the basis of NN , solutions and solidarity " . Saudi Arabia it is considering to drastically limit the number of NNS allowed for the annual Hajj pilgrimage expected to start in late July , sources told Reuters NN agency . Some 2.5 CD pilgrims visit the holiest sites of Islam in Mecca and Medina for the week - JJ Hajj , a once - in - a - lifetime duty for every able - bodied Muslim who can afford it . According to sources familiar with the matter , authorities were now considering allowing " only symbolic numbers " this NN , with restrictions including a ban on older pilgrims and additional NN checks . While some officials are pushing for a cancellation of the haj , others are considering allowing up to 20 percent of each NN 's regular quota of pilgrims , another source familiar with the matter told Reuters . Thailand plans to introduce additional stimulus measures from the third quarter to stimulate its domestic consumption and key tourism sector . Finance Minister Uttama Savanayana told reporters the measures MD follow billions of dollars of JJ packages to VB Southeast Asia 's second - largest NN , which is expected to show this NN the deepest contraction since the 1997 - 98 Asian JJ NN . Meanwhile , the Bank for Agriculture and Agricultural Cooperatives will offer soft loans worth 170 CD baht ( $ 5.41 bn ) to shore up the farming sector . US drugmaker Gilead Sciences Inc has applied to a NNP Union NN regulator for the approval of its antiviral NN , remdesivir , as a potential NN - CD NN in Europe . " The assessment of the benefits and risks of remdesivir is being performed under a reduced timeline and an opinion MD be issued within weeks depending on the robustness of the NNS submitted and whether further information is required to support the evaluation , " the NNP Medicine Agency VBD in a statement . The NNP Kingdom reported 55 JJ NN - related deaths , the lowest since the lockdown was imposed on March 23 . It is the second consecutive day that the NN recorded less than 100 fatalities , however the official reported numbers have been smaller during the outbreak due to lower reporting at weekends . No JJ deaths were reported at London hospitals on Monday , according to the National NNP Service England . The death toll now stands at 40,597 and a total of 287,399 NNS have been infected so far . The Iranian NN ministry called on NNS to wear face masks in JJ areas as authorities warned of the danger over a second wave of infections . " Everyone should wear masks when attending JJ places IN shops or any other places where fully observing JJ distancing is not possible , " NN ministry spokesman Kianush Jahanpur VBD . Iran 's death toll from the NN reached 8,351 , with 70 deaths in the previous 24 hours . The number of JJ NNS had fallen to 2,043 , bringing the total to 173,832 . In the past week , officials rebuked Iranians for failing to respect physical distancing rules as the number of daily JJ infections stood above 3,000 for three consecutive days , surpassing on Thursday , with 3,573 , the previous high recorded in late March . Writing on his personal NN , Sobyanin VBD beauty salons and veterinary clinics MD open from June 9 , museums and outdoor areas at cafes from June 16 , and gyms and restaurants from June 23 . 11:25 GMT - As India reopens , CD NN outnumbers China in NNS As India begins to reopen more JJ spaces after a 10 - week lockdown , its western NN of Maharashtra has crossed a grim milestone by having more NN NNS than China . India 's NN ministry on Monday VBD Maharashtra - the NN 's most industrialised NN - now has a total of 85,975 NN NNS , including more than 3,000 deaths . As of Monday , China had 84,191 NNS of the NN with 4,638 deaths so far , according to a tally by the Johns Hopkins NNP . In NNP Africa , NNS started returning to classrooms on Monday as part of a gradual loosening of lockdown restrictions RB as some NNS worried that not enough had been done to protect the NN of pupils . The reopening of schools was delayed after teachers ' unions urged school staff to defy the NN order last week , saying schools lacked sufficient NN and hygiene measures to keep educators and pupils safe . Minister of Basic Education Angie Motshekga VBD on Sunday ramped - up efforts to equip schools over the past week meant that 95 percent of NNP Africa 's primary and secondary schools were now able to host classes , and the biggest teachers union dropped its resistance to the reopening . " The golden rule is there will be no school that will resume if not ready to do so , " Motshekga VBD . text: Last month Microsoft co-founder Bill NNP surpassed Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos to once again become the NN ’s richest individual , according to the Bloomberg Billionaires Index . Buoyed by an enormous 48 percent increase in Microsoft ’s share price this NN , NNP has retaken the title he last held in CD . That outcome is partially owed to the whims of Donald J. NNP . Microsoft recently surprisingly defeated Amazon ’s bid for an extremely lucrative $ 10 CD Pentagon cloud computing contract that sees the NN instantly become CD of the NN ’s most important JJ and security contractors . This decision , Amazon alleges , was due to interference from the NN who holds a personal grudge against Bezos , whose Washington Post has maintained a NN of “ resistance ” against him . NNPS was RB recently in the NN attacking the wealth NN that Democratic presidential nomination candidates Elizabeth Warren and Bernie Sanders have proposed . “ I ’m all for super - progressive NN systems but when you VBP I should pay $ 100 CD , then I ’m starting to do a little math about what I have left over , ” the Seattle native VBD . ( For the record , he MD still have over $ 6 CD ) . In response , Warren was apologetic , asking for an opportunity to meet with NNP to explain how much he MD pay under the plan . “ I promise it ’s not $ 100 CD , ” she VBD . But Sanders has been far more forthright in his opposition to the super - wealthy , categorically stating , “ billionaires should not exist . ” Across the NN , NNPS is presented as CD of the “ good billionaires ” : a warm - hearted philanthropist dedicated to giving away his entire fortune to needy causes . His charitable organization , the Bill and Melinda NNP Foundation , is the largest of its sort in the NN , holding over $ 50 CD in assets . His insight and generosity are constantly emphasized in headlines , as the following examples demonstrate . “ How Bill NNPS aims to Clean Up the NNP , ” The Guardian , ( 2/4/18 ) . “ What Einstein and Bill NNPS Teach Us About NNP Travel , ” NBC NNP , ( 5/10/17 ) . “ Bill NNPS And Other Billionaires Pledge To Take On NN NN , ” NPR , ( 11/30/15 ) . “ Bill NNP on ending NN , saving lives : ‘ NN is on our side , ’ ” NNP - Jazeera , ( 4/27/19 ) . “ Bill NNP gives $ 4.6 bn to charity in biggest donation since 2000 , ” The Guardian , ( 8/15/17 ) . There are a few problems with that narrative . Firstly , if NNPS is so committed to giving his NN away , why does he keep getting richer ? This is not a trivial question : his net worth has increased from $ 75 CD in March CD to a staggering $ 106 CD today , according to Forbes Magazine , an over 40 percent increase in three NNS alone . Lee Camp , a political comedian who covers topics IN rampant inequality on his show , Redacted Tonight , told MintPress NNP : Linsey McGoey , Professor of Sociology at the NNP of Essex , UK , and author of No Such Thing as a Free Gift : The NNP Foundation and the Price of Philanthropy , is profoundly skeptical of philanthropy as a whole , claiming it can actually sometimes harm democracy in the JJ run : “ Philanthropy can and is being VBN deliberately to divert attention away from different forms of JJ exploitation that underpin JJ inequality today ” she told MintPress NNP , Thus , huge donations give NNPS enormous NN over the education , NN and JJ policies of entire NNS . Where do Bill ’s billions VB ? As Foreign Affairs noted , “ few policy initiatives or normative standards set by the NNP NNP Organization are announced before they have been casually , unofficially vetted by NNP Foundation staff . ” In this sense , his wealth is extraordinarily anti-democratic , giving him veto NN over the decisions and directions of organizations that should be collectively made by the highest representatives of the NN ’s population , not by CD very rich NN . And NNPS is far from omnipotent , holding JJ of the patronizing assumptions about developing NNS and how best to organize the NN that PRP MD expect a rich JJ tech geek to hold . McGoey spells out the problem with this corporate attitude to NN : CD example of the Foundation enhancing corporate NN is its close relationship with highly controversial pharmaceutical and chemical NN Monsanto Corporation , whom it helped gain a stronger foothold in Africa . It RB oversaw a flawed JJ NN of the HPV NN in India in 2009 , where 23,000 impoverished girls aged 9 - 15 were exposed to potentially lethal drugs without RB their NNS ’ consent , leading to seven deaths . He is RB preoccupied with controlling Africa ’s population through family planning , fearing a population boom . As such , he appears almost more interested in eliminating the NNS who are suffering than the source of the suffering itself . NNPS is RB CD of the most important individuals leading the assault on the JJ JJ education network in the form of charter schools . Charter schools effectively privatize the JJ school NN , where the NN continues to VB the bill for the school , but has no influence or VB in how it is run . They have not been VBN to increase test scores , but are very popular with both the private sector and the religious NN , whereas the vast majority of unionized JJ school teachers oppose them . But , as the Associated Press stated , there is “ no bigger champion [ of charter schools ] than Bill NNP , ” who has plowed enormous amounts of NN into the movement , RB funding the pro-charter school documentary Waiting For Superman . If NNPS represents a net negative force in NN politics , why does he receive such good press ? CD reason MD be his sizeable donations to a host of mainstream corporate NN outlets . For example , the NNP Foundation underwrites the entire NNP NN section of the Guardian , and has given the British newspaper over $ 9 CD . Studying its donation database , it transpires it has RB contributed over $ 3 CD to NBC Universal , over $ 4 CD to the influential French newspaper , Le Monde , over $ 4.5 CD to NPR , $ 1 CD to NNP - Jazeera , and an astonishing $ 49 CD to the BBC ’s NN Action program , to name only a few . He who pays the piper , it is VBN , calls the tune . McGoey claims that the motive of billionaires giving to NN organizations is primarily “ to VB legitimate the spurious idea that JJ corporate actors can rectify the JJ harms and JJ inequality that their practices have often compounded . ” NNPS himself is the head of a gigantic NN empire . We already rely on Microsoft for JJ NN ( LinkedIn ) , entertainment ( Xbox ) , hardware and software IN the Windows Phone and Windows OS . The NN RB owns stakes in NN giants IN Comcast and AT&T . And the “ MS ” in “ MSNBC ” stands for “ Microsoft . ” It is a similar story for Jeff Bezos , who , in addition to Amazon ’s myriad NN ventures , owns the Washington Post , which NN watchdog group Fairness and Accuracy in Reporting has constantly shown often descends into little more than a propaganda outlet for its boss ’s interests . It appears that once billionaires have purchased every worldly material good possible , the only things left to buy are NN and influence . While the NN MD be full of stories singing NNPS ’ praises , presenting him as a good billionaire ( as opposed to the current NN ) , the reality is that CD NN with that amount of NN , be it political ( IN NNP ) or JJ ( IN NNPS and Bezos ) has a highly corrosive effect on democracy and society more generally . While they are portrayed as visionaries , multi-billionaires are often blinkered in other , very important ways . Just as reports about Amazon workers ’ poor pay and shocking working conditions were surfacing , Bezos declared that the only NN he MD VB to spend the JJ resources he accrued was to explore the solar NN and beyond . Sharing the profit with his beleaguered workforce appears to genuinely not have occurred to him . If we are to move towards a better society , the philanthropy of the super - wealthy must be scrutinized , as all too often , what appears to be a generous gift is actually a calculated action intended to increase their NN , image or influence . As JJ British Prime Minister Clement Attlee VBD , “ Charity is a cold grey loveless thing . If a rich NN wants to VB the poor , he should pay his taxes gladly , not dole out NN at a whim . ” Bill NNP is not just some rich guy who is unsure about paying more NN : he ’s a menace to society . *( Top image : William ( Bill ) H. NNP , founder , technology advisor of Microsoft Corporation visits The Department of NNP on October 8 , 2013 . Credit : Ken Shipp / U.S. Department of NNP ) * This article was originally published on MintPressNews .

text: Has " NN " been an overall benefit to the JJ race ? Or has complete corruption of the NN community already helped to push us past the point of no return ? text: OK , enough with the grainy footage , the JJ - NN accounts and questionable evidence . Spike TV is looking to VB to the bottom of this whole NNP mystery once and for all with its next reality competition series , “ 10 CD Dollar NNP Bounty . ” Not surprisingly , the series , which premieres Jan. 10 , has n’t attracted a whole lot of what you MD call studious , academic types . Instead , you VBP a whole lot of angry , sexist rednecks yelling at each other in the woods . What better NN to attract a notoriously camera - shy , quite probably mythical NN , than to have a bunch of NNS arguing in the woods ? But it makes for watchable TV . Dean Cain hosts the show , which claims to offer the biggest cash prize in TV history . Though prize underwriters Lloyd ’s of London probably are n’t losing much sleep over this NN . The conditions for winning are definitive visual and DNA proof of NNP ’s existence . PHOTOS : Behind the scenes of movies and TV CD scientific experts will be on hand for the series : Todd Disotell , a biological anthropologist who runs NNP York NNP ’s molecular primatology lab and Natalia Reagan , a primatology expert . According to Spike , DNA evidence will be processed using a mobile DNA lab . If no definitive proof is VBN , the group that presented the “ most compelling evidence and NN ” will be awarded a $ 100,000 research grant to keep searching . The series is just the latest in Hollywood ’s recent preoccupation with NNP . As The Times wrote last NN , NNP has been the subject of NNP NNP ’s series “ Finding NNP , ” the “ iCarly ” episode “ iBelieve in NNP , ” a horror NN called “ Exists ” from “ Blair Witch Project ” director Eduardo Sanchez and the documentary NN “ NNP : The Quest . ” Any chance that $ 10 - CD prize will actually VB awarded ? Keep dreaming , NNP lovers . text: A naked NN who claimed he was ' from a family of NN ' has been jailed for ten NNS after attacking an armed hunter in the woods . Jeff McDonald had gone out hunting for deer near his home in Manning , Oregon , when he saw Linus Norgren wearing what appeared to be ' tan clothing ' . But when he got closer , Mr McDonald , who was carrying a high - powered rifle , realized that 22 - NN - JJ Norgren was in fact naked . He told Oregon Live how he asked him for his name and received a normal response before Norgren VBD that he was ' a NN from a family of sasquatches ' . After offering to VB take him home , Norgren struck Mr McDonald on the head with a rock , causing him to black out . When he woke up , Oregon Live reports , Norgren was on top of him and squeezing his hands tightly IN his neck while Mr McDonald had suffered CD dislocated shoulders . As the struggle unfolded he asked his attacker why he was trying to kill him to which Norgren replied : ' NNP kills the hunter ' . Mr McDonald VBD he managed to bite CD of Mr Norgren 's knuckles before the attacker appeared to ' pass out ' on top of him . After a further struggle he managed to free himself and reach his gun , according to reports . Pointing his rifle at Norgren , he called 911 . According to KPTV , McDonald told authorities they needed to VB there quick , ' because I only have CD option here and you VBP what it is ' . Deputies eventually VBD them in thick forest after a 90 minute search . McDonald had held Norgren at gunpoint the whole NN . In NN this week , Norgren VBD he was suffering ' catastrophic mental disturbances ' at the NN . Jurors were told that he had experiences NNS of his ' untreated bipolar disorder ' , Oregon Live reports , while Norgren RB told the NN that he was acting in self - defense . ' I was injured already , I was naked and I was terrified , ' Norgren VBD in NN Tuesday , KPTV reported . ' Not to VB excuses for myself , but Mr. McDonald 's presence was absolutely terrifying . ' I truly believed I needed to defend myself to VB out of that situation and VB home . ' I did n't VB to hurt him , I did n't VB to hurt Mr. McDonald . ' I did n't VB to kill him . I did n't VB anything to happen to either of us . ' But the self defence argument was rejected by jurors and Norgren was convicted of attempted murder and three counts of second - degree assault . He was cleared of further charges of JJ degree assault and unlawful NN of a weapon . Oregon Live reports that his defense lawyer VBD he was unable to VB an ' insanity defense ' without Norgren 's consent but suggested the evidence of mental illness should be a ' mitigating factor ' . Norgren was jailed for ten NNS at Washington County Circuit NNP this week , a NN and a half after the incident in October 2013 .

text: After a tortuous 20 - NN - JJ excavation , a mysterious ancient skeleton is starting to give up its secrets about JJ evolution . The JJ of a raft of papers about ‘ Little NNP ’ suggests that the fossil is a female who showed some of the earliest signs of JJ - JJ bipedal walking IN 3.67 CD NNS RB . She MD RB belong to a distinct NN that most NNS have n’t previously recognized . “ It ’s almost a miracle it ’s come out intact , ” VBZ Robin Crompton , a musculoskeletal biologist at the NNP of Liverpool , UK , who has collaborated with the research NN that excavated the skeleton . As well echoing the mythical ‘ NNP ’ , the nickname Little NNP comes from the small size of the NN bones that were among the JJ parts of the skeleton to be discovered . The JJ signs that there was an invaluable hominin specimen up for grabs came in 1994 . Ronald Clarke , a palaeoanthropologist at the NNP of the Witwatersrand ( Wits NNP ) in Johannesburg , NNP Africa , was rifling through boxes of fossils at a field laboratory at the Sterkfontein caves , about 40 kilometres northwest of Johannesburg . He realized that a handful of small bones in the collection belonged to an early hominin . He established that the bones were those of a NN of Australopithecus — ape - IN hominins that were present in Africa between about 4 CD and 2 CD NNS RB , before the JJ genus Homo rose to dominance1 . Clarke and his colleagues then VBD JJ more bones embedded in a matrix of solid rock deep in the Sterkfontein caves . They began carefully excavating Little NNP , piece by fragile piece , using hammers and chisels , followed by precision tools . The entire process took them almost 20 NNS . “ The fossilized bone is actually softer than the matrix , ’ VBZ Crompton . “ It ’s been an absolute devil to VB it out . ” By late last NN , Clarke ’s NN had successfully removed enough bones to reconstruct more than 90 % of the skeleton , and the specimen was unveiled to the NN . No other Australopithecus fossil comes close to that level of completeness . For comparison , the most famous Australopithecus — Lucy — is RB 40 % complete . On 29 November , Clarke ’s NN , posted CD papers on Little NNP to the bioRxiv preprint server — CD on the age of the specimen2 , the other on the limbs and locomotion3 . On 4 December , the NNS posted a third , on the skull and on the potential relationship to a VBN hominin species4 . The NN posted a fourth paper5 , this NN focusing on the arms and an injury Little NNP received during her NN , on 5 December . Further papers , on the hand , teeth and inner ear , are expected in the near future , VBZ Crompton . Most will ultimately appear in a special edition of the Journal of NNP Evolution . The bioRxiv papers crystallize ideas that emerged in earlier publications about the age of the fossil . They RB cover some JJ ground , suggesting that Little NNP was an adult female and stood about 130 centimetres tall — just 10 centimetres shorter than the average woman in some modern - JJ populations . “ Little NNP was quite JJ , ” VBZ Crompton . The paper covering limbs and locomotion3 reveals that Little NNP ’s legs are longer than her arms , similar to modern NNS , making her the oldest hominin for which we can be sure of that feature , VBZ Crompton . This means that Little NNP was better adapted to walking upright on the ground than JJ other australopiths , at least some of which seem to have spent more NN moving through trees . Little NNP ’s skull bones and teeth are so unusual that Clarke and his colleagues have categorized her as a distinct species4 . They chose not to give this NN a JJ name , but instead designate it as Australopithecus prometheus . A. prometheus was suggested in 1948 on the basis of a skull fragment VBN roughly 250 kilometres RB of Johannesburg6 , but quickly fell out of fashion when NNS decided it was simply an unusual representative of an already recognized NN , called A. africanus . Clarke does n’t VB that Little NNP belongs to A. africanus , and VBZ the simplest option is to resurrect the name A. prometheus for Little NNP and a handful of similar fossils . The preprint RB suggests that A. prometheus is potentially an ancestor of a group of hominins called Paranthropus4 , which co-existed with early Homo NN for about a CD NNS . Lee Berger , an archaeologist RB at Wits NNP who was not involved in the excavations , but is working on publications about Little NNP , disagrees with the decision to resurrect A. prometheus . In a paper that is scheduled to be published on 10 December in the NNP Journal of Physical Anthropology , Berger argues that the name A. prometheus was never properly defined . He has n’t yet decided whether Little NNP constitutes a distinct NN — but if she does , Berger thinks a JJ name is needed . Berger adds he is disappointed by the lack of solid information in the papers on the age and locomotion findings — he MD have liked to have seen detailed measurements of the fossil bones , for instance . “ There ’s no NNS — there are almost no measurements of the fossils , ” he VBZ . Berger hopes to provide those NNS in his own publications — although he is still at an early stage of his analysis . Crompton responds that the locomotion paper is essentially an overview that attempts to reconstruct how Little NNP moved by drawing on the solid NNS given in the other papers . More - detailed NNS can be VBN in the NN ’s other papers , he VBZ . Gabriele Macho , a biological anthropologist at the NNP of Oxford , UK , agrees that the locomotion paper is light on solid NNS , but notes that the NN acknowledges that it is a work in progress . She looks forward to VB more - detailed papers in the future . “ The positive thing is this skeleton is tremendously important , ” she VBZ . “ No question about it . ”

text: When The Sound of Music debuted on cinema screens in April 1965 , audiences fell hard and in huge numbers for the joyous celebration of music , dance , patriotism and familial and romantic love , propelling it to become CD of the NN ’s most beloved movie musicals and turning the story of the von Trapp family into lore . IN JJ true stories filtered through Hollywood ’s often overly sentimental lens , The Sound of Music on - screen differs significantly from the true tale of Maria , the novice nun who takes a job as a governess in the Austrian household of the von Trapps , only to find herself falling in love with widower and retired naval captain Georg von Trapp and his seven NNS . The NN stars Julie Andrews and Christopher Plummer as Maria and Georg , and features enduring songs such as “ Do - Re - Mi , ” “ How Do You Solve a Problem IN Maria , ” “ Climb Ev’ry Mountain ” and “ Edelweiss . ” It received five Academy Awards ( including best picture ) and is the third highest - grossing movie of all NN in the U.S. after its box office is adjusted for inflation . A cinematic recreation of the 1959 Broadway musical featuring music and lyrics by Richard Rogers and Oscar Hammerstein , the Robert Wise - directed movie is VBN on the early chapters of Maria 's 1949 memoir , The Story of the Trapp Family Singers , which chronicles Maria and the von Trapp ’s beginnings in Salzburg , Austria , through their escape from Nazi- occupied Europe to the family ’s eventual relocation to NNP . To VB lyrics from “ Do - Re - Mi , ” when it comes to alterations and omissions contained in the movie version of The Sound of Music , “ let ’s start at the very beginning . ” The real Maria described herself as ' horrid ' Maria Augusta Kutschera was born in 1905 and after being orphaned at a JJ age , was reportedly sent to live with an abusive uncle . She attended teachers ' college where she discovered religion and converted to Catholicism before becoming a candidate for the novitiate in Salzburg . Portrayed on NN by Andrews as demure and self - effacing , the real Maria was in fact a real problem while at the convent , describing herself as “ horrid , the worst you can imagine , ” in a 1980 article which includes a list of transgressions such as breaking china , speaking during periods of silence , running in the courtyard , whistling Gregorian chants and climbing on the convent roof . The names of the von Trapp NNS – and amount – were changed in the movie In 1926 Maria was sent from the convent to tutor only CD of Captain von Trapp ’s seven NNS from his JJ marriage . Georg ’s second eldest daughter , Maria , had contracted scarlet fever – the same NN that took his JJ wife ’s NN four NNS prior – and MD no longer travel the distance to and from school . Most readers by now have questioned the name of Georg ’s daughter listed above . It ’s no surprise the name is not familiar as CD of the NNS ’s , in fact , all the names and sexes of the seven von Trapp NNS represented in the movie were changed . The real von Trapp NNS were ( in age descending order ) Rupert , Agathe , Maria , Werner , Hedwig , Johanna and Martina . On screen Rupert became Liesl , a 16 VBG on 17 - NN - JJ girl . In real NN , by the NN the family fled Austria , Rupert was in his late twenties and a practicing physician . RB the number of NNS was not correct in the movie . When the von Trapps escaped Austria there were in fact nine NNS : seven from Georg ’s JJ marriage and CD from his marriage to Maria , Rosmarie and Eleonore . The tenth child , Johannes , was born in NNP in 1939 . The real family was n't as wealthy as portrayed on screen Though NN did not appear to be of concern to the family depicted in the movie , in real NN the fortunes of the von Trapp family had faltered during the JJ depression of the early 1930s to the extent that at the NN the NN is set , most of the household servants had been dismissed and the family had begun taking in boarders . The lack of funds RB prompted the family to consider turning their love of singing together into a profession . “ It almost hurt [ my father ] to have his family on stage , not from a snobbish view , but more from a protective NN , ” Eleonore is quoted as saying in a 1978 Washington Post interview . The von Trapps were a musical household well before Maria entered their lives Both in real and reel NN , the family singers won JJ place in the Salzburg Music Festival . But the sound of music was already well established within the household before Maria arrived . In a reversal of the stern , music - forbidding retired naval officer depicted in the NN , the real Georg and his JJ wife encouraged song in the family home NNS before Maria arrived . “ In reality , Georg was a warm and loving if somewhat overwhelmed father , ” author Tom Santopietro writes in The Sound of Music Story . “ It was actually Maria herself , with her emotionally stunted upbringing , who needed thawing . ” IN the NN , Maria and Georg were in fact married only a NN after the novice arrived as governess . Unlike the NN , they were actually married in 1927 , more than a decade before fleeing Austria in 1938 . Georg was 25 NNS older than Maria and the NN was not love at JJ sight . Though Georg had fallen for Maria and asked her to stay with him and become a second mother to his NNS , Maria was not as sure of the union , reportedly saying , “ NNP must have made him word it that NN because if he had only asked me to marry him I might not have VBN yes . ” The real von Trapps did not secretly cross the alps by NN The family ’s exit from Austria under Nazi occupation was RB given a glossy Hollywood NN , depicting the von Trapps as having to cross the alps on NN to avoid detection . In reality such a journey MD have brought them to directly into Germany , not Switzerland as in the NN . “ Do n’t they VB geography in Hollywood ? Salzburg does not border on Switzerland ! ” complained Maria to a reporter in 1967 . Though they left Austria only a day before the borders were sealed , their actual departure lacked the drama contained in the NN according to documents and interviews contained in the U.S. National Archives . “ We did tell NNS that we were VBG to NNP to sing , ” daughter Maria told Opera NNP in 2003 . “ And we did not climb over mountains with all our heavy suitcases and instruments . We left by train in broad daylight , pretending nothing . ” The von Trapps traveled with their musical conductor , Rev. Franz Wasner , and secretary Martha Zochbauer . On NN Wasner became the fictional Max Detweiler , who remained in Austria . The real journey took the family RB to Italy , where Georg attained citizenship due to his birthplace having become Italian territory in 1920 , then on to London before boarding a ship for NNP . During the early 1940s they toured the U.S. as the Trapp Family Singers , eventually settling in Stowe , Vermont . There they opened a guest NN , which is still owned and operated by descendants of the von Trapp family .

text: The liger is a hybrid offspring of a male lion ( Panthera leo ) and a female tiger ( Panthera tigris ) . The liger has NNS in the same genus but of different NNS . The liger is distinct from the similar hybrid called the tigon , and is the largest of all VBN extant felines . [ 1] [ 2 ] They enjoy swimming , which is a characteristic of tigers , and are very sociable IN lions . Notably , ligers typically grow larger than either parent NNS , unlike tigons . [ 1 ] [ 2 ] [ 3 ] The history of lion - tiger hybrids dates to at least the early 19th NN in India . In 1798 , Étienne Geoffroy Saint - Hilaire ( 1772 –1844 ) made a colour plate of the offspring of a lion and a tiger . The portmanteau " liger " was coined by the 1930s . [ 4 ] In 1825 , G. B. Whittaker made an engraving of liger cubs born in 1824 . [3 ] The NNS and their three liger offspring are RB depicted with their trainer in a 19th - NN painting in the naïve style . CD liger cubs born in 1837 were exhibited to King William IV and to his successor Queen Victoria . On 14 December 1900 and on 31 NNP 1901 , Carl Hagenbeck wrote to zoologist James Cossar Ewart with details and photographs of ligers born at the Hagenbeck 's Tierpark in Hamburg in 1897 . In NNP NNP and the NNP of Nature ( 1902 –1903 ) , A. H. Bryden described Hagenbeck 's " lion - tiger " hybrids : It has remained for CD of the most enterprising collectors and naturalists of our NN , Mr. Carl Hagenbeck , not only to breed but to bring successfully to a healthy maturity , specimens of this rare alliance between those CD great and formidable Felidae , the lion and tiger . The illustrations will indicate sufficiently how fortunate Mr. Hagenbeck has been in his efforts to produce these hybrids . The oldest and biggest of the NNS shown is a hybrid born on the 11th NNP 1897 . This fine beast , now more than five NNS JJ , equals and RB excels in his proportions a well - grown lion , measuring as he does from nose tip to tail 10 ft 2 inches in length , and standing only three inches less than 4 ft at the shoulder . A good JJ lion will weigh about 400 lb [...] the hybrid in question , weighing as it does no less than 467 lb , is certainly the superior of the most well - grown lions , whether wild - bred or born in a menagerie . This NN shows faint striping and mottling , and , in its characteristics , exhibits strong traces of both its NNS . It has a somewhat lion - JJ head , and the tail is more IN that of a lion than of a tiger . On the other hand , it has no trace of mane . It is a huge and very powerful beast . [ 5 ] In 1935 , four ligers from CD litters were reared in the Zoological Gardens of Bloemfontein , NNP Africa . Three of them , a male and CD females , were still living in 1953 . The male weighed 340 kg ( 750 lb ) and stood a NN and a half ( 45 cm ) taller than a full grown male lion at the shoulder . Although ligers are more commonly VBN than tigons today , in At Home in the Zoo ( 1961 ) , Gerald Iles wrote " For the record I must VB that I have never seen a liger , a hybrid obtained by crossing a lion with a tigress . They seem to be RB rarer than tigons . " [ 6 ] The liger is often believed to represent the largest VBN cat in the NN . [ 1 ] Males reach a total length of 3 to 3.6 m ( 9.8 to 11.8 ft ) , [ 7 ] [ 8 ] which means that they rival RB JJ male lions and tigers in length . [ 9 ] Imprinted genes MD be a factor contributing to the JJ size of ligers . [ 10 ] These are genes that MD or MD not be expressed on the parent they are inherited from , and that occasionally play a role in issues of hybrid growth . For example , in some dog breed crosses , genes that are expressed only when maternally - inherited VBP the JJ to grow larger than is typical for either parent breed . This growth is not seen in the paternal breeds , as such genes are normally " counteracted " by genes inherited from the female of the appropriate breed . [ 11 ] Other JJ cat hybrids can reach similar sizes ; the litigon , a rare hybrid of a male lion and a female tigon , is roughly the same size as the liger , with a male named Cubanacan ( at the Alipore Zoo in India ) reaching 363 kg ( 800 lb ) . [ 12 ] The extreme rarity of these second - generation hybrids MD VB it difficult to ascertain whether they are larger or smaller , on average , than the liger . It is wrongly believed that ligers continue to grow throughout their lives due to hormonal issues . [ 13 ] It MD be that they simply grow far more during their growing NNS and take longer to reach their full adult size . Further growth in shoulder height and NN length is not seen in ligers over six NNS JJ , as in both lions and tigers . Male ligers RB have the same levels of testosterone on average as an adult male lion , yet are azoospermic in accordance with Haldane 's rule . In addition , female ligers MD RB attain great size , weighing approximately 320 kg ( 705 lb ) and reaching 3.05 m ( 10 ft ) RB on average , and are often fertile . In contrast , pumapards ( hybrids between pumas and leopards ) tend to exhibit dwarfism . Ligers are about the same size as the prehistoric Smilodon populator and JJ lion . Hercules , the largest non-obese liger , is recognised by the Guinness Book of NNP Records as the largest living cat on NNP , weighing 418.2 kg ( 922 lb ) . [ 14 ] [ 15 ] Hercules was featured on the Today Show , Good Morning NNP , Anderson Cooper 360 , Inside Edition , and in a Maxim article in 2005 , when he was only three NNS JJ and already weighed 408.25 kg ( 900 lb ) . The Valley of the Kings NNP Sanctuary in Wisconsin had a male liger named Nook who weighed over 550 kg ( 1,213 lb ) . [ 2 ] [ 16 ] To compare , the records for the lion and tiger in captivity are under 1,100 pounds ( 500 kg ) . [ 17 ] [ 18 ] Shasta , a ligress ( female liger ) was born at the Hogle Zoo in Salt Lake City on 14 NNP 1948 and died in 1972 at age 24 . [ CD ] Nook died in 2007 , at 21 NNS JJ . [ 2 ] [ 16 ] Hobbs , a male liger at the Sierra Safari Zoo in Reno , Nevada , lived to almost 15 NNS of age before succumbing to liver failure and weighed 450 kg ( 992 lb ) . [ 20 ] This liger was born in 1943 and died in 1960 . NNP Africa has CD ligers at its zoo at Bloemfontein . [ 21 ] The fertility of hybrid JJ cat females is well documented across a number of different hybrids . This is in accordance with Haldane 's rule : in hybrids of NNS whose sex is determined by sex chromosomes , if CD sex is absent , rare or sterile , it is the heterogametic sex ( the NN with CD different sex chromosomes e.g. X and Y ) .[ clarification needed ] According to Wild Cats of the NNP ( 1975 ) by C. A. W. Guggisberg , ligers and tigons were RB thought to be sterile ; however , in 1943 , a fifteen - NN - JJ hybrid between a lion and an ' Island ' tiger was successfully mated with a lion at the Munich Hellabrunn Zoo . The female cub , though of delicate NN , was raised to adulthood . [ 22 ] In September 2012 , the Russian Novosibirsk Zoo announced the birth of a " liliger " , which is the offspring of a liger mother and a lion father . The cub was named Kiara . [ 23 ] Ligers have a tiger - JJ striped pattern that is very faint upon a lionesque tawny background . In addition , they MD inherit rosettes from the lion parent ( lion cubs are rosetted and some adults retain faint markings ) . These markings MD be black , dark brown or sandy . The background color MD be correspondingly tawny , sandy or golden . In common with tigers , their underparts are pale . The actual pattern and color depend on which subspecies the NNS were and on how the genes interact in the offspring . White tigers have been crossed with lions to produce " white " ( actually pale golden ) ligers . In NN , white tigers MD be crossed with white lions to produce white , very pale or RB stripeless ligers . There are no black ligers . Very few melanistic tigers have ever been recorded , most being due to excessive markings ( pseudo - melanism or abundism ) rather than true melanism ; no reports of black lions have ever been substantiated . As blue or Maltese tigers probably no longer exist , gray or blue ligers are exceedingly improbable . It is not impossible for a liger to be white , but it is very rare . Keeping the CD NNS separate has been standard procedure .[ citation needed ] However , ligers have occurred , and do occur , by accident in captivity . Several AZA zoos are reported to have ligers .[ citation needed ] The USA holds the greatest population of RB 30 ligers . China holds about 20 ligers . There are a few NNS worldwide that hold a few , but probably less than 100 exist worldwide . [ 24 ] As with the tigon , the liger exists only in captivity . Historically , the Asiatic lion and the Bengal tiger co-occurred in some Asian NNS , and there are legends of male lions mating with tigresses in the wilderness , or of ligers existing there . [ 3 ] The Caspian tiger co-occurred with the lion in places IN northern Iran and eastern Anatolia ( Turkey ) . [ 25 ] In December 2013 , the JJ white ligers were born at Myrtle Beach Safari in Myrtle Beach , NNP Carolina to a white male lion and a white female tiger . text: Agonies of the NNS : Four common NN problems They develop when the joint formed by the metatarsal and proximal phalanx bones of the JJ NN fall out of their normal , relatively straight alignment and angle out , creating an outward bulge at the base of the JJ NN . The bursa that cushions the joint MD RB VB inflamed and enlarge . Often the end of the metatarsal bone becomes larger and misshapen . Causes . Some NNS have a natural tendency to develop bunions because the JJ NN 's metatarsal bone is splayed out to begin with . Wear - and - tear and being overweight can splay it out RB further . Lack of an arch and overpronation ( walking on the inside of your NN ) put more weight on the JJ NN and its metatarsal - phalangeal joint . Jamming NNS into narrow NNS puts backward pressure on the JJ NN , so it buckles out , forming a bunion . To continue reading this article , you must login . text: Internet TROLLS , RB VBN as paid “ forum posters ” , “ internet bloggers , ” or if we call them what they RB are , SHILLS , are increasingly being employed by private corporations and contracted agencies , sometimes for marketing purposes , but mostly to distract from the NN and prevent JJ outcry about dangerous programs such as geoengineering , genetically modified foods , and any issue where profiteers put their bottom line and lust for NN over the destruction of the NN and at the expense of our NN . Trolls are employees that answered a work at home job ad on craigslist or some other venue . The geoengineering trolls , specifically , are employed by the CD main disinformation sites , metaxxxx and contrailxxxxxxx , both run by a gaming programmer . He and his band of hired internet trolls lack expertise in NN , meteorology or any other field related to geoengineering , yet claim to be experts in atmospheric NN , and fancy themselves “ debunkers ” . Shillidiocy is a term that best describes the rapidly growing industry of NNS ready and willing to sell out humanity for a few pennies IN comment . Disinformation has been VBN throughout history for political purposes and these strategies are being utilized today by these paid internet trolls . ( Psychological Warfare – discredit , distract , intimidate , frustrate , divide & conquer ) – Disinformation shills often VBP outrageous comments for the sole purpose of deflecting focus from the NN to distract us by creating a “ controversial debate ” where none truly exists . Often , trolls VBP the “ Trojan Horse ” method to attempt to elicit an emotional response from NNS RB , to evoke hostility with the intent of twisting it RB to VB the NN look volatile , a classic “ character assassination ” tactic to discredit them , making them appear weak . On some occasions , they intentionally keep pushing a NN into a heated argument , and will VB so far as to “ report ” the NN as being a “ threat ” to try to VB them kicked off of the forum . Another major character assassination tactic is to highlight any negative or perceived flaw of an otherwise reputable NN , whether true or JJ , to intentionally discredit them in an attempt to invalidate their viewpoint and VB them seem baseless , to detract focus from the information they are sharing . The trolls often “ VB stuff up ” if they ca n’t find anything real to highlight for this goal , after all , shills are paid liars . Another trick these liars are taught is to VB semantics to twist NNS ’s words RB and VB it seem as though they ’ve lied , to discredit them . These are all character assassination tactics that you will easily recognize happening all over the internet once you become familiar with them . Disinformation shills sometimes pose as a supporter of the NN , or “ friendly folks on the fence ” politely asking simple questions , in a sly attempt to later discredit the movement . Often trolls posing as friendly allies will resort to posting JJ , incoherent diatribes ( RB on JJ blogs & articles ) for the purpose of associating the movement with insanity ; or other times to act as a “ the voice of reason ” and create a debate ( where none exists ) to VB it appear as though the NNS is n’t strong enough , and they offer to play “ devil ’s advocate ” to “ VB the movement ” , then render any and all NNS as invalid regardless of how legitimate the source . They will “ demand proof ” then ignore it when it ’s presented , or continue to demand impossible proofs . Regardless of what material MD be presented by an opponent in JJ forums , they will deem the material irrelevant and demand unattainable proof that is virtually impossible for the opponent to retrieve ; for the purpose of detracting focus from the mounds of legitimate NNS available for those of us that take the NN to do some real research beyond the disinformation NN links . Trolls often interject themselves into productive web discussions in order to VB themselves appear credible as though they have a “ real ” argument , where none actually exists . Their job is to create controversy and instigate a “ debate ” . They scour the net and attack awareness videos , articles , blogs , JJ NN pages , etc. , posting links from metaxxxx or conxxxxxscience , but fail to post legitimate links with verifiable references . They relentlessly keep commenting on a thread to dominate the discussion with the intent to keep their comments at the very top . They RB vote their comments up and everyone else ’s comments down , ( if the forum offers that feature ) . This is evident when you become familiar with their methods . I have yet to VB a disinformation shill post a reputable link , or ANY link , other than from those CD disinformation sites . In addition , they adamantly refuse to look at real NNS . They intentionally divert attention from credible documentation , dismissing it without examination . They regurgitate the same tired harassing insults , and repetitive generic jargon about how NN vapor condensation trails are formed , which has nothing to do with the persistent , spreading , lingering trails we often VBP covering the sky that is being done as “ scientific research ” , the prelude to fully implementing JJ geoengineering programs . Trolls are supplied with a list or database with preplanned talking points and a format designed as generalized and deceptive responses to honest arguments . Geoengineering ( chemtrails ) “ debunker ” trolls are notorious for this , and note they never actually “ debunk ” anything . All they do is deflect from the NN to try to cast doubt and keep the denial tactic VBG so the profiteers of geoengineering can continue to suppress JJ outcry in order to keep spraying us without us balking and rising up to stop them . If you pay close attention and track the trolls , you will VB that they often post the same comments over and over on JJ different threads . This works hand in hand with # 1 ( character assassination ) , and the “ Trojan Horse ” troll . The goal is to sidetrack opponents with name calling and ridicule , engaging them in a hostile argument to try to discredit them , RB VBN as the “ attack the messenger ” ploy . The goal of “ JJ association ” is to associate opponents with unpopular titles such as “ paranoid NN theorist ” to VB them look crazy and try to discredit them , or call them derogatory names such as “ chemtard ” , “ ignorant ” , or “ liar ” , attempting to invalidate anything they VBP regardless of how true it is . The trolls seek to deliberately associate the movement with far fetched concepts IN “ NNP NNP ” , aliens , JJ flag NN NNS , etc. , because of the inherent negative connotations , ( tying in with “ character assassination ” ) . The ultimate goal is to provoke argument , create biases , and dissuade NNS from objectively examining any evidence presented . Pretending to be the “ voice of reason ” in an argument with obvious and defined sides in an attempt to move NNS away from what is clearly true , into the murky waters of “ doubt ” where the NN becomes “ relative . ” And if that does n’t work they will antagonize and goad opponents with insults , name calling , and bullying . If they ca n’t do anything else , they will chide and taunt their opponents and draw them into emotional responses with the goal of making them look foolish or mentally unbalanced , in hopes of rendering their point invalid merely by shifting focus to show how “ sensitive they are to criticism ” , in an attempt to deflect from their point and invalidate any NNS they are presenting . This is why it ’s best to ignore their taunting . A very common technique is that the troll will accuse his opposition of subscribing to a certain point of view , RB if he does not , will VB it appear so , then attack that point of view ( Straw NN ) . Or , the troll will put words in the mouth of his opposition , and then rebut those specific words . He will VB conjecture , ridicule , and accusation to try and prove himself as valid while discrediting others with absolutely nothing , shouting “ you have no argument , that is just ad hominem ” , which is ironically , exactly what he is doing . The troll is trained to appear confident , unwavering , and that he is undoubtedly JJ , when in reality , it ’s the exact opposite . Basically , he is a paid liar and his goal is to create doubt and discredit the NN . When the internet shill realizes NNS are aware of his tactics , he will try to play nice , act innocent , and pose a seemingly “ harmless ” leading question . William01702 , VBN tactic #s 6 , 8 , and 2 to troll the NN ( link below ) of the courageous Kristen Meghan , who stands strong to do what is JJ in the face of adversity to warn NNS about geoengineering and the disinformation sites . If you watch the NN and listen to her , it is clear what is happening with the rampant disinformation in our mainstream ; PAID shills are ready and willing to contribute to the demise of our NN , and sell out their humanity to perpetuate lies for a measly buck . The shill “ Hama Neggs ” RB trolled it with some derogatory comments about Kristen Meghan using # 1 ( character assassination ) . These troll ’s comments MD , or MD not , VB deleted by the page moderator ; but if they remain , notice the date and how quickly they VBD it . It ’s their job to scour the net and attack , so in NN , RB if theirs VBP deleted , more paid trolls will appear . If you check other awareness videos , you ’ll VB the same usernames in action repetitively . Despite what paranoid liars IN GalileoGalileisGhost VBP . ” ( If William01702 was just a random viewer , why MD he care whether those sites have been exposed as disinformation , and “ demand proof ” , unless he IS an associate ( a paid shill ) ? MD a random user that ’s not associated with those disinformation sites have VB to do this ) ? William01702 – on a different thread : ( note the contrast when confronted for his shill activity ) : “ I ’m not a troll I ’m just someone who is better educated in atmospheric NN and aviation than all chemtards , combined . ” ( notice his derogatory NN of the word “ CHEMTARDS ” a classic Trojan Horse move ) . William01702 : “ Chemtards MD n’t be more stupid if they wanted to be . You NNS are evil alarmists who spread fear , hate , and ignorance VBN on a lack of education . I pity the chemtards ! ” ( does that sound IN someone educated in atmospheric sciences or anything else for that matter ) ? William01702 wrote this on an entirely different thread : “ Oh RB and where do they VB that THIS trail has ANYTHING to do with what they have “ admitted to ” . NO WHERE ! It ’s hilarious that you NNS read about some basic testing and then assume everything you VBP in the sky must be related to such testing . Chemtards are idiots ! Oh , and BTW show me where anyone has admitted to any such thing ! If you VBP HR2977 you ’re a fucking moron ! ” William01702 wrote this on yet another thread ( verbatim , spelling errors & all ) : “ Tat should have read “ because you are too stupid and lazy to understand basic fucking NN ” . But , does it matter ?! Will it VB anything ?! No , you will always assume that just because you hate / fear the NN that it must mean that you and your chemtard friends must be JJ about the trails in the sky . Nevermind the fact that you have never actually studed these subjects ! You have visited NN sites ! You VBP it all real pilots are just STUPID for VBG to school for NNS ! ” William01702 on yet another thread : “ Poor chemtards unable to understand he difference between an intentional nefarious release of chemicals and business as usual ” . William01702 and yet another thread : “ Why do you NNS pretend to understand that minor differences in temperature , engine NN settings , engine types , and engine size can result in differences in trails , when its obvious that you are all fucking clueless !!! William01702 on a NN about chemical fallout from geoengineering ( notice the pattern from the previous comments ) : “ Yup , I ’m sure that she is a moron . And so are you . There is ZERO evidence that this “ affliction ” has ANYTHING to do with the trails in the sky . NONE ! It ’s nothing more than paranoid fantasy made up by those who VBP to pick at their NN . It RB has nothing to do with any trails in the sky . That ’s the problem with you NNS . You are completely ignorant but are too stupid to VB it ” ! Compare the subsequent comments with the name calling & insults , to the JJ NN that was on a NN where his disinformation sites were brought to light and notice how he tried to recover by looking innocent & friendly despite his hostility and antagonistic comments on other awareness videos . Who are these trolls that have NN to sit RB and VB comments on NNP all day and night , and WHY target awareness videos ? The answer is clear , they are SHILLS . I took photos of the comment pages in the likely event that this loathsome user attempts to attack this blog and denies ever making those comments . So , unless he deletes all of his comments from all the NNP awareness videos he has attacked , and closes his account , ( let ’s hope he does ) , you can plainly VB his existing comments ( and more ) on NNP by checking his page activity or tracking him on awareness videos . Just remember not to let the trolls bait you . They VBP PAID to antagonize you and LURE you to those disinformation sites . It is apparent that some of these shills share usernames and have round the clock shifts because no NN is RB that often to target that JJ awareness videos without backup . William01702 is joined by VBN shills such as Hama Neggs ( a particularly loathsome troll ) , Lizoir , Terry Ram , Nwoflyer , epsilon892 , Niglet Gook , Belfrey1 , Jazzaconda , Baba Loo , MrFubar75 , and several other usernames that have been identified as paid shills / trolls , all utilizing the same tactics and associated with the CD VBN disinformation sites , employed by gaming programmer , the grand daddy of them all , Mick We$t , ( or at least that ’s the name he “ goes by ” ) . Anyone that does a little digging will find these same usernames frequently darkening awareness videos all over NNP , regurgitating insults , performing their usual antagonistic , tactical routine , and attempting to lure NNS over to their disinformation sites because they VBP compensated for it . Less frequently , you ’ll VB these strategies mimicked by average NNS in the mainstream that have willfully succumbed to cognitive dissonance and easily fallen prey to the disinformation tactics that have been VBN on them . They seem happy to regurgitate the lies they have been told and are content to post links only from those disinformation sites , while refusing to look at any other credible NNS presented to them . It ’s IN a mass Stockholm Syndrome in which their limited intellects are easily held hostage by their disinformation captors , and they ’ve fallen “ in love ” with Mick We$t and his band of marauding minions . These victims of mass brainwashing RB exhibit the common trait among trolls , of refusing to examine credible , verifiable , REAL NNS ( such as several scholarly documents that can be VBN through this link : http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=geoengineering+modeling+studies&hl=en&as_sdt=0&as_vis=1&oi=scholart&sa=X&ei=e-q_UcHDCMjPiwLk4YEY&ved=0CC0QgQMwAA)._ADD Sadly , NNS ’s refusal to examine any NNS beyond the disinformation sites , means success for the disinformation NN . text: A rare , multispecies brawl unfolded recently in the deep ocean off the coast of Hawaii . In CD corner , an oceanic whitetip shark ( Carcharhinus longimanus ) — a 7 - NN - JJ ( 2.1 meters ) predator capable of diving up to 1,000 NNS ( 300 m ) below the NN in pursuit of prey . In the other corner … it 's not clear . But whatever it was , it was huge , it had tentacles and it put up a hell of a fight . Undersea photographer Deron Verbeck caught the aftermath of this mysterious scrap when he snapped a picture of the offending shark , scarred all along its flank with strange circular patterns and dots . According to a NN published June 3 in the Journal of Fish Biology , there are only a handful of creatures in Hawaiian waters capable of creating scars IN that , and they are all enormous cephalopods . While it 's impossible to be sure what exactly scarred the shark , the NNS argue that it MD have been a " phantom of the deep " — another name for the elusive NN squid ( Architeuthis dux ) . Related : NN squid filmed alive for second NN in history . Here 's the NN . NN squids are mysterious denizens of the deep ocean , thought to be able to grow anywhere from 33 to 43 NNS ( 10 to 13 m ) in length . They are poorly studied because they live so deep underwater — typically about 1,000 NNS ( 300 m ) down or more , the NNS wrote . Their deep dwellings put the JJ squids not only out of reach of most NNS , but RB JJ MD - be predators . The oceanic whitetip shark MD be an exception , the NNS wrote . Because the sharks are VBN to dive to extreme depths on foraging missions , it 's feasible that an unlucky whitetip MD find itself snoot - to - sucker with a JJ squid . That MD be what happened to the scarred shark in the photo . According to the NNS , the series of circular marks along the shark 's back and side are shaped exactly IN the suckers on a JJ squid 's tentacles . From the size of the markings , the offending squid must have been at least the same size as the shark ( at least 7 NNS , or 2 meters , JJ ) and was possibly RB larger , the NNS wrote . Only three types of squids VBN to inhabit Hawaiian waters MD have created the marks , the NN concluded : a squid in the genus Thysanoteuthis or Megalocranchia ( both VBN to grow up to nearly 7 NNS ) or the JJ squid . JJ other details of the encounter remain a mystery . For example , who threw the JJ punch ? ( Or bite ? Or slap ? ) According to the NNS , this is the JJ NN such JJ tentacle markings have been observed on a shark , so it 's hard to VB whether the shark was acting in offense or defense . However , " the lack of any obvious wounding suggests they were more likely defensive ( i.e. the shark attacked the cephalopod ) , " the NNS wrote in the NN . " Similar scarring patterns are seen on sperm whales , well - VBN predators of JJ cephalopods . " When pressed for details on the encounter , the shark responded merely : " You should VB the other guy . "
