text: With the round - the - clock British NN coverage of the royal family in the days leading up to the JJ day for Prince Harry and Meghan Markle , it MD be hard not to conclude that this NN 's wedding of weddings is a source of delight for every Briton . But not everyone in Britain remains as excited as the thousands already crowding into Windsor to claim a spot that will allow them to grab a glimpse of the wedding couple and the pomp and circumstance . JJ NN was littered with all kinds of memes deriding the wedding ceremony . Oscar - winning British actress Emma Thompson chimed in , telling a TV interviewer : " There 's not a single thought about it in my head to share with you . " And some viewers are expressing frustration with the incessant focus on the wedding — on the preparations , who 's coming and not , what the couple will wear and what they will eat . The BBC Breakfast show incurred the wrath of some for its all - consuming focus on the royal wedding and its constant and breathless updates . On NNP some viewers grumbled : " Non-stop coverage of the # RoyalWedding on @BBCBreakfast this morning . Thankfully , there 's no other NN happening at all , " CD wrote . Another remarked : " REPORT SOME ACTUAL BL ***Y NN # bbcbreakfast # RoyalWedding . " The activist anti-monarchy group Republic , which wants the monarchy abolished and replaced with an elected head of NN , demanded on its NN Friday that the BBC and other British channels stop celebrating the royal wedding and report in a balanced NN . " The monarchy is a contentious issue . It provides us with a head of NN and lies at the heart of our constitution . This issue must be treated by broadcasters as politics , not entertainment , " VBD Graham Smith of Republic . " The BBC has willfully ignored a string of stories that might put a different complexion on the wedding story . They continue to celebrate and promote the monarchy , not simply report on it . " Republic VBD BBC NN had largely ignored stories about the removal of homeless NNS from streets in Windsor and " widespread criticism " of how much NN the British taxpayer will have to pay for the wedding . It pointed to a poll conducted by YouGov this week that suggested nearly a third of the British NN MD VB to VB the monarchy abolished . The poll showed the Scottish as the least likely to VB the queen or care about the future of the monarchy , with key findings showing that NN of the border with England fewer than half of Scots approve of the queen and most VBP that Britain 's lawmakers should swear allegiance to the NN and not the monarch . Three - quarters of Scots told the pollsters they were not interested in Saturday 's wedding . Royal critics have highlighted the bad NN for the monarchy in the poll . But overall the royal family and the institution of the nonarchy remains popular , with 68 percent of the British NN believing the institution is good for the NN . The poll coincided with an important landmark for the queen , who is now the longest - serving monarch in British history , overtaking Queen Victoria 's reign of 63 NNS , seven months and CD days . Despite the mounting criticism during the week of the JJ costs of Prince Harry and Meghan Markle 's JJ day , the royal family tried to disarm possible criticism early by announcing that they MD meet the costs of the wedding itself . But because they RB receive NN from taxpayers , it was unclear how much of their private NN MD defray the costs . And British taxpayers will still have to VB a huge bill to cover the security and municipal costs . Thames Valley police will be providing most of the security in Windsor . The last royal wedding in 2011 between Prince William and Kate Middleton cost nearly $ 8.7 CD , according to Britain 's Press Association . Some commentators VBD the costs should be lower this NN because the wedding is being held outside London , reducing logistical challenges . British minsters declined to comment on spending related to the royal wedding , saying no information MD be released before the event . But Britain 's Independent newspaper reported Friday that the cost of the JJ event MD be much higher than previously thought . Wedding planning service Bridebook VBD the wedding itself MD most likely cost $ 43 CD . And some security analysts estimated the security bill at $ 40 CD — a JJ jump from the 2011 royal wedding because of heightened threat levels in Britain following a string of terror attacks over the past 18 months . British ministers VBP any JJ NN VBN for the wedding is NN well spent , arguing the event will encourage more tourists — especially Americans — to visit Britain . But no evidence was supplied by the NN to show that that was the NN in 2011 . " These royal weddings epitomize the British monarchy 's fondness for reverse Robin Hood economics , whereby wealth is redistributed from ordinary NNS , via their taxes , to a fabulously rich family that on such occasions appears not very modern , at all ; in fact , it all feels rather feudal , " VBD Patrick Basham , the founding director of the Democracy Institute , a Washington - and London - VBN libertarian NN tank . "

text: There 's no doubt that there 's been a rise in the popularity of marathons and their accompanying half - marathons — especially in recent NNS .﻿﻿ But if you VBP these events are reserved for elite athletes , VB again . There ’s a marathon for everyone — from NNS who just VBP to have a good NN to those seeking an obstacle course . And do n't forget those who are checking races off their bucket lists . These JJ - distance runs are so expensive , NN - consuming , and in - demand that NNS are spending NN on races either for the prestige and the advertising of a permanent corporate sponsorship , or just to VB a simple , lucrative return on investment . But just what are the economics behind marathons ? And where does all that NN VB ? Read on to find out more about the costs associated with these races . The Dollars and Cents of Running a Marathon Marathons are a relatively inelastic good , so RB if the cost to participate goes up , NNS still take part . And they 're normally willing to shell out a lot of cash for the experience . Some of the elite races charge participants different fees from selection lotteries to registration costs . And these charges can be quite hefty . The bigger the race , the bigger the cost . Let 's look at the NNP York City Marathon — CD of the NN 's most coveted races . Prospective participants have to meet certain eligibility criteria before they can be guaranteed entry . The organization holds a selection lottery just for a chance to participate in the actual marathon . Then there 's the registration fee , which depends on your status . U.S. residents who are members of the NNP York Road Runners group pay a $ 255 registration fee . That fee increases to $ 295 for residents who are nonmembers , and to $ 358 for non-U.S. residents .﻿﻿ The costs of putting on a marathon begin to accumulate months before the race actually happens . RB , the organizer has to examine a map and decide where to hold the race . Armed with a meticulously planned - out route , the organizer needs to VB the necessary permits from the city and permission to VB quasi-public spaces and any private property IN parking lots . Once the permits are secure , the organizer needs to consult a USA Track & Field Road Course Certifier about having the distance certified .﻿﻿ After all , no NN wants to be that NN who holds a 25 - mile marathon by mistake . The road course certifier charges a small fee for these services . Finally , it ’s NN to start getting the word out to the NN . Advertising costs can drop dramatically if JJ NN picks up the race . But RB still , organizers will still have to budget for radio , print , and JJ ad NN . Race day is the most expensive part of a marathon . Not only does the course need to be set up with NN tables , food tables , and portable toilets , it all needs to be done by NNS . If no NN volunteers , the event organizer needs to hire and pay its staff for the day . Staffing expenses come on top of the cost of having an on - NN JJ NN in NN of an emergency . This is an important requirement set forth by the insurance policy the race organizer will RB need to buy . And let 's not forget the immense cost of security to ensure crowd NN . According to a Philadelphia half - marathon , the cost to secure a half - marathon with a simple police presence can range between $ 30,000 and $ 120,000 .﻿﻿ The racers who have paid a hefty registration fee to run are RB an expensive part of the race . According to the Washington Post , participation t- shirts , bibs , pins , goodie bags , and medals cost the Marine Corps Marathon about $ 13 IN NN in 2013 .﻿﻿ Smaller races MD have a higher cost IN NN as they can’t benefit as much from economies of scale . Race timing systems are perhaps the biggest hidden cost to the racers . RB consisting of a cheap radio frequency identification ( RFID ) attached to a race bib , a timing NN can cost thousands . Hiring a NN to NN a smaller event can be cheaper in the short term , with machine and chip rentals costing a few dollars IN runner .﻿﻿ The biggest source of revenue for marathons is the entry participation fee . For races organized as charitable fundraisers , high registration fees are n’t a JJ concern as the runner knows that any excess will VB to VB fight breast cancer or to build a JJ school track field . Races run in the name of a charity can attract JJ sponsors who VBP to give back to the community and benefit from supporting a good NN . The Washington Post broke down the cost of hosting a marathon and VBD that for every $ 99 a runner paid to participate , sponsors contributed $ 58 .﻿ ﻿ Corporations are incentivized to organize running events and prestigious marathons because of their popularity . As with all goods , the more popular and in - demand it is , the more an organization can charge . Realistically , the Boston Marathon , London Marathon , and NNP York City Marathon MD double their prices , and although there MD be an outrage , their limited good ( racing spots ) MD be filled by NNS who value the experience enough to pay the inflated costs . Some of the NN 's biggest marathons attract NNS from all over the NN . That means JJ bucks for local economies . For example , roughly 30 % of the drawing applicants accepted to run in the 2020 NNP York City Marathon were international runners .﻿﻿ Runners who come from outside the hosting metropolitan area inject a lot of NN into hotels , food , and entertainment . All of this is true for other less prestigious but uber - popular races . Some popular examples include the Rock n Roll Marathon and Walt Disney ’s ( DIS ) Walt Disney NNP Marathon , as well as Color Me Rad , Tough Mudder , and other running events . Races that belong to the latter category RB have the JJ benefit of being untimed , which leads to more NN for the organizer as well as the city itself . While modern marathon racing is more than a NN JJ , the participation numbers have increased wildly in the past decade . As more NNS embrace the healthy benefits of running , along with its low - cost and minimal barriers to entry , marathon organizers are shaping up to VB their numbers continue to grow each NN .

text: You VBP it 's VBG to be a bad day when you find yourself falling through the NN without a parachute ! In free fall , you fall at about 125 NNS IN hour ( mph ) if you have your arms and legs extended , and at that speed you will travel about 12,000 NNS in CD minute . The JJ thing to do is to look for a NN of NN . If you can dive into NN , it wo n't feel good at 125 mph , but you 'll survive if the NN is deep enough -- at least 12 NNS or so . That ’s why we come back to you with sincerity and with hand on heart to apologise . ” Mbemba RB expressed the same sentiments in his brief statement . The Congolese conceded both goals at set pieces — RB from a corner and then a free kick as Patrick Kaddu and Emmanuel Okwi scored in Uganda ’s JJ win at the finals for more than 40 NNS . text: CD of the perplexing aspects about the 9/11/01 attacks in the NNP NNPS concerns the official story that the Pentagon was targeted by “ terrorists , ” and struck by a commercial jet NNP Airlines Flight 77 , a Boeing 757 . We VBP it was AA Flight 77 because of this convenient piece of “ wreckage ” recovered at the NN : CD of our sources sent over a NN , purportedly from a Pentagon security camera facing the impact NN . The frame paused at 5 seconds appears to show a fast - moving projectile slamming into CD side of the Pentagon from the NN . This object has no wings whatsoever . The logical conclusion is that the object is a missile . After the impact , a fireball quickly becomes thick , gray smoke . At 1:49 the NN cuts to some live - action footage of the Pentagon . This footage was shot from a position opposite from the JJ NN , but still facing the point of impact . However , the JJ NNS on the scene who were n’t JJ responders ( police , firefighters , medics ) VBD no evidence that a plane actually struck the Pentagon . The wreckage did not VB “ forensic sense , ” and raised questions immediately from objective witnesses . The female CNN reporter begins this NN by saying that a certain “ Bob Franken and an eyewitness ” had concluded that the plane landed “ short of the Pentagon ” – meaning it never made it that far . The entire CNN breaking NN segment , which includes the above NN content , is shown in another NNP NN . CNN ’s JJ affairs correspondent Jaime McIntyre VBD no plane RB fell short of the mark . After walking up to the smoldering Pentagon , he observed : “ From my close - up inspection , there ’s no evidence of a plane having crashed anywhere near the Pentagon … The only pieces left …are small enough to pick up in your hand . There are no JJ tail sections , wing sections , fuselage – nothing IN that anywhere RB which MD indicate that the entire plane crashed into the side of the Pentagon and then caused the side to collapse . ” The demolished Pentagon floors did n’t collapse until 45 minutes after impact , and the burn marks were inconsistent with those seen at the WTC Twin Towers in NYC – RB allegedly toppled by mere airplanes . By the NN , in terms of construction physics , the heat generated by the amount of jet fuel on a plane ( VBN on fuel tank capacity , rate of consumption , and NN from take - off ) is not hot enough to “ melt steel , ” as the mainstream NN repeated ad nauseum . The damage seen at the Pentagon crash NN is more consistent with that of a plane crash – but was there RB a plane ? JJ investigators VBP the answer is no . This NN analyzes the damage done to the Pentagon . The affected area measured about 65 NNS wide and 73 NNS tall – the height of the building . The narrator informs : “ From wingtip to wingtip , a 757 is 124 NNS , 10 inches . From nose to tail a 757 is 155 NNS 3 inches in length , and the height is 44 NNS 6 inches . How does a plane of those dimensions [ size ] fit into a hole only 65 NNS across ? ” Just to recap , we have JJ - hand reports that no significant plane wreckage was VBN at the Pentagon explosion NN and the hole was too small to have been made by a 757 jet airplane . Both reports were buried while the mainstream NN continued to bleat the cover story in order to launch the unending “ NN on Terror ” under which we are currently oppressed . Is there more evidence to weigh ? Try this on for size . This NN reported that NO CD DIED RB after this alleged jet crashed into a busy office building during working hours . Just how is that supposed to happen , given the physical forces involved ? Were the NNS shown being transported on stretchers actually paid , professional NN actors ? Apparently , Bush , Cheney , and the other NWO leaders in charge of the US believed – and still VBP – that We the NNS are dumb as stumps . We swallowed their incredibly evil lies and let them take away our civil rights under the oxymoronic Patriot Act . Most NNS – or “ sheeple ” – who are either too busy or just not interested do VB that giving up our cherished freedoms is “ the price we must pay ” to ensure “ national security . ” Occasionally , though , someone important admits the NN . In this short NN snippet from an interview with Neil Degrasse Tyson , JJ NNP Bill NNP mentions the “ Pentagon bomb . ” Although lifted from its original context , NNP seems to be answering a question about 9/11 being an inside job that was discussed by the US presidential candidates during the debates – before anything happened on 9/11 . A slip of the tongue ? A guilty conscience ? A mistake made while tired ? You decide . Now , consider this eye - witness testimony . A woman alleging to be a Pentagon employee inside the building during the explosion on 9/11 made this NN . At 2:19 , she VBZ : “ As I was coming out of the Pentagon I did n’t VB any evidence of metal , airplane seats , luggage – nothing that MD give me any indication that it was a plane that had hit the building . ” No NN she encountered had any jet fuel on their bodies , and no NN in her area . This concerned citizen ’s call to action is to open a federal grand jury to decide if We the NNS are the victims of highest - level perjury and obstruction of justice . The “ official story ” is BUNK , plain and simple . Stop the fictional “ NN on Terror ” forced on a nation still reeling from shock . Dismantle the pork - belly , boondoggle organizations thereby created , notably DHS and TSA . Refocus the national narrative on the NN , and for pete ’s sake , stop patronizing us . We taxpayers funded the ridiculous “ 9/11 Commission Report ” which concluded that the guilty party was – are you ready for this ? – the Federal Aviation Administration ( FAA ) . RB 9/11 Commissioner Tim Roemer spilled the beans when he told CNN , thinking back about the Pentagon attack : “ You were worried , especially when I was standing in front of the Pentagon that night , seeing CD of our fortresses pried open by a missile – uh , airplane . ” Have n’t you had enough lies ?

text: Oarfish are JJ , greatly elongated , pelagic lampriform fish belonging to the small family Regalecidae . [ 1 ] VBN in all temperate to tropical oceans yet rarely seen , the oarfish family contains three NNS in CD genera . CD of these , the JJ oarfish ( Regalecus glesne ) , is the longest bony fish alive , growing up to 8 m ( 26 ft ) in length . The common name oarfish is thought to be in reference either to their highly compressed and elongated bodies , or to the now discredited belief that the fish " row " themselves through the NN with their pelvic fins . [ 2 ] The family name Regalecidae is derived from the Latin regalis , meaning " royal " . The occasional beachings of oarfish after storms , and their habit of lingering at the NN when sick or dying , VB oarfish a probable source of JJ sea serpent tales . Although the larger NNS are considered NN fish and are fished commercially to a minor extent , oarfish are rarely caught alive ; their flesh is not well regarded for eating due to its gelatinous consistency . [ 3 ] The dorsal fin originates from above the ( relatively JJ ) eyes and runs the entire length of the fish . Of the approximately 400 dorsal fin rays , the JJ 10 to 13 are elongated to varying degrees , forming a trailing crest embellished with reddish spots and flaps of NN at the ray tips . The pelvic fins are similarly elongated and adorned , reduced to CD to five rays each . The pectoral fins are greatly reduced and situated low on the NN . The anal fin is completely absent and the caudal fin MD be reduced or absent , as well , with the NN tapering to a fine point . All fins lack true spines . At least CD account , from NNS in NNP Zealand , described the oarfish as giving off " electric shocks " when touched . [ 2 ] IN other members of its order , the oarfish has a small yet highly protrusible oblique mouth with no visible teeth . The NN is scaleless and the NN is covered with easily abraded , silvery guanine . In the streamer fish ( Agrostichthys parkeri ) , the NN is clad with hard tubercles . All NNS lack NN bladders and the number of gill rakers is variable . Oarfish coloration is RB variable ; the flanks are commonly covered with irregular bluish to blackish streaks , black dots , and squiggles . These markings quickly fade following death . The JJ oarfish is by far the largest member of the family at a published total length of 8 m ( 26 ft ) — with unconfirmed reports of 11 m ( 36 ft ) and 17 m ( 56 ft ) [ 4 ] [ 5 ] [ 6 ] specimens — and 270 kg ( 600 lb ) in weight . [ 7 ] The streamer fish is VBN to reach 3 m ( 10 ft ) in length , [ 8 ] while the largest recorded specimen of Regalecus russelii measured 5.4 m ( 18 ft ) . [ 9 ] Oarfish have the longest VBN length of any living NNS of bony fish . [ 10 ] The oarfish is thought to inhabit the epipelagic to mesopelagic ocean layers , ranging from 200 meters ( 660 ft ) to 1,000 meters ( 3,300 ft ) and is rarely seen on the NN . A few have been VBN still barely alive , but RB if PRP floats to the NN , it dies . At the depths the oarfish live , there are few or no currents . As a result , they build little muscle mass and they cannot survive in shallower turbulent NN . [ 11 ] The members of the family are VBN to have a worldwide range . However , JJ encounters with live oarfish are rare , and distribution information is collated from records of oarfish caught or washed ashore . [ 2 ] Oarfish were RB described in 1772 . [ 12 ] Rare encounters with divers and accidental catches have supplied what little is VBN of oarfish ethology ( behavior ) and ecology . Oarfish are solitary NNS and MD frequent significant depths up to 1,000 m ( 3,300 ft ) . An oarfish measuring 3.3 m ( 11 ft ) and 63.5 kg ( 140 lb ) was reported to have been caught in February 2003 using a fishing rod baited with squid at Skinningrove , NNP Kingdom . [ 13 ] A photograph on display in bars , restaurants , guesthouses and markets IN Laos and Thailand captioned " Queen of Nāgas seized by the NNP Army at Mekhong River , Laos NNP Base , on June 27 , 1973 , with the length of 7.80 metres [ 25.6 ft ] " is , as far as the caption goes , a hoax . The photograph itself is real , however , and was taken by Dr. Leo Smith of the Field Museum , of an oarfish VBN in September 1996 by NNP NNPS Navy SEAL trainees on the coast of Coronado , California , USA . [ 14 ] [ 15 ] In 2001 , an oarfish was filmed alive in situ : the 1.5 - metre ( 4.9 - NN ) fish was spotted by a group of U.S. Navy personnel during the inspection of a buoy in the Bahamas . [ 16 ] The oarfish was observed to propel itself by an amiiform mode of swimming ; that is , rhythmically undulating the dorsal fin while keeping the NN itself straight . Perhaps indicating a feeding posture , oarfish have been observed swimming in a vertical orientation , with their JJ axis perpendicular to the ocean NN . In this posture , the downstreaming light MD silhouette the oarfishes ' prey , making them easier to spot . In July 2008 , NNS captured footage of the rare fish swimming in its natural habitat in the mesopelagic zone in the Gulf of Mexico . It is the JJ ever confirmed sighting of an oarfish at depth , as most specimens are discovered dying at the sea NN or washed ashore . The fish was estimated to be between five and ten metres ( 16 and 33 ft ) in length . [ 17 ] As part of the SERPENT Project , five observations of apparently healthy oarfish Regalecus glesne by remotely operated vehicles were reported from the northern Gulf of Mexico between 2008 and 2011 at depths within the epipelagic and mesopelagic zones . [ 18 ] These observations include the deepest verified record of R. glesne ( 463–492 m or 1,519 –1,614 ft ) . [ CD ] From December 2009 to March 2010 , unusual numbers of the slender oarfish Regalecus russelii [ 9 ] ( 竜宮の使い “ Ryūgū - No - Tsukai ” , ) VBN in Japanese folklore as the Messenger from the Sea NNP 's Palace , appeared in the waters and on the beaches of Japan , the appearance of which is VBN to portend earthquakes . [ 20 ] After the 2011 Fukushima earthquake and tsunami which killed over 20,000 NNS , JJ pointed to the oarfish from 2009 – ⁠2010 to build up this myth . [ 21 ] In CD , NNP NNP aired an episode of the television series River Monsters named " Deep Sea Demon " in which Jeremy Wade was filmed during an encounter with a live oarfish while diving . The oarfish at this location seemed to be using a buoy anchor chain as a guide to ascend to the NN . On his second diving attempt , he was able to VB CD live oarfish as they ascended relatively close to the NN . This is the only VBN footage of JJ interaction with a healthy oarfish in its own environment . Wade was RB able to touch CD of the oarfish with his hand . The oarfish were propelling themselves by an amiiform mode of swimming as noted by other sightings . [ 22 ] In January 2019 CD oarfish were VBN alive in the nets of fisherman on the Japanese island of Okinawa . [ 21 ] Oarfish feed primarily on zooplankton , selectively straining tiny euphausiids , shrimp , and other crustaceans from the NN . Small fish , jellyfish , and squid are RB taken . JJ open - ocean carnivores are all likely predators of oarfish . The oceanodromous Regalecus glesne is recorded as spawning off Mexico from July to December ; all NNS are presumed to not guard their eggs , and release brightly coloured , buoyant eggs , up to six millimetres ( 0.24 in ) across , which are incorporated into the zooplankton . The eggs hatch after about three weeks into highly active larvae that feed on other zooplankton . The larvae have little resemblance to the adults , with JJ dorsal and pelvic fins and extensible mouths . [ 2 ] Larvae and juveniles have been observed drifting just below the NN . In contrast , adult oarfish are rarely seen at the NN when not sick or injured . • Fishes : An Introduction to ichthyology . Peter B. Moyle and Joseph J. Cech , Jr ; p. 338 . Printed in 2004 . text: A run-of - the - mill NN story is spiced up — and aged down — by telling the tale not from the perspective of the NN himself , but from his JJ teenage son in “ The Son of NNP . ” The animated adventure follows Adam ( voiced by Pappy Faulkner ) as he undergoes a transformation that is far more than just puberty . This English - language Belgian production does n’t feature quite the budget , visuals or imagination of its JJ blockbuster counterparts , but it will likely provide a fun 90 - minute diversion for kids . Adam is bullied at school , and he longs to VB more about a father he never met . When he starts sprouting wild hair and his NNS outgrow his NNS , he soon discovers that his father ( Chris Parson ) is n’t dead IN he ’s been told . Instead , he ’s a NN and has been hiding in the woods because evil corporation HairCo. wants to experiment on him in their quest to cure baldness . The script misses the spark of better family films with its overly complicated plot and lackluster dialogue . However , “ The Son of NNP ” features some nice animation , particularly in its action scenes , and its moments between father and son are especially sweet . text: SAN RAMON , Calif . --( BUSINESS WIRE ) -- Nov 21 , 2018 -- Chevron Corporation ( NYSE : CVX ) today announced that the Chevron - operated NNP NNP deepwater project , located in the U.S. Gulf of Mexico , has started crude NN and natural NN production . The field is located approximately 225 NNS ( 360 km ) RB of NNP Orleans , La. , in a NN depth of approximately 5,200 NNS ( 1,584 m. ) . This press release features multimedia . View the full release here : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20181121005441/en/ The Chevron - operated NNP NNP project uses a 15 - slot drilling and production tension - leg platform , the deepest of its kind in the NN , and is designed for a capacity of 75,000 barrels of NN and 25 CD cubic NNS of natural NN IN day . ( Photo : Business Wire ) The NNP NNP field was discovered in 2006 , is estimated to contain total recoverable resources of more than 200 CD NN - equivalent barrels and has a projected production NN of 35 NNS . The project uses a 15 - slot drilling and production tension - leg platform , the deepest of its kind in the NN , and is designed for a capacity of 75,000 barrels of NN and 25 CD cubic NNS of natural NN IN day . “ The NNP NNP project strengthens Chevron ’s deepwater portfolio and further demonstrates that the Gulf of Mexico is an integral part of our diverse JJ portfolio and JJ - term strategy , ” VBD Jeff Shellebarger , NNP of Chevron NNP NNP Exploration and Production . “ The project advances our interest in safely providing reliable , affordable NN to meet a growing JJ demand . ” Chevron ’s subsidiary , Chevron U.S.A. Inc. , is the operator of NNP NNP with a 60 percent working interest . Co-owners are Equinor Gulf of Mexico LLC ( 27.5 % ) and Marubeni NNP & NNP ( USA ) LLC ( 12.5 % ) . Chevron Corporation is CD of the NN ’s leading integrated NN NNS . Through its subsidiaries that conduct business worldwide , the NN is involved in virtually every facet of the NN industry . Chevron explores for , produces and transports crude NN and natural NN ; refines , markets and distributes transportation fuels and lubricants ; manufactures and sells petrochemicals and additives ; generates NN ; and develops and deploys technologies that enhance business value in every aspect of the NN ’s operations . Chevron is VBN in San Ramon , Calif . More information about Chevron is available at www.chevron.com . text: ­ It is amazing , but the total amount of gold in the NN is a surprisingly small q­uantity . Here 's how you can calculate the total amount that is available . If you look at a page IN this NN , or if you look it up in an encyclopedia , you will find that the annual worldwide production of gold is something IN 50 CD troy ounces IN NN . Gold has a specific gravity of 19.3 , meaning that it is 19.3 times heavier than NN . So gold weighs 19.3 kilograms IN liter . A liter is a cube that measures 10 centimeters ( about 4 inches ) on a side . There are 32.15 troy ounces in a kilogram . Therefore , the NN produces a cube of gold that is about 4.3 meters ( about 14 NNS ) on each side every NN . In other words , all of the gold produced worldwide in CD NN MD just about fit in the average NN 's living room ! This cube weighs 1,555,210 kilograms ( 3,110,420 pounds ) . A recent spot price for gold was $ 256.10 U.S. -- using that number , all of the gold produced in a NN is worth $ 12,805,000,000 . That 's a lot of NN , but not an unimaginable amount . For example , that 's about how much the Pentagon spent launching the GPS satellite NN . NNP 's budget in 1998 was $ 13.6 CD . Figuring out the total amount of gold that has been produced by NN is a little harder . To VB at some kind of estimate , let 's figure that the NN has been producing gold at 50 CD ounces a NN for 200 NNS . That number is probably a little high , but when you figure that the Aztecs and the Egyptians produced a fair amount of gold for a JJ NN , it 's probably not too far off . Fifty CD ounces * 200 NNS = 10 CD ounces . Ten CD ounces of gold MD fit into a cube roughly 25 meters ( about 82 NNS ) on a side . Consider that the Washington Monument measures 55 NNS by 55 NNS at its base and is 555 NNS tall ( 17 x 17 x 170 m ) . That means that if you MD somehow gather every scrap of gold that NN has ever mined into CD place , you MD only build about CD - third of the Washington Monument . Platinum is RB more scarce than gold . Only 3.6 CD troy ounces are produced IN NN . Its specific gravity is 21.45 , and it was discovered in the 18th NN , not in 3,000 B.C. If you assume that the NN has produced 3.6 CD ounces IN NN for 50 NNS to estimate the total worldwide supply , all of the platinum in the NN MD fit in a cube that is 6.3 meters ( about 20 NNS ) on a side . In other words , all of the platinum in the entire NN MD easily fit in the average home ! These links will VB you learn more :

text: Monos is set in a NNP JJ paradise but comes off IN Lord of the Flies in hell . Following an eight - strong group of teen soldiers and their adult prisoner of NN , it is sensual , and gorgeous and intensely , continuously disturbing . The kids – Dog , Lady , NNP , Boom - Boom , Rambo , Swede , Wolf , Smurf – are left to their own devices except for the occasional visit from “ the Messenger ” , who works for whatever organisation has recruited them . So they scrap and kiss and fire their AK - 47s into the sky . Alejandro Landes , the NN ’s 39 - NN - JJ director , VBZ it does n’t matter who they ’re fighting for . “ Colombia ’s been NN - torn for so JJ decades . I ’ve seen that violence happen from the left and I ’ve seen it happen from the NN . My grandfather ’s favourite place in the NN , his farm that he worked all his NN to buy , became the headquarters for the most gruesome rightwing paramilitary group , the AUC , and I ’ve had part of my family kidnapped by guerrillas . ” Who , exactly ? “ My grandfather ’s sister , my cousin … things IN that . ” Were they freed ? “ Some yes , some no . So that is something that I had seen and experienced . ” These experiences inspired and informed Monos . We ’re given no specifics of NN and place – it ’s somewhere in Latin NNP . Landes , who lives in NNP York , has Colombian roots but grew up in Ecuador , his NNS having left Medellín in the 1980s to escape the violence . To find his actors , he and his producers sifted through 800 tapes , selecting 25 possibles totake part in a mock training camp for four weeks in the Andes . Most had never acted before , though there was CD major exception : Moisés Arias ( NNP ) was a regular in Miley Cyrus ’s Disney series Hannah Montana . CD they saw on a tape playing basketball , a kid with a close crop , referred to on the NN as Matt , but in fact named Sofia ( Buenaventura ) . She plays Rambo in the NN and , VBZ Landes , “ was very inspirational for the fluidity of the character ” . He calls the character , who is written as male , “ post - gender ” . Researching the NN , Landes visited Colombian reinsertion camps , meeting adult rebel fighters who had laid down their guns and wanted to enter civil society . In CD he VBD Wilson Salazar , a NN with dwarfism who became a child soldier at 11 and deserted when he was 24 . There was a sizeable price on his head , dead or alive . “ He was very good at what he did , ” VBZ Landes . “ He had risen to be part of a column called Teófilo Forero , CD of the most feared combat units . He was an amazing destroyer of things . ” Landes hired Salazar as a JJ consultant , then asked him to play the Messenger , too , as he was so convincing . At the camp , Salazar woke his JJ charges at 4 am each day . They ’d undertake acting exercises in the mornings , and in the afternoons Salazar MD give them clandestine JJ training . “ It was intense , ” VBZ Landes . “ It was a boot - camp scenario – the kids were living , sleeping , eating together , everything together , all at the same NN . ” Landes then selected his eight , tweaking the screenplay to fit . The shoot was yet more full - on . The opening mountaintop segment was shot at almost 14,000 ft ( 4,300 m ) : punishingly cold and wet . “ You move slower up there , ” VBZ Landes . “ There ’s low oxygen , you move in a bit of a daze . ” On the JJ day , someone from the camera department had an epileptic seizure . A baptism by fire , thought Landes ; things will VB easier . They did not . For four weeks , the 55 - strong cast and crew filmed in the jungle IN the Samaná river , five hours RB - east of Medellín . Mules carried their food ; Colombia ’s national kayak NN helped with filming on the rapids ; a family of local gold miners built their JJ tents . There was no electricity , no running NN , no refrigerated food and torrential downpours all night every night . There were food rations . The shoot took its toll . “ NNS were dropping IN flies , including me , ” VBZ Landes . “ Everyone had their day . Everyone cried on this movie . You ’re working six - day weeks , very high - intensity scenarios . ” Landes himself was working seven - day weeks . CD morning he woke up and MD n’t move . The gold miners put him on a stretcher and carried him up a canyon until they reached a local JJ centre . He cried on the journey , distraught that the production might collapse . He was back behind the camera 20 hours later . “ I VBP it was just the stress , ” he VBZ . “ And the ration diet . ” It was worth it . The NN has earned universal raves – and a special prize in San Sebastián NN festival , Spain , for accurately reflecting “ the values and reality ” of LGBTQ NNS . The story is a nightmare in which nothing – gender , sexuality , political allegiance – is muddled or irrelevant . “ It ’s not binary . That ’s why I VBP it reaches much further than Colombia . That is what ’s most timely and relevant . I wanted to VB sure that the NN spoke not to the moment but to us as a NN . ” • Monos is released in the UK on 25 October

text: THE NNP were called in to probe whether or not the legendary NNP was actually real , newly released documents reveal . The top secret papers disclose NNS from the organisation RB carried out scientific tests on " hair or fur " VBN to be from the mythical apeman . Peter Byrne , then the director of the NNP Information Center , wrote a letter in 1976 asking that the NNP " set the record straight , once and for all " . His call came after it was reported the bureau had analysed hair or fur that was not identifiable as " that of any VBN NN on this continent " . NNP Assistant Director Jay Cochran , who headed the bureau 's lab division at the NN , responded that he was unable to find any records of such an examination , the papers reveal . However , Byrne , then requested an examination of what he saw as an exciting JJ sample of NNP fur . " We do not often come across hair which we are unable to identify and the hair that we have now , about 15 hairs attached to a tiny piece of NN , is the JJ that we have obtained in six NNS which we feel MD be of importance , " Byrne wrote . " With this understanding , we will examine the hairs and tissue mentioned in your letter . text: Genetic testing confirms the legendary NNP is a JJ relative that arose some 15,000 NNS RB — at least according to a press release issued by a NN called DNA Diagnostics detailing supposed work by a Texas veterinarian . The release and alleged NN by Melba S. Ketchum RB suggests such cryptids had sex with modern JJ females that resulted in hairy hominin hybrids , but the scientific community is dubious about her claim . " A NN of NNS can verify that their five - NN JJ DNA NN , currently under peer - review , confirms the existence of a novel hominin hybrid NN , commonly called ' NNP ' or ' NNP , ' living in NNP NNP , " the release reads . " NNS ' extensive DNA sequencing suggests that the legendary NNP is a JJ relative that arose approximately 15,000 NNS RB . " For her NN , Ketchum obtained three " whole nuclear genomes from purported NNP samples . The genome sequencing shows that NNP mtDNA is identical to modern Homo sapiens , but NNP nuDNA is a novel , unknown hominin related to Homo sapiens and other primate NNS . " ( Mitochondrial DNA , or mtDNA , is the DNA that resides in the NN 's NN - producing structures , and is typically passed down from mothers , while nuclear DNA , nuDNA , resides in the NNS ' nuclei and is passed down from both NNS to offspring . ) " Our NNS indicate that the NNP NNP NNP is a hybrid NN , the result of males of an unknown hominin NN crossing with female Homo sapiens , " the statement reads . [ Infographic : Tracking Belief in NNP ] So where 's the evidence ? Well , there is none . Not yet , anyway : Ketchum 's research has not appeared in any peer - reviewed scientific journal , and there 's no indication when that might happen . If the NNS are good and the NN is sound , any reputable NN journal MD jump at the chance to be the JJ to publish this groundbreaking information . Until then , Ketchum has refused to let anyone else VB her evidence . Of course the history of NNP is rife with exaggerated and premature claims about proof of the NN 's existence . For decades , various types of evidence have been offered as final , definitive proof , ranging from NNP hair to NN to dead bodies . Without exception , the evidence has always been hoaxed , misidentification or inconclusive . Because Ketchum has released no information at all about her findings ( nor have they been examined by outside experts ) , it 's impossible to evaluate the validity of her conclusions . But an important clue can be VBN in her statement that " NNP mtDNA is identical to modern Homo sapiens . " If the mitochontrial DNA is identical to Homo sapiens ( i.e. , modern NNS ) , then this suggests CD of CD options . The JJ , endorsed by Ketchum , is that NNP ancestors had sex with NNS about 15,000 NNS RB and created a half - JJ hybrid NNS currently hiding across NNP NNP . [ Rumor or Reality : The Creatures of Cryptozoology ] There is , however , another , simpler interpretation of such results : The samples were contaminated . Whatever the sample originally was — NN , bear , JJ or something else — it 's possible that the NNS who collected and handled the specimens accidentally introduced their DNA into the sample , which can easily occur with something as innocent as a spit , sneeze or cough . No NN outside of Ketchum 's NN knows how this alleged NNP DNA was collected , from where or by whom . It MD have been collected by the NN 's top forensics experts , or by a pair of amateur NNP buffs with no evidence - gathering training . How did the NN definitively determine that the samples were from a NNP ? Did they take a NN or saliva sample from a living NNP ? If so , how did they VB that close , and why did n't they simply capture it or photograph it ? If the samples were VBN in the wild , how do they VB it was n't left by another NN — or possibly RB a hunter , hiker or camper who left JJ genetic material ? Previous alleged NNP samples subjected to DNA analysis have been deemed " unknown " or " unidentified . " However , " unknown " or " unidentified " results do not mean " NNP . " There are JJ reasons why a DNA sample might come back unknown , including that it was contaminated or too degraded by JJ conditions . Or it MD simply mean that the NN it came from was not among the reference samples that the laboratory VBD for comparison . There is no reference sample of NNP DNA to compare it with , so by definition , there can not be a conclusive NN . Ketchum RB issued a statementrequesting that the U.S. NN immediately recognize NNP as " an indigenous NNS and immediately protect their JJ and Constitutional rights against those who MD VB in their physical and cultural differences a ' license ' to hunt , trap , or kill them . " Since no NNP has ever been hunted , trapped or killed , it 's not clear that the creatures — if they exist — require any special federal protection . Ketchum's is not the only genetics - VBN project intended to find NNP . Earlier this NN , NNS from Oxford NNP and the Lausanne Museum of Zoology announced they were collecting samples of alleged NNP and Yeti hair for genetic identification . Oxford geneticist Bryan Sykes collected materials from the NN from NNP through September , and is currently conducting DNA analysis . Once the results are in , he plans to submit his results to a peer - reviewed scientific journal . If Ketchum has the definitive proof she claims , the NN will soon VB about it , and NNP will be proven once and for all . On the other hand , if the evidence never appears , or is inconclusive and flawed , the search will continue . Benjamin Radford is deputy editor of Skeptical Inquirer NN magazine and author of six books , including Tracking the Chupacabra and Scientific Paranormal Investigation : How to Solve Unexplained Mysteries . His NN is www.BenjaminRadford.com.

text: The latest Wikileaks dump is VBN to be the “ biggest exposure of NNP spying secrets ever ” . It reveals how the agency hacks into consumer NNS to turn them into spying devices … and how it can RB remotely take NN of cars . Entitled Vault 7 : NNP Hacking Tools Revealed , the latest Wikileaks dump contains tons of documents explaining how the NNP has hundreds of zero - day exploits ( holes in software that are unknown to the vendor ) and can hack almost any smart tv , Android phone , iPhone , or router , and , apparently , recent cars as well . Not only that , the agency can RB leave the “ footprint ” of another entity while doing the hacking , effectively allowing them to put the blame on a foreign nation or organization . The documents VBP : The NNP , working with British spy agency MI5 , have developed a back door for a smart TV that allows NN snooping while the television is turned off . And that MD now include live NN streaming of your living room and office . In a 2014 document detailing future and improvements to the program , NNP officials VBD they planned to add a feature where the Agency MD capture NN and NN snapshots of NNS through their televisions . This MD put the federal NN and the NNP RB in your family room and office . Recently , the NNP lost NN of the majority of its hacking NN including malware , viruses , trojans , weaponized “ zero day ” exploits , malware remote NN systems and associated documentation . This extraordinary collection , which amounts to more than several hundred CD lines of code , gives its possessor the entire hacking capacity of the NNP . The archive appears to have been circulated among JJ U.S. NN hackers and contractors in an unauthorized manner , CD of whom has provided WikiLeaks with portions of the archive . According to the documents , the NNP has been using the NNP Department consulate in Frankfurt Germany as a headquarters for hackers in Europe , the Middle East , and Africa . The organization has been collecting a library of attack techniques from malware produced in other NNS , including NNP . The NNP has the ability to VB this library to misdirect attribution of hacks by leaving behind the “ fingerprints ” of stolen malware . Probably the most startling portion of this dump is the revelation that the NNP has gained the ability to “ hack ” into recent cars through their NN systems . Note that we are not RB talking about self - driving cars ( which will certainly become 100 % NNP - remote - controlled ) , but regular cars with computerized components ( IN 2011 and earlier ) . Why MD they VB to do that ? To “ engage in nearly undetectable assassinations ” . These revelations shed a JJ light on the very mysterious death of journalist Michael Hastings , who lost his NN after his car suddenly went out of NN and crashed . Hastings was a journalist , a contributing editor to Rolling Stone and reporter for BuzzFeed . He became a vocal critic of the surveillance NN during the investigation of reporters by the U.S. Department of Justice in 2013 , referring to the restrictions on the freedom of the press by the Obama administration as a “ NN ” on journalism . His last story , “ Why Democrats Love to Spy On Americans ” , was published by BuzzFeed on June 7 . Hastings died in a fiery high - speed automobile crash on June 18 , 2013 , in Los Angeles , California . On June 18 , 2013 , Hastings died in a single vehicle automobile crash in his Mercedes C250 Coupé at approximately 4:25 a.m. in the Hancock Park neighborhood of Los Angeles . A witness to the crash VBD the car seemed to be traveling at maximum speed and was creating sparks and flames before it fishtailed and crashed into a palm tree . NN from a nearby security camera purportedly shows Hastings ’ vehicle speeding and bursting into flames . Witnesses described the car ’s engine being ejected 50 to 60 yards ( 46–55 m ) from the scene . Hastings ’ NN was burned beyond recognition . The coroner identified the NN by matching fingerprints with those the NNP had on file . CD days after the crash , the Los Angeles Police Department declared that there were no signs of foul play . The coroner ’s report ruled the death to be an accident . An autopsy showed that the NN of death was massive blunt force trauma consistent with a high - speed crash . – Los Angeles Times , “ Michael Hastings death : JJ NN of crash emerges ” A NN article from CD actually mentioned that Hasting ’s death was most IN the result of a “ car cyber attack ” . JJ U.S. National Coordinator for Security , Infrastructure Protection , and Counter - terrorism Richard A. Clarke VBD that what is VBN about the crash is “ consistent with a car cyber attack ” . He was quoted as saying “ There is reason to VB that intelligence agencies for major powers — including the NNP NNPS — VBP how to remotely seize NN of a car . So if there were a cyber attack on [ Hastings ’ ] car — and I ’m not saying there was , I VBP whoever did it MD probably VB away with it . ” “ Hastings ’ work as a thorn in the side of NN and the 33 - NN - JJ journalist ’s death in an unusual crash in June 2013 immediately triggered speculation . A witness reported seeing Hastings ’ JJ silver Mercedes C250 coupe speeding down a Hollywood street before dawn when it bounced , slammed into a tree and burst into flames . Shortly before Hastings ’ death , he sent what was described as a “ panicky ” email to friends expressing concern that associates were being interviewed by “ the Feds . ” He RB wrote that he was onto a JJ story and needed to “ VB off the radar for a bit . ” His 2010 story for Rolling Stone in which Stanley McChrystal skewered the White NNP and its strategy in Afghanistan led to the general ’s resignation . The NNP denied Hastings was the target of any investigation , yet a Freedom of Information Act request later unearthed an NNP file on Hastings . Hastings RB told a neighbor he thought someone had been tampering with his car . At the NN of his death , he was working on an article about NNP director John Brennan . – Who . What . Why , “ CAR HACKING REPORT REFUELS CONCERNS ABOUT MICHAEL HASTINGS CRASH ” According to several sources , Hasting ’s last days very hectic . “ In an email to colleagues , which was copied to and released by Hastings ’ friend , Army Staff Sergeant Joe Biggs , Hastings VBD that he was “ onto a JJ story ” , that he needed to “ VB off the radar ” , and that the NNP might interview them . WikiLeaks announced that Hastings had RB contacted Jennifer Robinson , CD of its lawyers , a few hours prior to the crash , and the LA Weekly reported that he was preparing JJ reports on the NNP at the NN of his death . His widow Elise Jordan VBD his final story was a profile of NNP Director John O. Brennan . The NNP released a statement denying that Hastings was being investigated . USA Today reported that in the days before his death , Hastings believed his car was being “ tampered with ” and that he was scared and wanted to leave town . ‘ At 12:30 a.m. on the morning he died , an agitated Michael Hastings went to his neighbor and friend Jordanna Thigpen and asked to borrow her car . He VBD he was afraid to drive his own car , because he believed that someone had been tampering with it . “ He was scared , and he wanted to leave town , ” Thigpen recalls . But she declined , saying her car was having mechanical problems . When she woke up , Hastings was dead , his car having crashed into a tree . ’ Hastings died in a single vehicle automobile crash in his Mercedes C250 Coupé at approximately 4:25 a.m. in the Hancock Park neighborhood of Los Angeles . A witness to the crash VBD the car seemed to be traveling at maximum speed and was creating sparks and flames before it fishtailed and crashed into a palm tree . NN from a nearby security camera purportedly shows Hastings ’ vehicle speeding and bursting into flames . ” – USA TOday , “ Hastings thought his car was being tampered with ” Several US officials told CNN that a federal criminal investigation is being opened into WikiLeaks ’ publication of documents .

text: NNP African Author , Scientist , Researcher and Explorer Michael Tellinger ( often called ‘ The NNP African Indiana Jones ’ ) shows off what MD be CD of the best pieces of evidence that there were once giants living on NNP a JJ , JJ NN RB . Geologists have been marveling at this JJ NN print in rough granite , about 4 NNS JJ . Some still VBP that it is a natural erosion pattern , but for now it ’s hard to VB . Prof. Pieter Wagener from UPE , suggests that “ there is a higher probability of little JJ NNS arriving from NN and licking it out with their tongues , than being created by natural erosion . ” It is located in NNP Africa , near the town of Mpaluzi , close to the Swaziland border . It is estimated to be between 200 CD and 3 CD NNS JJ because of our current understanding of the formation of granites in NNP ’s history . This dating immediately causes great debate and argument – so I urge you to keep your mind open and focused on the evidence . This amazing footprint in granite was discovered in 1912 by a hunter called Stoffel Coetzee , while hunting in the remote area . At the NN this was a deeply remote part of NNP Africa VBN as the Eastern Transvaal , teeming with wildlife , including antelope and lions . It remains in the same condition as it was when RB discovered and the possibility that this was a carved hoax is extremely low because of its remote location . RB today , it is difficult to find . The real mystery is how this amazing phenomenon occurred – I have no idea – but here it is and we cannot wish it away . YES – It is granite – it is a well recognised geological part of NNP Africa and recorded on all geological maps – that is why this footprint is such an incredible mystery . It can be described as a “ phenocrystic ” granite , OR coarse porphyritic granite , that underwent several different stages of cooling . The result being an interesting mixture of JJ and small granules . This is why granite NNS are keen to mine this area for granite because it will look RB “ pretty ” when polished . This bone has been in the vaults of of the JJ school at WITS NNP , Johannesburg since the early 1960s , when it was VBN by miners in a mine in northern Namibia . It is CD of the most precious and rare specimens available today that clearly indicate the existence of giants in Southern Africa more than 40,000 NNS RB . text: PARIS ( Reuters ) – The courtyard IN the Louvre Museum ’s famed glass pyramid is to become the stage for a JJ interactive performance orchestrated by French visual artist JR as part of celebrations for the structure ’s 30th anniversary . Pei , now aged 101 , was controversial when it was inaugurated in the classical setting of the Louvre in March 1989 . But has since become a beloved Paris landmark . “ The pyramid has always inspired me , the NN it mixes the ancient and the modern , ” JR told Reuters . “ This NN , a JJ part of it is to confront the modern with archaeology . ” The JJ trompe l’oeil will be fully visible from Friday evening only from the museum ’s roof . The interactive part of the project – volunteers enrolling to paste 32 - NN - JJ paper strips and tourists walking , watching and appearing on the NN shot from above – is what attracted the Louvre authorities . “ The visitor is always at the heart of our concern , with always the goal to better welcome them , ” Louvre NN Jean - Luc Martinez VBD . text: In 1962 , Dutch wildlife photographer Baron Hugo van Lawick filmed Miss Goodall and the Wild Chimpanzees . It was the JJ documentary produced by the National Geographic Society , and it made Jane Goodall a star . RB , a wife , and then , mother . She married van Lawick , and in 1967 gave birth to a son , Hugo Eric Louis , VBN as Grub . She is the author of dozens of books on chimp and NN behavior , as well as on the critical role of conservation . In 1977 , she founded the Jane Goodall Institute , a nongovernmental organization devoted to protecting the rapidly disappearing chimp habitat . In 1995 she was made a Commander of the British Empire , and became Dame Jane Morris - Goodall , DBE . Born Valerie Jane Morris - Goodall in London in 1934 , her father , Mortimer , was a businessman ; her mother , Myfanwe ( Vanne ) Morris Goodall , was a novelist and looked after her family . The expectations for Jane were standard issue for the NN : a marriage to a nice , responsible NN , followed by a few NNS . To her credit , her mother never discouraged her interests : NNS , the natural NN , and above all , the wildlife of Africa . Once Vanne discovered that little Jane had brought a handful of earthworms to bed ; rather than shrieking , she explained that her JJ little friends needed the NN to live , and together , they took them back to the garden . Jane was a quiet girl , a bookworm who adored NNP Dolittle and devoured the Tarzan novels . Reading did its usual stealthy , NN - changing thing : Jane developed a deep love of NNS and a longing to VB to Africa and live among the wild NNS . But NNP NNP II was raging , and her family had little NN . Instead of NN , Jane enrolled in secretarial college , graduating in 1952 . Meanwhile , CD of Jane ’s school friends had moved to Kenya and invited her to come for a visit . Jane was working in London selecting music for advertising films at the NN . In a move that seems so very RB now , she moved home and worked as a waitress to finance the trip . When she had saved enough , she quit her job and off she went . By which I mean she took an exciting , month - JJ journey from England , IN the Cape of Good Hope , to Mombasa , eventually making her NN to Nairobi . There she met Dr. Louis Leakey , the great archaeologist and paleoanthropologist who traced our JJ origins to Africa . Leakey was charismatic , influential , and , at the NN , a curator at Nairobi ’s natural history museum . He offered Jane a job there , then invited her to come along on a dig at Olduvai Gorge . She spent three glorious months immersed in painstaking tasks : removing dirt from a fossil with a dental pick no bigger than your pinkie finger , or digging gently with a hunting knife . Leakey saw in her a NN who was patient and thorough : CD who MD survive JJ stretches of isolation , who MD sit and watch and learn . In short , she was the perfect candidate for his latest project — observing primates in the wild — and when he asked whether she MD be interested in setting up camp at Gombe Stream on the shores of remote Lake Tanganyika , she did n’t hesitate for a moment .

text: This article is more than 8 NNS JJ . “ I DO VB there ’s a ‘ squatch in these woods … . ” What the heck has happened to NN on television ? These and other channels show Nostradamus programs more regularly than they show microscopes and telescopes combined . Against this backdrop , I suppose we should n’t be surprised by incessantly ridiculous claims and headlines about JJ NN . JJ NN causes earthquakes . JJ NN causes depression . JJ NN causes tsunamis . The Australian blacktip shark lives in warm waters . The common blacktip shark lives globally , in both warm and cool waters , but allegedly “ favors cooler waters . ” Therefore , if a few Australian blacktips and a few common blacktips VBP together and do the wild thing , JJ NN must be the reason . Please allow me to quote the Huffington Post : “ Lead researcher Jess Morgan VBD , ‘ If [ the Australian blacktip ] hybridizes with the common NNS it can effectively shift its range further RB into cooler waters , so the effect of this hybridizing is a range expansion . ’ ” OK , let ’s VB this straight . text: I am writing you this open letter to defend myself against your attack on me personally and professionally . What is the evidentiary basis behind your characterization of my academic work as “ repulsive , offensive and not reflective of Alberta ” ? Why have you decided to set yourself up , Premier Notley , as some sort of arbitrator of what scholarly work in Alberta universities meets the criteria of being “ reflective of Alberta ” ? Is your opinion about what is or is not reflective of Alberta to become a JJ test of how curriculum will be created and how faculty members will be chosen in this province ? What lies behind your decision to disseminate a caricature of me “ standing at the head of the class ” in order to “ spread lies and NN NNS ” ? [ 1 ] Since I began teaching in the Department of Native NNP Studies at the NNP of Lethbridge in 1990 , I have never once seen in a student evaluation that reflects the kind of accusations you are pressing publicly on me . How is it you VBP you VBP more about me , including and what goes on in my classroom , than my own students ? After a NN and a half of being subject to a ruthless NN - by - NN , a JJ process is only now being initiated that from my perspective allows me to come forward for the JJ NN to tell my side of the story before an investigating tribunal operating within the terms of our collective agreement . The process is VBG forward because of a NN contestation that the U of L Board of Governors lost due to its unwillingness to adhere to the laws of labour relations in Alberta . Whose advice was the Board depending on when its members put themselves in such an untenable position ? Before we have RB started the process that has come about because of the determined stand of the NNP of Lethbridge Faculty Association ( ULFA ) and the Canadian Association of NNP Teachers ( CAUT ) , you , Premier Notley , chose to inject a politicized salvo into the onslaught of vituperation against me that began on Aug. 26 of CD . Here is how the NNP of Lethbridge Faculty Association described your ill - advised political intervention : The Faculty Association wishes to express its disappointment in the Premier ’s words . As the union that represents Professor Hall in his employment relationship with the NNP of Lethbridge , the Faculty Association has endeavoured to have a fair and objective process employed for adjudicating Professor Hall ’s academic scholarship and accountability through procedures in the collective agreement . We finally achieved this following significant effort and cost on our part and have a great deal of confidence in the appropriate academic procedures to which Professor Hall is now subject . Having the Premier draw conclusions about the acceptability of Professor Hall ’s academic work prior to any decision rendered by an expert panel of qualified academics has the potential to undermine this very process we have fought to achieve . At worse , though , these words have the real potential to bias the outcome of any such fair and objective process . The Faculty Association has greatly appreciated the hard work the Premier and her NN have done to advance the rights of post - secondary labour . We VBP it is a dangerous precedent , however , for elected officials to intervene so directly in a complex labour matter such as this NN . CD of the core points I intend to bring forward in my self - defense in the forthcoming process , is to describe the mounting of a negative NN NN against me VBN on the atrocious contents of a maliciously - engineered NNP post . According to B’nai Brith Canada , the core agency in orchestrating this NN deception , the post appeared on , and then disappeared from , my NNP wall during an interval of a few hours on Aug. 26 , CD . I did not invite this digital item onto my NNP wall . I did not sanction its abhorrent contents . In fact I condemned the post ’s contents publicly in mid-Sept . when I RB became aware of the digital item and the NN that it was being deployed to destroy my reputation . You , Premier Notley , were presented with a deceptive account of my relationship to the NNP post RB before I RB knew about the B’nai Brith Canada operation . Recently I learned from the results of a FOIP investigation of the Alberta Ministry of Justice that on Aug. 27 , CD you and other Alberta cabinet ministers were sent a slanderous account of the NNP post as if it “ came from my lips . ” NNS in the inner circle of your office reported you had seen the communication that slanderously misrepresented me as an “ advocate for the murder of Jews . ” If you MD actually take a genuine interest in my academic work , Premier Notley , you MD realize I have a record of studying all sorts of genocide and condemning this crime against humanity in all its manifestations , including the Jewish Shoah . [ 2 ] Perhaps the NNS who lied to you about me in late August of CD are still holding you captive in terms of filtering the information that has caused you to VB whatever it is you VBP you VBP about me . The NNP of the NNP of Lethbridge , Dr. Michael J. Mahon , went along with the NNP deception to suspend this tenured full professor on Oct. 3 and 4 , CD . I was pulled from the classroom in mid-term and banned from stepping NN on campus . This purge took place entirely outside the terms of the collective agreement between the NN ’s faculty and administration . This suspension initially without pay essentially declared me guilty until proven innocent . Severe punitive measures were imposed on me all without RB an ounce of adjudication by a neutral third - party . From the correspondence I have been receiving from all over the NN , I can VB my suspension quickly became a shot heard throughout the JJ academic realm , a shot signaling that an Albertan NN is leading an attack on the institutions of tenure , peer review and academic freedom . Now you have joined in that attack too Premier Notley . You have allied yourself with the position of B’nai Brith Canada , the organization that recently interfered in the leadership race for the JJ leader of the federal NDP . The same NNS that set in motion the NN - by - NN aimed at me attacked the NDP leadership candidate , Niki Ashton . According to B’nai Brith ’s CEO Michael Mostyn , Ms. Ashton ’s concern for the violated JJ rights of Palestinians NNS made her “ an advocate for vile terrorists ” and “ convicted murders . ” It revealed Ms. Ashton ’s “ defective moral compass . ” [ 3 ] What is your view , Premier Notley , of the condemnation directed at the JJ NDP federal leader , Jagmeet Singh , when B’nai Brith Canada took aim at him for intervening to provide a venue at the Ontario provincial legislature for a presentation by academic advocates of the rights of educator Nadia Shoufani . The condemnation came in late Augusts of CD when Mr. Singh was MLA for the riding of Bramalea - Gore - Malton and Deputy Leader of the Ontario NDP . At the same NN as it was attacking Jagmeet Singh , B’nai Brith Canada was leading the effort to have Ms. Shofani , a Canadian of Palestinian and Christian background , criminalized by police and fired from her teaching job in the Dufferin - Peel Catholic School Board . The criticisms directed at Ms. Shoufani are similar to those directed at Ms. Ashton . Similarly , the effort to criminalize Ms. Shoufani and bar her from the classroom anticipated the similar NN to which I was about to be subjected . The attack on Ms. Shoufani ’s job and her reputation was VBN on allegations about her supposed “ terror - supporting remarks ” made in a Quds Day speech in Toronto in July of CD . [ 4 ] It seems , Premier Notley , your political intervention on the wrong side of the NNP of Lethbridge NN reflects your reactionary alliance with the thought police and speech police at B’nai Brith Canada . Your reactionary stance identifies you with the backward policies of JJ NDP leader , Tom Mulcair , when he purged pro-Palestinian candidates from the federal NN of CD . This atrocious move was in all probably a significant factor in the disappointing electoral showing of the NDP as it lost its position of Canada ’s Official Opposition Party . [ 5 ] Now in Feb. of 2018 B’nai Brith Canada has resumed its efforts to quarterback the NDP , lobbying aggressively to stop a resolution from being put on the floor of the recent NDP convention . The vote , neverthess , was close , 189 for putting the resolution forward and 200 for sidelining it . The resolution included provisions on a Canadian boycott against NNS produced in the illegal Israeli settlements in the Occupied West Bank . Those supporting the boycott resolution included the unanimous support of the NNP NNP Democrats , 28 electoral riding associations covering six provinces and JJ current and JJ MPs . Geneviève Nevin , a supporter of the resolution from Victoria , observed , “ There ’s a generational divide on this issue . ” In his account of this divide within the NDP , journalist Derrick O’Keefe suggested Jagmeet Singh MD be wise to look to the example of Jeremy Corbyn in the UK . Mr. Corbyn has mobilized on behalf of the Labour Party considerable electoral support from his attentiveness to the plight of Palestinian NNS under Israeli occupation . [ 6 ] By siding so strongly , Premier Notley , with the U of L administration ’s collaboration with the Isreal lobby including B’nai Brith Canada and the Centre for Israel and Jewish Affairs , you have identified yourself and your NN with agencies that condemned Hassan Diab wrongly as a terrorist . B’nai Brith Canada played a major role in calling for pulling the sociology teacher from his Carleton NNP classroom in Ottawa . This intervention helped set in notion a miscarriage of justice that saw the Lebanese Canadian academic incarcerated for a decade in Canada and France for a crime he did n’t commit . [ 7 ] You have identified yourself and your NN , Premier Notley , with notorious enemies of academic freedom who brought forward during the 50th anniversary of York NNP all sorts of JJ allegations much IN those I am facing now . This fiasco unfolded when B’nai Brith Canada , the CIJA , the Canadian Jewish Congress and the Jewish Defence NNP tried to shut down an academic conference on Israel / Palestine at York NNP in 2009 . The effort to sabotage this academic initiative was foiled because the York NNP NNP , Mamdou Shoukiri , and the York NNP Board of Governors stood up for the imperatives of academic freedom . [ 8 ] In 2018 in Alberta the equation is very different . The NNP and Board of NNP of Lethbridge have adopted the position of the Israel lobby . Now Premier Notley , you have intervened to strengthen this political coalition favouring the stiffling of free and open debate at Alberta universities . Please consider revisiting you provocative and intellectually bankrupt position on this matter . [ 1 ] Chuck Millar ’s Letter to the Alberta Premier — 11 January , 2018 at There is no question that the views of this individual are repulsive , offensive and not reflective of Alberta . Our classrooms are a place for freedom of speech and expression but that does not mean individuals VB to stand at the head of the class and spread lies and NN NNS . I am terribly disappointed to learn that this individual has been reinstated , but let me be clear that legislation that our NN introduced did not give him his job back . I can confirm that this individual is now under investigation by a committee at the NNP . ” [ 2 ] VB , for instance Hall , NNP into Property ” Colonization , Decolonization , and Capitalism ( Montreal : McGill - Queen ’s NNP Press , 2010 ) , Chapter 14 , “ Genocide and JJ Capitalism , ” pp. 655-711 [ 3 ] Tony Hall , “ Palestinians , B’nai Brith and Canada ’s NNP Democratic Party , Canadian Dimension , 30 July , CD at [ 5 ] Marion Kawas , “ NNP Democratic Party Purges Candidates over pro-Palestinian positions in lead up to Canadian elections , Mondoweiss , 24 Aug. , CD at [ 8 ] Susan G. Drummong , Unthinkable Thoughts , Academic Freedom and the NNP - NNP Solution for Israel and Palestine ( Vancouver : UBC Press , 2014 ) ; Jon Thompson , No Debate : The Israel lobby and free speech in Canadian universities ( Toronto : Lorimer , 2011 )

text: I remember Arthur Schlesinger saying after NNP Kennedy ’s death , when he left the administration , that CD of the sidelights of his stay was that he MD never again VB anything he read in the newspapers . If the political press was so overmatched then , VB of our JJ press today which is no NN for JJ - cap corporations IN Amazon , NNP , Alphabet , RB Apple . They avoid any discussion of pivotal variables in their future , research priorities or sector operating profit margins . You MD drive a bus through Amazon ’s forecast of upcoming revenues and earnings , but a bus full of analysts blindly forecasts numbers that quarter - after - quarter wildly miss the mark , not just for Amazon , but Apple , NNP , Alphabet and Alibaba , too . The negative press for these babies does n’t relent . Past Sunday ’s NNP York Times published a 16 - page special section called “ The Decade Tech Lost Its NN . ” NNP and Mark Zuckerberg , particularly , are cited for hurting democracy and spreading misinformation . Maybe yes , maybe no . Let ’s hope CNN keeps the NNP administration fairly honest , day by day . Some background on the NNP York Times : RB , it ’s been a terrible investment these past 35 NNS while Rupert Murdoch took his NNP Corporation to the NN . The NYT ticked in the twenties back in 1987 , presently $ 32.70 . They leveraged themselves to buy the Boston Globe near the peak for newspaper publishing valuation , completely missing the nearly irrepressible surge in broadcasting , particularly subscription television . The cardinal investment precept is never VB bogged down in basket NNS . I ’m reminded of my mother ’s experience with U.S. Steel which she bought in the fifties because she thought it was a bargain with a good dividend . But , its price is down some 90 % since 1959 and its dividend was just cut to CD cent . Nothing good happened to U.S. Steel . It still makes plenty of steel but periodically shutters blast furnaces . Its NN value is maybe $ 3 CD while Apple , Amazon and Alphabet trade near a trillion bucks , NNP sits at a lousy $ 600 CD , but ready to break out . Consider , back in 1974 , basic industrials accounted for nearly 20 % of the NN ’s capitalized valuation . Today , we ’re under 5 % .
