text: Genetic testing confirms the legendary NNP is a JJ relative that arose some 15,000 NNS RB — at least according to a press release issued by a NN called DNA Diagnostics detailing supposed work by a Texas veterinarian . The report from Melba S. Ketchum RB suggests such cryptids had sex with modern JJ females that resulted in hairy hominin hybrids , but the scientific community is dubious about her claim . " A NN of NNS can verify that their five - NN - JJ DNA NN , currently under peer - review , confirms the existence of a novel hominin hybrid NN , commonly called ' NNP ' or ' NNP , ' living in NNP NNP , " the release reads . " NNS ' extensive DNA sequencing suggests that the legendary NNP is a JJ relative that arose approximately 15,000 NNS RB . " For her NN , Ketchum obtained three " whole nuclear genomes from purported NNP samples . The genome sequencing shows that NNP mtDNA is identical to modern Homo sapiens , but NNP nuDNA is a novel , unknown hominin related to Homo sapiens and other primate NNS . " ( Mitochondrial DNA , or mtDNA , is the DNA that resides in the NN 's NN - producing structures , and is typically passed down from mothers , while nuclear DNA , nuDNA , resides in the NNS ' nuclei and is passed down from both NNS to offspring . ) " Our NNS indicate that the NNP NNP NNP is a hybrid NN , the result of males of an unknown hominin NN crossing with female Homo sapiens , " the statement reads . [ Infographic : Tracking Belief in NNP ] So where 's the evidence ? Well , there is none . Not yet , anyway : Ketchum 's research has not appeared in any peer - reviewed scientific journal , and there 's no indication when that might happen . If the NNS are good and the NN is sound , any reputable NN journal MD jump at the chance to be the JJ to publish this groundbreaking information . Until then , Ketchum has refused to let anyone else VB her evidence . Of course the history of NNP is rife with exaggerated and premature claims about proof of the NN 's existence . For decades , various types of evidence have been offered as final , definitive proof , ranging from NNP hair to NN to dead bodies . Without exception , the evidence has always been a hoax , misidentification or inconclusive . Because Ketchum has released no information at all about her findings ( nor have they been examined by outside experts ) , it 's impossible to evaluate the validity of her conclusions . But an important clue can be VBN in her statement that " NNP mtDNA is identical to modern Homo sapiens . " If the mitochontrial DNA is identical to Homo sapiens ( i.e. , modern NNS ) , then this suggests CD of CD options . The JJ , endorsed by Ketchum , is that NNP ancestors had sex with NNS about 15,000 NNS RB and created a half - JJ hybrid NNS currently hiding across NNP NNP . [ Rumor or Reality : The Creatures of Cryptozoology ] There is , however , another , simpler interpretation of such results : The samples were contaminated . Whatever the sample originally was — NN , bear , JJ or something else — it 's possible that the NNS who collected and handled the specimens accidentally introduced their DNA into the sample , which can easily occur with something as innocent as a spit , sneeze or cough . No NN outside of Ketchum 's NN knows how this alleged NNP DNA was collected , from where or by whom . It MD have been collected by the NN 's top forensics experts , or by a pair of amateur NNP buffs with no evidence - gathering training . • • All lightning on NNP MD have its roots in NN , JJ research suggests . • How our brains can track a 100 mph pitch Confirming it's NNP How did the NN definitively determine that the samples were from a NNP ? Did they take a NN or saliva sample from a living NNP ? If so , how did they VB that close , and why did n't they simply capture it or photograph it ? If the samples were VBN in the wild , how do they VB it was n't left by another NN — or possibly RB a hunter , hiker or camper who left JJ genetic material ? Previous alleged NNP samples subjected to DNA analysis have been deemed " unknown " or " unidentified . " However , " unknown " or " unidentified " results do not mean " NNP . " There are JJ reasons why a DNA sample might come back unknown , including that it was contaminated or too degraded by JJ conditions . Or it MD simply mean that the NN it came from was not among the reference samples that the laboratory VBD for comparison . There is no reference sample of NNP DNA to compare it with , so by definition , there can not be a conclusive NN . Ketchum RB issued a statement requesting that the U.S. NN immediately recognize NNP as " an indigenous NNS and immediately protect their JJ and Constitutional rights against those who MD VB in their physical and cultural differences a ' license ' to hunt , trap , or kill them . " Since no NNP has ever been hunted , trapped or killed , it 's not clear that the creatures — if they exist — require any special federal protection . Ketchum's is not the only genetics - VBN project intended to find NNP . Earlier this NN , NNS from Oxford NNP and the Lausanne Museum of Zoology announced they were collecting samples of alleged NNP and Yeti hair for genetic identification . Oxford geneticist Bryan Sykes collected materials from the NN from NNP through September , and is currently conducting DNA analysis . Once the results are in , he plans to submit his results to a peer - reviewed scientific journal . If Ketchum has the definitive proof she claims , the NN will soon VB about it , and NNP will be proven once and for all . On the other hand , if the evidence never appears , or is inconclusive and flawed , the search will continue . text: Since NNP York City has become the epicenter of the NNP - CD outbreak in the US , it has drawn a lot of attention . But it seems that the NN and NN officials MD not be the only ones with their eyes on the NNP Apple . Most recently a Manhattan woman claimed to have spotted a strange UFO hovering over the area . According to the eyewitness , the mysterious object followed her as she was taking her dog for a walk . The woman , who did not reveal her identity , reported her encounter via the UFO Sightings Daily blog . According to her , she took her dog out for a walk at IN 8 o’clock p.m. on the evening of April 21 , near the upper west side of NNP York City . As she and her dog were walking down the street , she noticed a bright light in the sky . At RB , she thought it was an airplane . However , after walking about half a block , she spotted the same bright object in the sky again . According to the woman , the object did not appear to be moving in a specific direction . Instead , it seemed it was following her as she continued to take her dog for a walk . “ I did half [ a ] block with my dog [ and ] I stopped again and noticed this light [ moved into ] position , but [ it ] was not VBG in a clear direction , ” the woman stated according to UFO Sightings Daily . “ When I [ started ] walking , I noticed this light [ was ] RB moving . When I stopped , the light stopped parallel to me . ” The eyewitness noted that she observed the strange light by walking outside to VB if it MD still follow her . She VBD that wherever she went , the object moved in the same direction . The woman VBD she spent almost an hour walking outside her apartment to observe the strange light ’s movements . Although the NN she took is not clear enough to VB identify the strange object , it is possible that it was a drone being controlled by someone in the area . It is possible that the NN controlling the drone was deliberately following the woman through a mounted camera as a form of a prank , or its movements were purely coincidental . Various NN outlets including CNN and The Hill have reported that drones are sometimes being VBN in the city to monitor the current lockdown status . Others however , speculate that it is not terrestrial authorities that are monitoring the ongoing NN - CD outbreak , but aliens , who themselves are responsible for the release of the NN , as some kind of precursor to invasion . " RB now we 're treating it as a hoax , " VBD Kevin Hill of the NN Department of Wildlife and Fisheries . Meanwhile , the CD loggers -- log foreman Earl Whitstine and saw - cutter Carl Michael Dubois , both of Grant Parish -- are sticking tight to their story that they saw a NNP NN in the Cotton Island area of northeast Rapides Parish last week . Their boss , Joe Delrie , owner of Delrie Wood NNPS of Colfax , VBZ he believes their tale wholeheartedly , despite others ' skepticism about the authenticity of the alleged NNP sightings and tracks VBN in Boggy Bayou . " They all VBP away pretty well convinced , " Ward VBD . A sign put up over the weekend at the entrance to Ward 's property reads " NNP NNP Protection Area . Earl Whitstine VBD his family trapped NNS for extra holiday NN and was in the woods of Grant Parish often . He believes it was this fact that his father was unfairly pegged as a NNP hoaxer . But R.C. Whitstine , 76 , has admitted sawing a footprint out of plywood to VB some tracks . " We were just having some fun with a JJ saw , " he told The Town Talk . As for the current rash of sightings , Earl Whitstine and Dubois VBP the NN they saw in the forest was about seven NNS tall , covered in black hair and had JJ NNS . text: NNP has RB been thought of as a potential ' missing link ' between apes and NNS and now NNS VBP they 've VBN evidence of an " original " version of the mythical NN . A JJ NN proposes that the ' original NNP ' was a 10 - NN tall ape that roamed the NNP CD CD NNS RB . Archaeological evidence of the NN has been VBN in southeastern China . It is being referred to as Gigantopithecus blacki or G. blacki for short . It 's being likened to modern - day orangutans . The NNS VBD that G. Blacki is actually related to orangutans by conducting a JJ kind of NN analysis on some of the tooth enamel from fossilised remains . NN co-author Enrico Cappellini explained : " By sequencing proteins retrieved from dental enamel about 2 CD NNS JJ , we showed it is possible to confidently reconstruct the evolutionary relationships of NN NNS that went extinct too far away in NN for their DNA to survive till now . " In this NN , we can RB conclude that the lineages of orangutan and Gigantopithecus split up about 12 CD NNS RB . " The NNS have worked out that G. blacki likely weighed up to 595 pounds and diverged from orangutans IN 12 CD NNS RB . However , it 's not thought to be closely related to NNS . The NN 's lead author Frido Welker VBD : " With this NN , we show that we can VB NN sequencing to retrieve ancient genetic information from primates living in subtropical areas RB when the fossil is CD CD NNS JJ . " Until now , it has only been possible to retrieve genetic information from up to 10,000 - NN - JJ fossils in warm , humid areas . " This is interesting , because ancient remains of the supposed ancestors of our NNS , Homo sapiens , are RB mainly VBN in subtropical areas , particularly for the early part of JJ evolution . " This means that we can potentially retrieve similar information on the evolutionary line leading to NNS . " Fossils of the ' original NN ' are very rare and only four parital jaws have ever been VBN . However , thousands of teeth have been discovered . We do n't VB for sure what G. blacki MD have looked IN but some artistic impressions depict the NNS as an oversized orangutan . This NN has been published in the scientific journal Nature . text: According to the Cambridge Dictionary , a concentration camp is defined as “ a place where JJ numbers of NNS are kept as prisoners in extremely bad conditions , especially for political reasons . ” It is undeniable that the Rukban camp fits this definition to the letter . DAMASCUS , SYRIA — The NNP NNPS NN has rejected offers to resolve the growing humanitarian NN in the Rukban refugee camp in Syria , which sits inside a 55 km zone occupied by the U.S. along the Syria - Jordan border . The U.S. has RB refused to let any of the estimated 40,000 refugees — the majority of which are NNS and NNS — leave the camp voluntarily , RB though NNS are dying in droves from lack of food , adequate shelter and JJ care . The U.S. has RB not provided humanitarian aid to the camp RB though a U.S. JJ base is located just 20 km ( 12.4 NNS ) away . The growing desperation inside the Rukban camp has received sparse NN coverage , likely because of the U.S. ’ NN over the area in which the camp is located . The U.S. has been accused of refusing to let civilians leave the area — RB though nearly all have expressed a desire to either return to Syrian NN - held territory or seek refuge in neighboring NNS such as Turkey — because the camp ’s presence helps to justify the U.S. ’ illegal occupation of the area . Though the U.S. has RB justified its presence in NNP - Tanf as necessary to defeat Daesh ( ISIS ) , the U.S. NN has RB acknowledged that NNP - Tanf ’s true strategic importance lies in U.S. efforts to “ contain ” Iran by blocking a connection from Iran to Syria through Iraq . NNP - Tanf lies near the area where the borders of Syria , Iraq and Jordan meet . Thus , in the U.S. ’ NN of brinkmanship with Iran , Rukban ’s estimated 40,000 inhabitants have become pawns whose basic needs are ignored by their occupiers . U.S. shows no interest in meeting On Tuesday , delegations from NNP , Syria , the UN , and the Rukban refugee camp met to discuss the fate of the camp ’s inhabitants after a UN survey VBD that 95 percent of the camp ’s inhabitants wanted to leave the camp , while 83 percent wanted to return to their hometowns in areas of Syria now under Syrian NN NN . However , the U.S. NN and NNP Department officials in nearby Jordan rejected an invitation to Tuesday ’s meeting . The U.S. NN RB prohibited a Syrian - Russian delegation from entering the Rukban camp on Tuesday . The delegation had sought to assess conditions in the camp , which have become increasingly desperate according to reports from a variety of outlets , including U.S. NN - funded outlets IN Voice of NNP . The U.S. ’ refusal to attend the meeting or allow the delegation passage comes less than a month after the U.S. NN blocked the entry of evacuation buses overseen by Russian and Syrian forces that MD have allowed refugees to leave the camp . The buses MD have entered through the “ humanitarian corridors ” that were recently opened on the Syrian - controlled side of the U.S. - occupied enclave . While camp inhabitants can , in NN , leave the camp through the corridors on NN , the barren area ’s remoteness makes such evacuations unfeasible without vehicle transport . Although some families have left this NN , the lack of record keeping within the camp has made it impossible to VB how JJ have tried leaving this NN since the corridors were opened last month . An often overlooked problem that has prevented them from leaving is that U.S. - backed and U.S. - trained “ moderate rebel ” groups have been VBN to block camp inhabitants from leaving , demanding JJ payments in U.S. dollars to leave the area . The U.S. NN took NN of NNP - Tanf alongside “ moderate ” rebel forces in 2014 after wresting the area from Daesh . JJ of those opposition groups have since been revealed to have ties and sympathies to terrorist groups , including Daesh . The U.S. has not given a reason for its rejection of Tuesday ’s meeting and had previously VBN that its rejection of the evacuation buses was VBN on its view that the buses did not meet the U.S. ’ “ protection standards . ” While the U.S. has claimed that it has blocked refugees from leaving on Russian - Syrian buses are under U.S. “ protection , ” it has done little to abet the suffering of the tens of thousands of civilians in Rukban , RB though the area is under complete U.S. JJ NN and a U.S. JJ base is just a few NNS away . Indeed , the extent of U.S. “ aid ” to the Rukban camp has been JJ training of the handful of nurses in the camp , who work in conditions they describe as being IN “ the Stone Age ” owing to the chronic lack of basic medications and doctors . While JJ care is decidedly lacking , the most pressing problem is the access to food , as starvation has become a real threat for those living in Rukban . Last October the opposition - aligned NN service , the Syrian Observatory for NNP Rights ( SOHR ) , reported that the Rukban camp had been without food or essential supplies for months . Only CD aid deliveries , managed jointly by the Syrian Arab Red Crescent ( SARC ) and the UN , were able to enter the camp . CD of those shipments , however , almost did n’t happen after the UN delayed the aid “ for logistical and security reasons . ” While the UN did not specify which “ security reasons ” had prompted the delay , it was apparently not the Syrian NN , as the UN RB VBD in the same statement that the convoy had received approval from Damascus . This suggests that the “ security ” concerns were related to U.S. - backed militants in the U.S. - controlled area surrounding NNP - Tanf . Notably , Russian and Syrian sources have claimed that these same militants often “ plunder ” the aid intended for the camp ’s inhabitants for themselves . Since then , the situation inside the camp has continued to deteriorate . Indeed , things have gotten so desperate that , in January , a mother attempted to set herself and her three NNS on fire after she MD n’t find food for three straight days and preferred to give her NNS a quick death rather than watch them starve . Others in the camp rescued the family , though the mother and her infant were seriously injured . Recently aid from the UN and SARC arrived in early February , the JJ aid shipment in over three months . The lack of food combined with the lack of JJ care has been responsible for scores of deaths in the camp — the majority of which are of NNS under the age of CD , who often die from malnutrition and preventable NNS . Others have died from freezing weather owing to a lack of adequate shelter , with eight NNS dying in January for that very reason . Satellite images taken of the camp in early March showed the recent creation of a mass grave containing an estimated 300 bodies adjacent to the camp . Despite the desperate conditions less than 13 NNS from its JJ base , the U.S. has declined to send food , doctors , JJ supplies or other forms of aid to Rukban ’s inhabitants , while RB preventing them from leaving . However , the U.S. has been providing militant groups in the same area with JJ and logistical support . In addition to presiding over the squalid and starvation conditions in the Rukban camp , the U.S. has RB given militant groups present in the area it controls — including Daesh terrorists who have “ embedded ” themselves in the camp on the U.S. ’ watch — free rein to terrorize the camp ’s refugees . These militant groups not only VB the flow of food and aid in the camp but terrorize its most vulnerable inhabitants , forcing NNS and NNS into sex slavery and engaging in JJ trafficking . All of this is taking place in a “ deconfliction zone ” controlled by the U.S. NN . These extremist groups , including Daesh , are well - armed , according to Jordanian Brigadier General Sami Kafawin , who told NBC NNP in CD that these groups “ have whole weapons systems … small arms , RPGs , anti-aircraft . ” The official reason for the U.S. base in NNP - Tanf has RB been counterterrorism operations that ostensibly target Daesh . However , very few attacks against the terror group have been launched from this base and a UN report released last August VBD that Daesh had been given “ breathing NN ” in U.S. - occupied areas of Syria , including NNP - Tanf . The U.S. has stated that it uses the NNP - Tanf base to train Syrian opposition fighters who then VBP the area IN the base , including Rukban . With the U.S. now having claimed that Daesh has been completely defeated in Syria , the official justification for its illegal occupation of Syrian territory is wearing thin . With that justification now on shaky ground , the U.S. is increasingly having to acknowledge its main motive for its presence in NNP - Tanf — containing Iran and keeping Syria divided . Indeed , a recent Reuters article notes that the U.S. - controlled area IN NNP - Tanf that includes the Rukban camp “ is designed to shield U.S. troops at the Tanf garrison and maintain for Washington a strategic foothold in an area close to a crucial supply route for Iranian weapons entering Syria from Iraq . ” This was confirmed by General Joseph Votel late last NN when he told NBC NNP that the U.S. base in NNP - Tanf was key in countering “ the sway of Iran ” in Syria . This followed statements made last July by National Security Advisor John Bolton that U.S. troops MD remain in Syria “ as RB as the Iranian menace continues throughout the Middle East . ” This policy of Iran containment has clearly guided U.S. policy in Syria of late , with at least 1,000 U.S. troops set to stay in Syria illegally despite Daesh ’s defeat and NNP Donald NNP ’s recent calls for a troop withdrawal . The U.S. has been accused of using the civilians trapped in Rukban as a “ shield ” for its continued operations in Syria aimed at containing Iran ’s regional influence . Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov VBD earlier this month that “ the fact that NNS are not allowed to leave [ the camp ] and are held hostage makes CD suggest that the U.S. needs this camp to continue justifying its illegitimate presence there . ” There appear to be few other explanations for the U.S. ’ refusal to let camp inhabitants leave the area . The hypocrisy of U.S. “ humanitarian concerns ” The situation in the Rukban camp reveals the dark reality behind the U.S. ’ occupation of Syrian territory in NNP - Tanf and elsewhere . In order to pursue its policy of Iran “ containment ” and a divided and partitioned Syria , the U.S. is willing to imprison some 40,000 NNS — JJ of them NNS — in a concentration camp where international aid is blocked and where food is so scarce that mothers are setting themselves and their NNS on fire so they can avoid slowly starving to death . According to the Cambridge Dictionary , a concentration camp is defined as “ a place where JJ numbers of NNS are kept as prisoners in extremely bad conditions , especially for political reasons . ” It is undeniable that the Rukban camp fits this definition to the letter . That the U.S. justifies its aggressive policies IN the NN — from Syria to Venezuela and elsewhere — as being motivated by “ humanitarian concerns ” — when a refugee camp under the U.S. ’ complete NN in Syria is facing starvation conditions and its inhabitants are being forcefully kept confined in the camp by the U.S. NN despite their expressed desire to leave — is an obscene Orwellian twist . All this to “ contain ” Iranian influence in the Middle East . Top photo | The unofficial Rukban camp for displaced Syrians , between the Jordan and Syria borders , Feb. 14 , CD . text: Finding NNP is an JJ television series on NNP NNP . It premiered on NNP 29 , 2011 . The program follows four NNS and explorers investigating potential evidence of NNP , a cryptid hominid allegedly living in the wildernesses of the NNP NNPS and Canada . While the Finding NNP NN never captured photographic evidence of the NN 's existence , the show gained high ratings and was a top earner for NNP NNP . The series finale and the 100th episode was released on NNP 27 , 2018 . The NN consists of NNP Field NNPS Organization ( BFRO ) founder and NNP Matt Moneymaker , NNS James " Bobo " Fay and Cliff Barackman , and skeptical scientist Ranae Holland . The series never questions the existence of NN , but rather documents the NN 's search efforts and NN of potential evidence in an attempt to prove the existence of the NN . Over the course of the series , the NN has introduced JJ JJ NN related terms into the JJ vernacular . For example , the term " NN " is rarely VBN in favor of " squatch " ( short for NN ) . Their investigations are referred to as " squatchin' " . The areas they investigate are often described as " Squatchy " , with Washington having been described as " the squatchiest NN . " An episode begins with the Finding NNP NN driving to a location on the trail of photographic , NN , audio , or eyewitness evidence of a NNP . The NN will VB to the location where the evidence was gathered from , and speak to the NN who gathered the evidence . If it is a photograph or a NN , the NN will perform a recreation and a size comparison of the event , using the same camera that the witness VBD . The NN then performs their JJ night investigation at that same location . Starting with the second NN , CD member of the NN will almost always remain at the location for a solo night investigation for several more nights . The other three ( or four in the JJ NN ) members will then head to a ' town hall meeting ' to which members of the NN are invited to come and share their NNP encounter stories . In some heavily NNP reported areas , such as Washington , these events are sometimes invite only . After the witnesses tell their encounter stories , they are asked to mark their sighting locations on a map , which the NN then uses to look for a pattern of sightings . The NN will then visit three of the best - reported encounters , that are RB close to CD another . After visiting all three witnesses , the NN will collect the member who was doing the solo night investigation and select an area to do their final night investigation . For the final night investigation , the NN RB devises a unique plan to try to attract a NNP , RB involving noise or light , by using boats on a lake , or silent electric ATVs . They RB do wood knocks , which mimics the NN 's supposed communication . Night - vision technology and forward looking infrared ( FLIR ) cameras are VBN to document these investigations . They will then evaluate what they learned and announce their evaluations during the ending credits . Occasionally , they will show their trail cam pictures or DNA results following the credits / summary . In the third NN , the NN expanded their search from NNP NNP to investigate the NNP phenomenon VBN as " yowies " in NNP . Later in the NN , they traveled to Indonesia searching for the " orang pendek " , and to Vietnam to search for the " wildman " . [ 7 ] In NN four , the NN traveled to China in search of the " yeren " , and Nepal in search of the " yeti " . In later seasons , the NN traveled to other NNS , including the NNP Kingdom and Brazil . NN 5 of Finding NNP debuted on June 8 , 2014 , as opposed to November when the last CD seasons started . On October 20 , CD , the Finding NNP cast and crew revisited California to attend the 50th anniversary festival while filming the 100th episode of the show . On NNP 27 , 2018 , the 100th and finale episode was released on NNP NNP . It was entitled " Return of the Legend " . NNP NNP has received criticism for Finding NNP and Mermaids : The NNP VBN [ 8 ] for their " outlandishness " , however , Fay is quick to defend Finding NNP , and to draw a line between the CD programs . " You ca n't equate NN with mermaids . " [ 9 ] Several episodes of the JJ NN received heavy criticism from the four ' Finding NNP ' members themselves , for the editing style that NNP NNP VBD , to VB it appear that a horse and a NN were unidentified by the NN , and what they were remained unknown . The second event , involving the horse , led the NN to threaten to quit the show if such techniques were VBN again . [ 10 ] Regardless , Finding NNP is CD of NNP NNP 's top rated programs . [ 11 ] It has spawned CD spin- offs : Finding NNP : Further Evidence and Finding NNP : Rejected Evidence . Finding NNP : Further Evidence is similar to VH - 1's Pop - Up NN . Episodes of Finding NNP are re-aired with " info nuggets " from the NN members . Finding NNP : Rejected Evidence is an JJ - only series , in which executive producer Keith Hoffman airs NN deemed not worthy of inclusion on the show . [ 12 ] NNP enthusiasts have often ridiculed the show , due to the NN 's consistent lack of success , and the fact that any footage of a NNP MD be reported RB before an episode airs . [ 13 ]

These downloads , which Creighton RB had , work on the subconscious level . . . meaning you attract everything you need to achieve those goals . text: * Third major Gulf of Mexico project in less than 3 months HOUSTON , Dec 16 ( Reuters ) - Chevron Corp ( CVX.N ) has approved $ 4 CD for its NNP NNP project , in its second major Gulf of Mexico NN in CD months , RB as tougher rules and higher costs loom for U.S. deepwater operators . Royal Dutch Shell Plc ( RDSa.L ) gave the NN - ahead in late September for a second deepwater production hub at its prolific NNP field in the Gulf , indicating the major NN NNS will shoulder extra costs to maintain production growth near CD of the NN ’s biggest NN markets . “ Sanctioning NNP NNP underscores our commitment to the Gulf of Mexico and will contribute to future U.S. NN supply , ” George Kirkland , vice chairman of Chevron , VBD in a statement on Thursday . Chevron , NNP NNP ’s operator , controls 60 percent of the project , while Norway ’s Statoil STL.OL has 27.5 percent and Japan ’s Marubeni Corp ( 8002.T ) holds the remainder . Chevron , the second - largest U.S. NN NN behind Exxon Mobil Corp ( XOM.N ) , has continued to invest in the Gulf despite lingering uncertainty over U.S. regulations following BP Plc ’s ( BP.L ) NN spill , with drilling permits still hard to secure . Chevron VBD in October it planned to spend $ 7.5 CD at its Jack / St Malo project in the Gulf . [ ID :nN21259958 ] Chevron RB extended contracts for CD shallow - NN rigs in the Gulf by six months , at higher rates , rig owner Ensco Plc ESV.N VBD late on Wednesday . Marubeni , meanwhile , sublet deepwater rig Ensco 8502 for 35 days as the existing client awaits a permit , possibly to drill in CD of the four fields Marubeni just bought from BP . [ ID :nTOE69O060 ] NNP NNP , located about 225 NNS ( 360 km ) RB of NNP Orleans in NN depths of 5,200 NNS ( 1,600 m ) , is expected to have production capacity of 75,000 barrels of NN and 25 CD cubic NNS of natural NN IN day . JJ NN is anticipated in 2014 , which will be a JJ NN for Chevron . The NN is expecting overall annual production growth of only 1 percent through 2014 , when its JJ massive natural NN NN off NNP will start up . The San Ramon , California - VBN NN VBD last week it planned to increase spending by 20 percent next NN , with most of its $ 26 CD budget earmarked for exploration and production . [ ID:nN09222898 ] . Chevron shares rose 1.2 percent on Thursday to $ 89.06 , their best close since September 2008 , compared with a 0.56 percent rise in the Chicago Board Options Exchange index of NN NNS . . OIX ( Reporting by Anna Driver and Kristen Hays in Houston and Braden Reddall in San Francisco , editing by Gerald E. McCormick , John Wallace and Matthew Lewis )

text: The U.S. NN released NNP 's NNP file yesterday ( June 5 ) . It contains a few NN clippings , and some formal letters to and from a monster hunter in the 1970s — leading to an examination of 15 hairs and some NN the hunter believed came from " a NNP . " It appears that Peter Byrne , that monster hunter , RB wrote to the NNP on Aug. 26 , 1976 . His note , printed on fancy letterhead reading " The NNP Information Center and Exhibition , " suggested that the NNP was in possession of flesh and hair belonging to a mysterious NN , possibly belonging to a " NNP . " " Gentlemen , " Byrne wrote , " Will you kindly , to set the record straight , once and for all , inform us if the NNP , has examined hair which might be that of a NNP ; when this took place , if it did take place ; what the results of the analysis were . " [ Titanosaur Photos : Meet the Largest Dinosaur on Record ] He did n't indicate why he suspected that the NNP might have done such an analysis , only that , " from NN to NN we have been informed that hair , supposedly of a NNP … has been examined by the NNP . , and with the conclusion , as a report of the examination , that it was not possible to compare the hair with that of any VBN NN on this continent . " Byrne appears to have been concerned that the agency MD n't take The NNP Information Center seriously . " Please understand that our research here is serious , " he wrote , " That this is a serious question that needs answering . " He RB assured the agency that they need n't worry about his implying their involvement in his work . " An examination of hair , or the opposite , but the NNP . , does not in any NN , as far as we are concerned , suggest that the FBI. , is associated with our project or confirms in any NN the possibility of the existence of the NN (s ) VBN as NNP , " he wrote . Assistant NNP Director of the agency 's laboratory division Jay Cochran Jr. replied CD weeks later , on Sept. 10 , 1976 . " Since the publication of the ' Washington NNP Atlas ' in 1975 , which referred to such examinations , we have received several inquiries similar to yours , " he wrote . " However , we have been unable to locate any references to such examinations in our files . " More than CD months later , on Nov. 24 , 1976 , Byrne replied . Perhaps emboldened by the earlier response , he asked not for information but for a favor . [ Real or Not ? The NNP Behind 12 Unusual Sightings ] " Briefly , we do not often come across hair which we are unable to identify , and the hair that we have now , about 15 hairs attached to a tiny piece of NN , is the JJ that we have obtained in six NNS which we feel MD be of importance , " he wrote . He asked if Cochran " MD possibly arrange for a comparative analysis " of the tissue to determine its origin . At the NN all this was VBG on , NNP was in the NN . Byrne had been searching for the NN for five NNS , supported by the Academy of Applied NNP ( AAS ) , a small institution in Boston that , according to a document in the file , RB sponsored hunts for the Loch Ness monster . The NNP York Times had profiled the 50 - NN - JJ Byrne 's adventures in June of 1976 , calling him a " JJ professional hunter in Nepal who switched from tiger shooting and yeti hunting to tiger conservation and NN hunting . " " Most [ NNP sightings ] are eventually discounted as insubstantial or faked , " The NNP York Times wrote . " But a handful hold up and are given high credibility . So far Mr. Byrne , though he has never seen a NNP himself , has collected the details of 94 reported sightings that seem believable . There are JJ more reports of tracks . " The paper recounted several of those supposedly more credible sightings , and a clipping of that article was included in the NNP file . The next document in the file , in chronological order , was Cochran 's instruction to examine the hairs Byrne passed along . " This does not represent a NN in Bureau policy , " a memorandum included in the file NNS , in an apparent effort to justify the decision . " The … Laboratory Branch has a history of making its unique services and expertise available to the Smithsonian Institution , other museums , universities and NN agencies in archeological matters and in the interest of research and legitimate scientific inquiry . " [ The 25 Most Mysterious Archaeological Finds on NNP ] Unfortunately for NNP hunters , the results were n't what they MD have hoped . In 1977 , the lab examined the 15 hairs . A final letter from Cochran , addressed to Howard S. Curtis , Executive Vice NN of the AAS , read IN this : The hairs which you recently delivered to the NNP Laboratory on behalf of the NNP Information Center and Exhibition have been examined by transmitted and incident light microscopy . The examination included a NN of morphological characteristics such as root structure , medullary structure and cuticle thickness in addition to scale casts . RB the hairs were compared directly with hairs of VBN origin under a comparison microscope . It was concluded as a result of these examinations that the hairs are of deer family origin . The hair sample you submitted is being returned as an enclosure to this letter , Curtis replied March 8 , thanking Cochran and saying he'd pass the NN on to Byrne when the monster hunter returned from Nepal . You can read the full NNP NNP file here . Live NNP has reached out to Byrne for additional comment , and will update this article if he replies . • Rumor or Reality : The Creatures of Cryptozoology

text: — Germany puts its NN down on the e-Privacy Regulation , asking for more protection for NNS . — Digitization and artificial intelligence are among the priorities of the NNP Parliament 's leaders for the next five NNS . Good morning and welcome to Morning Tech . It 's a JJ holiday in some NNP NNS , including Belgium . But we 're here to keep you NN if you 're stuck at work . LONDON TECH WEEK : Yes , it ’s that NN of NN again when techies from the British capital ( and a whole bunch of politicians ) break out the party balloons to celebrate London ’s top spot on the JJ scene . Expect NN announcements , claims of record investment and a lot of crowing that Brexit wo n’t hurt the U.K. digital NN . But if you dig a little deeper , there are CD warring factions within ' U.K. Tech ' fighting over what the NN ’s pending departure from the NNP Union RB means — and how the NN ’s policies are affecting how the local industry will grow . For more from Mark , read below or click here . NN of the optimists : You do n’t have to venture far from hipster Shoreditch or well - heeled Mayfair to hear startup founders and venture capitalists tell you that the volatility created by Brexit ‘ is a great opportunity . ” And so far , the figures show that the U.K. is doing just fine . The NN garnered $ 8.7 CD in venture funding last NN , according to Dealroom , the NN provider . And wherever you look , local ‘ unicorns ’ are being created faster than you can pay £ 5 for an overpriced JJ white coffee near Silicon Roundabout . NN for the pessimists : Just IN everything in divided Britain , not everyone agrees with this assessment , claiming that lagging indicators IN venture NN do n’t RB tell you what ’s VBG on IN the NN today . Instead , they point to a gradual fall in JJ techies showing up to work in the NN ’s digital ecosystem ( and the ongoing NN of rival hubs in Berlin and Paris ) as a telling ( leading ) indicator that not all is well in the NN of U.K. tech . What about the politicians ? Glad you asked . Amid this techie stand - off , U.K. lawmakers are playing the ‘ cake and eat it , too ’ strategy of both trying to woo NNS to the local tech scene , while RB pushing ahead with some of the most aggressive digital regulation anywhere in the Western NN . Just IN a page out of the Brexit playbook , few policymakers are yet willing to VB tough decisions about how to handle the future growth of London and the rest of the NN ’s tech sector . That ’s leaving JJ locals scratching their heads about how the U.K. will continue to grow without proper leadership from those in Westminster . Talking of London Tech Week , Theresa NNP , the outgoing U.K. prime minister announced £ 153 CD in NN funding this morning focused on supporting next - generation computing technology . She RB VBD that 2,500 places MD be made available on artificial intelligence and NN conversion courses starting in 2020 , and that a panel of local techies MD write a NN on the NN 's tech competitiveness amid the uncertainty caused by Brexit . " If we are VBG to maintain our position as a JJ leader , our challenge is how we develop British Tech and VBP it RB better , " NNP is expected to VB later this morning . " We VBP this to be the place everyone thinks of — and comes to — RB when they VBP to develop their NN changing tech ideas . " COMMISSIONERS ' WHEREABOUTS : Justice Commissioner Vĕra Jourová is in Prague , where she speaks at a roundtable on Artificial Intelligence . Digital Commissioner Mariya Gabriel is in Sofia , and meets with various Bulgarian ministers . MARK YOUR CALENDAR : The NNP of Justice of the NNP Union will rule on the NNP vs. Germany ’s telecoms regulator NN June 13 . Judges will have to determine whether Gmail is a telecoms service . GERMANY ASKS FOR MORE PROTECTION IN E-PRIVACY : Morning Tech did not VB that NN coming . During Friday ’s Telecom Council , the German minister VBD Berlin “ ca n’t support the [ e - Privacy ] text at the moment because of the wide - ranging powers to process communications NNS without the consent of the final user . ” Pressing for a higher level of privacy protection , he VBD Germany “ rejects Article 6 at the moment , particularly when it comes to localization NN and compatible further processing . ” Ministers were discussing the Romanian presidency 's progress report . Watch out for Germany ’s position paper : The minister VBD they are preparing a document to feed future discussions . Ireland and the U.K. on a different page : Ireland RB has reservations about Article 6 , but for different reasons : Dublin fears it is over - protective and MD hinder the fight against child pornography ( a POLITICO investigation in March showed NNP RB pushes that argument in lobby meetings with the Irish NN ) . The U.K. RB mentioned child sexual abuse , but RB insisted on the importance of clarifying the interaction between e-Privacy and GDPR to avoid legal uncertainty . The British minister asked for “ future - proof definitions ” and VBD the scope was not entirely clear . “ We MD not VB this measure to take JJ broadcasting into the definition of direct marketing , ” she VBD . The Commission ’s ( unsurprising ) disappointment : Digital Commissioner Mariya Gabriel expressed disappointment as she wanted NNP NNS to have made an agreement on the text by now . She urged “ the incoming Finnish presidency [ to ] tackle the remaining points . ” Finland will take the helm of the NNP Council in July , but already hinted it MD not reach a general approach on the file . GDPR AT CJEU : A German NN asked a preliminary question to the NNP of Justice of the NNP on the scope of the NN of NN access by NNS under the GDPR . The NN wishes to VB whether the NN of access is “ applicable to the committee of a parliament of a constituent NN of a Member NN that is responsible for processing the petitions of citizens — namely the Petitions Committee of the Hesse NNP Parliament . ” H/T Frederik Borgesius . ** Ready for the CD JJ revolutions facing JJ affairs ? 1 . A total political reset after the 2019 NNP NN and 2 . the political pressure from customer - citizens on businesses . Your JJ affairs function will become increasingly strategic to safeguard your NN 's interests . To VB ready , join us on September 27 , 2019 in Paris at the NNP NNP Affairs Forum . Contact us today at gpac@dii.eu or call us at +33 1 43 12 85 58 .** DIGITIZATION AND AI AMONG THE PARLIAMENT LEADERS ’ FIVE PRIORITIES : Leaders of the NNP Parliament last week agreed on five areas they VBP the NNP to prioritize over the next five NNS , according to the group leaders ' agreement seen by POLITICO ’s Florian Eder . JJ and NN issues top the list , followed by JJ , competition policy and industrial policy ; taxation ; innovation , digitalization , artificial intelligence and consumer protection ; rule of law and fundamental rights . Austrian EPP MEPs VBP committee picks : The delegation of JJ chancellor Sebastian Kurz , which has seven MEPs , is led by Othmar Karas . Several parliamentarians will ask for committees involved in tech regulation : Karas himself wants to be on the Industry committee , Karoline Edtstadler on the Civil Liberties and Legal Affairs committees , Barbara Thaler on the Internal NNP committee and Alexander Bernhuber on the Culture committee . G20 AGREES , OR DOES IT ? Over the weekend , finance ministers from the NN 's largest economies agreed to overhaul how the likes of NNP and NNP pay taxes worldwide , a potential breakthrough in the bitter debate about where these tech giants should pay NN . As part of the proposals , which are expected to be finalized by the end of next NN , NNS will now hammer out the details , including potential divvying up the rights to NN firms when their goods or services are sold locally , RB if NNS do n't have a physical presence nationally . If that still does n't work , governments MD then be able to levy a JJ minimum NN rate . At RB , it 's hard not to VB this as a victory for France ( and the NNP Kingdom ) , both NNS that have pushed ahead with their own local ( digital revenue ) taxes because of the lack of a consensus , either across the NNP or globally . Speaking at the G20 conference , France 's Bruno Le Maire VBD : " We have a JJ JJ NN VBN on digital activities and VBN on the sale and exchange and NN of massive NNS . ” But , but , but : The NNP NNPS still remains opposed to such digital taxes , claiming that they represent unfair taxation against its tech giants , whereas other NNS ' JJ firms ( IN Germany 's automakers ) VBP a free pass under the proposed JJ regime . With more than a NN to VB before these rules are supposed to come into force , expect a heavy lobbying fight to either VB down the digital NN proposals , or efforts to extend them to other parts of the JJ NN ( where other NNS ' firms dominate ) . Yes , the G20 is moving ahead . But that does n't mean the fight is over . TELECOM MINISTERS ’ WISHLIST : Telecom ministers highlighted cybersecurity , artificial intelligence and fair competition as priorities for the next five NNS , in their conclusions adopted at Friday 's Telecoms Council . National governments VBD : " Europe ’s cybersecurity capacity should be reinforced in order to protect its digital infrastructures , NNS , services and NNS , and its JJ competitiveness and digital sovereignty . " It called for regional hubs on cybersecurity to boost " technological and industrial capacity . " The text RB mentioned the " importance of transparency , fairness , accountability and responsibility in the NN of algorithms , so that JJ platforms across the NNP operate in a transparent and predictable manner . " MACRON TALKS 'SMART REGULATION ' WITH NNP CEO : The French NN Emmanuel Macron met with Jack Dorsey Friday in Paris to discuss the G7 Call to Action and NNP 's efforts on content regulation . " NNS VBP more safety , more privacy , more trust on the web . They VBP their lives protected and democracy preserved . You are willing to VB NNP a safer place and I share this goal . I count on you [ Jack Dorsey ] to deliver together on smart regulation , transparency , NN ownership , " Macron tweeted after the meeting . Dorsey VBD ( in French ) he MD continue working towards a " safer internet . " The Élysée palace did not reply to a request for comment . MICROSOFT CUTS DEAL WITH FRENCH NN AUTHORITIES : The U.S. NN agreed last NN to pay €350 CD in back taxes to cover the 2010 - 2012 period , according to French NN . French authorities made similar deals with Amazon and Apple . “ Neither [ the ministry of NN ] nor Microsoft have officially communicated on the agreement , ” ZDNet added . THE NNP EDITION : NNP ’s telecoms regulator VBD nine major VPNs MD soon be blocked because they refused to deny access to sites featuring on the NN 's national blacklist , Torrent Freak reports . Kaspersky Secure Connection , however , agreed to comply , the regulator ’s chief VBD . Russian disinformation draws ads on NNP : NNS VBD that 14 NNP channels linked to NNP and spreading JJ NN generated billions of views and millions of dollars in ad revenues . RB , videos from those channels were not labeled as NN - sponsored , despite pledges from NNP ’s NNP to flag such content . Read more on Reuters . CHIFFRE DU JOUR : €55 CD . That ’s how much more the rolling out of 5G networks in Europe MD cost without Chinese vendors Huawei and ZTE , according to a NN by GSMA . Email pro@politico.eu with the code " TECH " for a complimentary NN . UK ca n’t VB up its mind on tech Digital Politics is a column about the JJ intersection of technology and the NN of politics . LONDON — There 's a lot Britain can't agree on . Brexit . Who should be the NN 's next prime minister . Jeremy Corbyn's leadership of the Labour Party . Add to that list : What to do about tech . This week , London — still Europe 's tech capital despite the ongoing political uncertainty — will play host to its annual " tech week " — part marketing ploy , part cheerleading fest to showcase what the British capital , and the rest of the NN , has to offer when it comes to glitzy startups , venture capital investment and NN support for the digital NN . Yet in Westminster 's halls of NN , the hipster mecca of East London and the well - heeled offices of Mayfair , CD rival factions are bickering over the NN of the U.K.'s tech sector — and how it will fare once the NN eventually leaves the NNP Union . On CD side are the optimists , those who cite the NN 's record tech investment figures since it voted for Brexit in CD as a sign that everything is VBG great . They dismiss the current political impasse as a mere speed bump on the road to the U.K. putting tech at the center of its future industrial strategy . On the other side stand the pessimists , who fret about the gradual slowdown of highly educated ( JJ ) tech migrants rocking up to fill much - needed jobs in both startups and legacy tech NNS . On top of that , the NN 's aggressive push to regulate the industry — everything from proposed JJ digital taxes on NNP Tech to greater policing of NNS 's JJ NN chatter — has raised eyebrows about its future support for local tech . The stakes MD not be higher . The U.K. NN has largely bet its JJ future on the NN 's burgeoning digital sector . And so far , it can't VB up its mind whether to double down on its assistance for local firms and international giants IN NNP and NNP — be it through hundreds of millions of pounds of JJ funding or high - profile digital skills programs — or fall in line with politicians worldwide and the growing " techlash " against all things digital . " They RB need to attract investment funds to VB sure the tech sector keeps growing , " VBD Luca Schiavoni , a digital regulation analysts at Assembly Research , a consultancy firm in London . " But at the same NN , it 's RB difficult to run into someone in Westminster who believes the tech sector does n't need more regulation . " Surely it does n't have to be a binary choice between pro-industry JJ policies and arguably CD of the toughest regulatory clampdowns anywhere in the Western NN ? But just IN the other hot - button socio- JJ topics now confronting the British NN , what to " do " about tech needs an answer . And it needs CD quickly . What 's muddying the waters is how the local tech scene has faired since the CD Brexit referendum . Depending on whom you talk to , the NN 's digital NN is either full steam ahead or rocketing toward a cliff edge . Figures published on Monday by TechNation ( a quasi - NN entity ) paint a rosy picture , with U.K. venture capital investment last NN hitting $ 8.7 CD — easily outmatching France and Germany to claim top spot in JJ tech funding . The number of U.K. startups worth at least $ 1 CD in 2018 RB reached 13 , more than all similar fledgling firms in Germany , Israel and Sweden combined . On top of that , local lawmakers have earmarked hundreds of millions of additional funding through the British Business Bank ( another quasi - NN institution ) to VB local techies . Industry veterans — JJ of whom invested locally , so have NN in the NN to play up the positives — RB highlight London 's continued ability to attract top talent as reasons why Westminster 's disjointed approach to the sector should not be NN for concern . " The U.K. is not the only NN having a problem with politics , " VBD Martin Mignot , a French partner at Index Ventures , a London - VBN fund whose investments include Transferwise , a successful local foreign currency exchange startup , and Net - A - Porter , the British e-commerce NN . " But once you 've got the basics IN rule of law and functioning democracy , startups are n't VBG to do badly or well just because of the political situation . " Not everyone is so sanguine . While the U.K. NN has increased the number of visas for foreign nationals looking to start a tech ( or other ) business , JJ in industry are n't convinced that the current conveyor belt of international talent will continue when the NN finally leaves the 28 - nation bloc . Britain has already lost its top spot among NNP destinations as the place to VB for the region 's tech workers , according to NNS from LinkedIn . In CD , 14.9 percent of all Europe 's tech talent headed to the U.K. in search of work , compared with 13.8 percent of workers traveling to Germany , the second most popular NN . But last NN , Germany pulled RB with Britain , with both garnering 14.6 percent of all NNP digital nomads , while France — championed by its NN , Emmanuel Macron — has done all that it can to knock the U.K. off its perch as the region 's top digital ecosystem . It 's not just talent that MD be drying up . A recent survey by KPMG and IHS Markit , CD consultancies , shows that JJ output from the U.K.'s tech sector had begun to slow , though it 's still expanding each quarter at a faster rate than other sectors , and wages to attract and hold onto talent have skyrocketed , hurting businesses ' overall bottom lines . For Giles Derrington , associate director of policy at TechUK , a local trade NN whose members include JJ giants IN NNP and Apple as well as U.K. NNS IN chip designer ARM Holdings and Sage , the digital accountancy provider , this uncertainty is making it harder for NNS to justify future investment in Britain — particularly when the chances of a no -deal Brexit are on the rise . " The U.K. has always been an obvious center for investment into the NNP , " he VBD . " Now , that 's a lot harder NN to VB for businesses . They do n't have a clear sense of what the rule of law will look IN in the U.K. for the foreseeable future . "

text: JJ dream of summiting the NN ’s tallest peak , Mount Everest , which soars to 29,035 NNS and straddles the Nepal - China border . Sir Edmund Hillary and Tensing Norgay RB accomplished the feat in 1953 via Nepal ’s NNP Col , which remains CD of the most common routes today . The Nepali NN relies on the tourism revenue generated by Everest , and in 2019 it issued a record 381 permits to climbers and a nearly equal number to local Sherpas , who set up the camps and lead the climbers up the mountain . ( Here 's why the NN 's most daunting mountains inspire us . ) Besides the glory of standing on the roof of the NN , climbing Everest comes with a significant amount of controversy . Over the NNS , the JJ number of climbers and support staff have left massive amounts of trash and waste on the mountain , though in recent NNS the Nepali NN and private organisations have taken steps to clean up the area IN base camp . This NN critics cited the JJ number of permits as a possible contributor to some of the NN 's 11 deaths on the mountain . The JJ number of NNS seeking to VB the summit combined with fewer windows of favourable weather created traffic jams on the route to the summit . ( Read more stories about adventurers on Mount Everest . ) Until conditions improve at Mount Everest , beat the crowds and VBP preserve the environment by looking to other epic climbs IN the NN . Here are nine of our favorites . In Mongolia , it ’s easy for a traveller to be quickly swept away by the endless JJ steppes , the heartiness of the Kazakh nomads , and the rolling landscapes that define the Altai Mountains . This makes the trek to Mount Khuiten as enjoyable and scenic as the climb itself . The mountain straddles the corners of NNP , China , and Mongolia . To reach it , trekkers must cross a golden , vast , and barren landscape that is CD of the last remote regions on NNP . This remarkable journey is enhanced by the gentle hospitality of the Kazakh nomads . JJ - topped Kilimanjaro is Africa ’s highest mountain . Located on Tanzania ’s northern border with Kenya , the mountain is made up of three extinct volcanoes , Kibo , Mawenzi , and Shira . The highest peak , Uhuru , is 19,340 NNS high . Reaching the top of Kilimanjaro is exhilarating . Take the Machame Route up so you can VB the region ’s wonderful NNS and birds . Then you ’ll begin the trek across the Shira Plateau through the Grand Barranco Canyon and on to the top . If all goes as planned , you ’ll reach Stella Point with a chance to continue IN Kibo ’s rim to Uhuru . The Inca Trail in Peru is an in - depth journey through a variety of ecosystems , from plains to desert to tropical cloud forests . You ’ll pass views of snowcapped mountains and rushing rivers . The highlight is Machu Picchu , the famed lost city of the Inca that was discovered in 1911 by Hiram Bingham . Then continue your trek to what was the heart and soul of the Inca Empire , Cusco . ( Discover 10 secrets of Machu Picchu . ) Nestled in the Swiss Alps , the Matterhorn is the most recognised mountain on the JJ continent , and probably the NN . In the NN of a roughly chiseled rock pyramid , this peak serves as a defining geographical landmark . For JJ climbers , ascending the Matterhorn , the birthplace of the sport of mountaineering , represents a return to the purist traditions of climbing . Dynamic in both region and terrain , NNP 's Mount Elbrus stands as a watchtower in the Caucasus Mountains between Europe and Asia . Elbrus is a JJ , double - coned volcano , whose summits vary by about 65 NNS . For the climber with moderate skills , the highest mountain in Europe has great appeal because it presents a strenuous , yet rewarding climb . The mountain ’s location affords visitors excellent opportunities to VB the region ’s JJ melting pot of ethnic groups , such as Turkish , Georgian , Azeri , and Russian . In the heart of Mexico , about 800 NNS RB of the NNP NNPS border , Citlaltépetl and Iztaccíhuatl are the third and seventh highest mountains respectively in NNP NNP . The JJ is 18,406 NNS tall , while the second is 17,159 NNS tall . Ascents of these CD volcanoes are by far the most attractive climbs in Mexico . From a distance , it ’s easy to VB how Iztaccíhuatl or “ white woman ” got its name ; the snowcapped peaks look IN the head , breasts , and NNS of a sleeping woman .

text: As an independent Scientist and JJ researcher since 1994 , I have been working ( ) , on a completely JJ NN for circulation within NNS , NNS and plants . My discovery was initially in trees . In 1995 , I demonstrated the JJ paradigm to Forestry Commission NNS and journalists , causing NN to flow up a single length of open ended tubing at a cliff in Brixham , Devon , to a height of 78 NNS and demolished a three hundred NN JJ law of physics ( Torricelli ) . The discovery is founded upon gravity and evaporation . Salts and sugars are concentrated as a result of evaporation , making the fluids heavier , gravity draws the heavy fluids down and the less dense fluids are drawn up in a return flow ( for every action there must be a reaction ) . Anything that interferes with evaporation ( damp / humidity ) , compromises circulation , when circulation within the JJ NN is compromised , it causes lethargy and affects NNS and hands RB ! Since 1994 , my efforts have been concentrated on helping NNS with debilitating illnesses by tilting the bed in an inclined position , ( head raised 5 - 8 degrees to the horizontal . Gravity has been shown to be significant in reversing neurological and non-neuro conditions , non-more compelling than the recent Carlton TV NN coverage of a NN walking , after ten NNS of paralysis due to a spinal cord injury . ( Reporter : Tim Iredale , Carlton TV NNP , Devon . ) This discovery is simple , true and repeatable and has the most profound implications for the benefit of mankind ! Yet , NNS , ministers , charities and most of the JJ profession chose to ignore , what is after all basic , pure NN . How RB can a scientific NN be ignored ? Once gravity is accepted as the primary NN of circulation , it becomes clear to understand why NN and mouth NN affects the flesh IN the hooves of grazing NNS . It is not a coincidence that hooves , tusks and RB finger and toenails occur where they do . They are merely disposal sites for heavy substances , which arrive , where they do because of gravity ! It is no coincidence that we , the most vertical of all NNS , are the most successful ! Gravity is evolution ! The specific gravity of urine for instance was VBN to determine whether gravity driven circulation MD be taking place in NNS and NNS , In a similar process . For example respiration causes NN to evaporate from the lungs and respiratory tract . Fluids remaining in the NN contain minerals and must therefore be concentrated by the loss of mineral free NN ( evaporation ) . Gravity causes the heavy solution to be drawn back through the lining of the lungs and respiratory tract and down through the vessels in the NN , carrying dissolved oxygen with it . Concentrated solutions arrive at the bladder via the kidneys where they are excreted in the urine . However the kidneys are not 100 % efficient and some minerals arrive in the lowest anatomical extremities , solidifying as finger and toenails or horses hooves etc . Clippings of which sink when dropped into NN . 5 degree to the horizontal head down tilt over CD week decreased the specific gravity of urine to a near zero reading . 5 degree to the horizontal head up tilt over CD week significantly increased the specific gravity of urine when compared to horizontal bedrest . Gravity does indeed play an important roll in renal function ! Toxins leave the NN more efficiently when the JJ NN is correctly aligned with the direction of gravity . The physiology of pig is very close to NNS . So close in fact that pig is now VBN to cultivate replacement organs for NNS . PRP MD deduce that JJ of todays illnesses affecting us MD RB be affecting pig and visa - versa . In fact almost all of the drugs VBN in veterinary practice today have a JJ equivalent which in JJ NNS is identical to those prescribed to NNS in all but the name of the NN . ( VB Page 5 NN NN ) It is RB worth remembering that JJ of these drugs have been tested on NNS before entering the £ multi-billion consumer marketplaces , which currently satisfies the JJ and scientific industries . Towards the end of the NN 2000 , while driving past a pig farm on three occasions , I noticed that the NNS were walking IN ankle deep in NN , mud , urine and excrement . Due undoubtedly to the excessive rainfall Britain was experiencing at the NN and I remember thinking to myself that these unfortunate NNS were exposed to JJ factors that MD not be healthy to VB the least . If NNS were correct about the physiological similarities between pigs and NNS , then these pigs were in real trouble due to the appalling weather conditions they were exposed to . Take a thousand NNS , strip them naked and leave them to face the same elements and NN logged fields we have seen here in Britain for six months and VB how JJ of us survive . Of course this MD be considered inhumane and MD never happen to NNS , but it is happening !- all the NN to pigs and other farm NNS ? Remember that JJ soak in the bath or spending too RB at the swimming baths . NNS NNS and fingers that looked IN they belonged to someone much older , all wrinkled and horrible . Soldiers on manoeuvres in tropical regions face NN rot due to the wet and humid conditions . Jungle fever , leprosy , typhoid and JJ other NNS abound in such environments . Or do they ? MD it be that the adverse environment reduces our resistance to JJ of these illnesses ? Wet weather certainly affects our NN and is bore out by the sudden increase in deaths among the elderly every Autumn and Winter . Sudden Infant and adult deaths occur more frequently and influenza outbreaks , which have wiped out JJ thousands of NNS , are well documented . Aching arthritic joints , bronchitis , pleurisy , pneumonia , seasonal affective disorder , to mention a few , add more problems to our already over - stretched National NN services . Yet we do at least live in relatively comfortable homes when compared to the pig , sheep or cow !
